Banagher Links had lived a normal life until he met Audrey Burne. The day started out normally. Banagher went to school with his close friends Micott Bartsch and Takuya Irei. His class was going to take a field trip to the colony builder, the Snail, tomorrow. Today they were going to be given a tour at a museum after school. Banagher listened as he teacher gave a lesson on the wars. Banagher viewed war as something akin to fiction, as he was born after the One Year War ended, and did not experience the more isolated wars that followed it.

After the tour, Banagher was leaving the technical school when he saw Audrey falling from the top of the colony. Banagher grabbed Haro and hijacked a Torohachi and caught her in midair. However, the Torohachi ran out of fuel and the two managed to safely crash-land near the Anaheim Electronics school.

After introducing themselves, Audrey asked Banagher for his help, saying that she needed to speak with someone at the colony builder in order to prevent a war. Banagher agreed to help her, he knew the place best and he heard rumors of their being a Vist Foundation mansion at the end of it, making him the only person that could help her.

But before they could head there, they were both pretty hungry and stopped for hot dogs. As Banagher enjoyed his, he noticed that Audrey was looking at her hot dog.

"Don't like hot dogs?" Banagher said.

"It-It's not that." Audrey said. "I've just never eaten a hot dog before." She blushed a little as she said this.

"You've been missing out." Banagher said as took another bite out of his hot dog, get a little bit of it on his mouth. "Their really good."

Audrey began eating hers as well. She was surprised by how good it tasted. She couldn't help but blush. Both hungry teens quickly finished their hot dog. They both burped and blushed.

"Excuse us." Audrey said.

Much to their surprise, they quickly heard both their stomachs growl for more. They both placed a hand on their hungry tummy.

"Do you want to get another?" Banagher asked.

"Y-Yes!" Audrey answered.

Unfortunately, to both of their embarrassment, the moment they planted their asses on the bench, the button on Banagher’s pants and the button on Audrey’s skirt popped off. For a moment, there was just silence.

“Well…” Banagher said, fidgeting a bit.

There was an awkward moment of silence as both looked at their open clothes, wondering just how to talk about it tactfully. After a few seconds, Banagher cleared his throat, a bashful expression on his face.

“So, yeah, we might wanna cut back a bit, huh?” he said, rubbing the back of his head.

“Yeah, probably,” Audrey said, shuffling a bit.

“Gee, I knew we ate a lot, but not that much…” Banagher said, poking his belly.

“You don’t think we’ll suffer any further wardrobe malfunctions, do you?” Audrey asked hopefully.

As if on cue, both their zippers started to get undone, causing their faces to turn even redder. Attempting to bend over and look at the damage, Banagher saw his belt pop right off, no longer beign able to take the massive amount of strain his belly was placing on it. It flew a few feet away and clattered on the ground before all was silent once more.

“…That would be a no…” Banagher said, giving a little cough into his hand. “A-anyways, at least it shows the food around here is really good, huh?”

“Really good is an understatement, I’d say,” Audrey said, attempting to cool herself down. “We obviously need to keep our appetites in check, or else they’ll be rolling us around.”

Suddenly, Audrey felt a pressure build up in her chest, along with a gurgle from her stomach. Alarmed, she looked over to Banagher, and could tell that a similar thing was happening to him. In her experiences, she knew what this meant, but she had never felt so much gas at once.

"Thank you, Audrey." Haro said.

"This is Haro." Banagher started, holding Haro up to Audrey. "It's a replica of the robot mascot built by an ace pilot back during the war. It was the coolest thing ever when we were kids."

Audrey noticed that Banagher was as enthusiastic as a little kid wanting to show his new toy, she got the impression that he had wanted to talk about Haro to someone for a while.

“So, do you know much about this ace pilot?” Audrey asked, genuinely curious.

“Well yeah, he was the hero of the Earth Federation! He fought with Char Aznable himself,” Banagher said, looking back up at the sky. “It’s kind of insane to think that stuff like that actually happened, though.”

Audrey nodded her head, looking up at the clouds as well.

“Yes, and despite how distant it seems, their conflict created the world we live in now. That war wiped out most of humanity…” she opined.

“Yeah…” Banagher said, but then decided to change the subject. “So anyways, Haro here has a ton of cool features. His AI is really advanced, able to take thousands of inputs and come up with his own personalized responses. He has awesome mobility, and other, more expensive types actually help out Mobile Suit pilots during their flights when it comes to navigation and combat.”

“Wow, that does seem very neat. We don’t have any of those where I come from.”

“Really? Huh, well I’m sorry to hear that. But hey, maybe they just haven’t taken off yet? Maybe in a few more years you’ll see everyone with these little guys!”

Audrey chuckled at Banagher’s innocent enthusiasm.

"I had fun." Audrey said.

"I did too." Banagher said.

"These past several hours have certainly been some of the most interesting ones in my entire life," Audrey mused.

“Well, I’m glad to hear that!” Banagher said with one of his big smiles. “Glad this didn’t turn into a bore.”

Audrey giggled into the palm of her hand, quite amused by Banagher’s relief.

“I’m pretty sure it’d be impossible to spend time with you and not get some form of enjoyment out of it,” she said, winking.

“Yeah, well next time we meet, I should introduce you to another friend of mine, Micott. She’s really nice, I think you two would get along perfectly.”

“That’s very nice to know, Banagher. I’m sure any friend of yours would be a fantastic person for me to know. Thank you for the offer!”

After about ten seconds of silence, Banagher decided to speak up again.

“I gotta say, though, it looks like you’ve got a lot more secrets than you’ve been letting on,” Banagher said sagely.

Audrey panicked for a moment at this.

“Huh? W-what do you mean by that?”

“I mean, you can really pack it away! Maybe you and I should enter an eating contest at some point!” Banagher said, giving a big smile.

Relieved, Audrey gave a sigh before grinning and giving him a (very light) punch on the shoulder.

“Yeah, and ruin even more of my clothes? What a fantastic offer, I’ll have to get back to you on that.”

This was punctuated with even more laughter from the bloated teens.

"So Audrey, what do you think of hot dogs?" Banagher asked.

"Their delicious." Audrey said. "I think their my favorite."
115111211.title: A Bit of Talking

choices: Banagher and Audrey rest for a while
1151112111.content:
Banagher yawned and stretched before letting his hands fall. He felt something hard yet also soft in his left hand. It felt pretty nice. It seemed really familiar to him but he wasn't sure what it was.

"Um... B-Banagher?" Audrey nervously said, blushing heavily.

"Yeah?" Banagher said as he looked at Audrey.

Banagher saw that his hand was actually on Audrey's full tummy. Needless to say, Banagher immediately started blushing just as heavily as Audrey. Surprisingly, it didn’t feel that bad for either of them. In fact, it actually feel very nice. But even if the physical sensation was pleasant, the emotional side was another story entirely.

"Y-Your hand is on my b-belly." Audrey uttered as they both silently stared at each other for a few awkward seconds.

"S-Sorry! Sorry! I-I-I didn't mean to." Banagher apologized as he pulled his hand away from his friend's overfed belly. "I'm really sorry, Audrey."

"N-no, you don't need to apologize." Audrey assured as she rested her hands on her tummy. "It didn't feel bad at all, and besides, I know you didn't mean to. In fact, it actually felt kinda nice. I liked it." Audrey's jade green eyes widened as soon as she finished speaking. She said way too much, and she was too unfortunate to catch herself right before.

"What did you say?" Banagher asked, his own eyes widening even further.

Audrey looked down at the ground in embarrassment. Eventually, the blonde gained enough courage to look Banagher in his eyes as she gave her answer. "I... I liked feeling your hand on my stomach."

"Oh, well, that's not weird," Banagher said, scratching the back of his head nervously as he blushed scarlet. "I actually... really liked the feeling, too. I mean, it was really soft, and um, warm."

"Banagher? Can you rub my belly?" Audrey asked.

Banagher looked at Audrey's belly. He wasn't sure why but he thought she looked cute bloated. Of course, his new friend always looked just as cute. Maybe it was because it was the result of them hanging out.

"Uh, sure. No problem" Banagher said as he placed his hands on Audrey's belly. They were both blushing heavily.

"You can-You can start now." Audrey said after a few awkward seconds of silence, sounding nervous.

"I-I-I know." Banagher said, fighting back a gulp. "I've just... never really done this before."

Banagher began rubbing Audrey's belly, causing her to moan in pleasure as she felt Banagher's hands move around her belly, as all her discomforts began to fade away.

The next couple minutes were spent with Banagher giving Audrey several belly rubs, coaxing mighty belches out of the blonde. After a particularly loud one, Audrey stuttered a bit as her face went red.

“E-excuse me,” she mumbled, looking down at the ground.

Banagher just chuckled. “Don’t worry, you’re excused,” he said, resuming the rubbing once more with renewed vigor.

Audrey gave him a light smile. “Thanks.”

Suddenly, Audrey felt quite an overpowering sensation overcome her after witnessing Banagher’s earnestness. Tentatively, she began sticking her own hands out to come into contact with the brunette’s gut, earning a surprised gasp from her friend. However, that didn’t deter her, and instead she began to slowly rub his sizable gut with her own hands.

“Au-Audrey, that’s-“ Banagher said, before a small moan made its way out of his mouth. “That feels… really nice.”

“It does, doesn’t it?” Audrey said, a small smirk appearing on her visage as she picked up the pace of her rubs. “I’m g-glad you think so, Banagher.”

This continued on for a while, the blonde and brunette rubbing each other’s stomachs simultaneously. It was only a matter of time before the belches started flying out of Banagher’s mouth as well, causing him to try and excuse himself at times. Audrey only laughed and put a finger up to his lips to keep him quiet.

“You said it was okay with me, right? Why wouldn’t it be for you?” she pointed, out giggling into one of her hands as she watched Banagher’s sheepish expression.

“Y-yeah, good point,” Banagher said, getting back to the rubbing.

Banagher and Audrey continued to happily chat and burp as they rubbed each other's bellies. They were both having an absolute blast, and it was honestly the one of the most exhilarating experiences of both their lives. There was just something so... liberating about the activity that honestly made both teens want more. However, Audrey realized she still didn't know that much about Banagher, so she decided to ask a question.

"So, B -URP- Banagher, what's your favorite video game?" Audrey asked. The blonde barely even knew what a video game was but after talking with Banagher about them she couldn't wait for Banagher to show her his collection. She was even going to try them herself.

"I think it's Dangan -UUURRRP- Ronpa. Well, that's my favorite series. Have you heard of it?" Banagher asked, excited to geek out with Audrey.

"I don't think I have. Tell me about it." Audrey replied.

The two bloated close friends proceeded to geek out about the game series. As soon as Banagher told her what it was about, whilst letting out some burps, Audrey was immediately interested. The characters in particular were something they both loved talking about. Audrey hadn't even seen Dangan Ronpa but she couldn't wait for Banagher to show it to her.

"You're definitely going to have to show –UUURRP- me this when we're done here, Banagher." Audrey said, a dorky smile on her face.

"Don't worry, it'll be the first game I show you." Banagher was very happy to see that Audrey was much of a geek as he was. The only girl he knew that played video games was Micott. Playing video games with Audrey would be a dream come true.

Banagher and Audrey loved rubbing the other's belly and the rubs they received as well. They actually found the other's stuffed belly cute but neither would ever admit it. As they talked, Audrey lifted up Banagher's swollen tummy a little and then let it drop, causing it to jiggle and wobble. The sight caused both their faces to go red.

"Heh, I didn't know I was that fat." Banagher said, a dorky smile on his face.

The brunette then did the same to Audrey, causing them both to giggle. Their bellies were quite nice things to play with.

After a while more of rubbing, patting, kneading, and jiggling each other's bellies along with belching, chatting, geeking out, and being adorable dorks, Banagher and Audrey both felt a pressure build up in their chests as well gurgles from their stomachs. The two overfed teens looked at each other but unlike before, they were both smiling.

"UUUURRRRP!"

Banagher and Audrey both belted out a massive belch at the same time. They immediately started laughing, their faces blushing bright red. Of course, they were still embarrassed but they were having way too much fun to care.

"Ah ha ha, I'm getting pretty good at this, huh?" Audrey asked, covering her mouth in a mock gesture of politeness.

"I'll say!" Banagher concurred, chuckling. "Although you have a long way to go if you wanna match up to me!"

"Ha, no way! I'm definitely way past you in skill!" Audrey said with a playful wink.

"Heh, not likely, but okay!"

Truly, their friendship was blossoming in a way neither thought possible. Both the blonde and brunette had never even dreamed of ever being in this situation, yet they had found themselves belching and eating galore, and having a blast doing it. Both teens wanted this moment to last forever, just to lounge around, have fun, and not have a care in the world.
1151112111.title: Geeking Out and Belly Bonding

11511122.content:
"Man, I'm stuffed." Banagher said as he pat his bloated belly.

"I noticed." Audrey said, eyeing her friend's tummy.

Audrey was pretty surprised by her friend's gluttony. While she had simply enjoyed one hotdog and a soda, Banagher had eaten over a dozen hotdogs and downed liter of soda. The brunette's big belly was pressing against the waistband of his pants, almost to the point of busting his belt.

"I didn't think I could eat so much." Banagher noted as he looked down at his bloated gut. He really wasn't sure why he ate so much in the first place.

"Neither did I." Audrey said.

"I guess you learn something new every day." Banagher said. "I'm probably going to gain a lot weight from this, aren't I?"

"Oh, no! You won't gain a pound." Audrey said. "You didn't eat that much."

"Don't worry, Audrey, I'm not getting fooled," sighed Banagher, giving his belly a rub. "I've really overdone it this time. I mean, I've never eaten that much in my life... ugh..."

"Well, we all have those days where our appetite gets the better of us. I'm sure it won't become a habit."

"You think s-"

However, as soon as he finished saying that, a large SNAP! caught their attention. Banagher's belly had managed to snap his belt in half, causing his tummy to pour further outwards and his hoodie to rise above his bellybutton. Banagher and Audrey blushed heavily at the sight.

"I, uh. I didn't know I ate so much." Banagher nervously said as he rubbed his stuffed tummy. "I mean, I knew I ate a lot, but, you know."

Audrey let out a friendly giggle, Banagher was being too funny. "Well, hotdogs are pretty good" The blonde had a friendly smile on her face.

"Heh, they are pretty tasty." Banagher said, a dorky smile on his face. "We should hang out later."

"I'd like that." Audrey said, smiling warmly.

"It'll be –UUUURRRP-!"

But then he was interrupted by his own giant belch. Banagher immediately slapped a hand over his mouth, blushing heavily. While he wasn't huge on manners, he still didn't want to burp right in front of Audrey. Audrey had a look of surprise on her face. She didn't expect Banagher to just suddenly belt out a huge burp like that.

"E-Excuse me. Sorry about that, A-Audrey." Banagher apologized. The bloated brunette then looked down at his stomach in shame.

"Its alright, Banagher." Audrey assured him. "I can't blame you for belching after eating so much."

"You mean you're not mad?"

"Of course not." Audrey assured.

Banagher let out a sigh of relief. "Thanks, Aud–UUURRRP-!"

Just like before, Banagher immediately slapped a hand over his mouth. A few seconds of silence passed before Audrey started giggling, Banagher quickly started giggling himself. It didn't take long for their giggling to become full-on laughter.

The two spent a little more time happily chatting before deciding to continue their journey.

"So are you ready to go?" Banagher asked.

"Well, yes, but can you still walk?" Audrey asked. She was having trouble imagining Banagher walking while being that bloated.

"Don't worry, I mean, I am pretty full but that's not going to stop me." Banagher assured.

However, getting up was quite difficult. All the food that was within his overfed middle was weighing Banagher down, keeping him from getting enough momentum to get off the bench.

"Do you need some help?" Audrey asked.

"Uh, yeah. Thanks" Banagher said with a goofy grin on his face, he was blushing.

Banagher grunted, trying to help Audrey as best he could in his bloated state. After a couple seconds, he slowly began to rise. Unfortunately, the deep gasps of air he was taking resulted in something unexpected happening...

There was a distinct straining sound, drawing in the attentions of both Banagher and Audrey. It sounded like fabric creaking, trying valiantly to hold something back, but failing spectacularly at doing so. After a couple seconds though, the answer was plain as day, accompanied by a *ping*.

After a couple seconds of blinking, both pairs of eyes were directed straight down to the ample amount of belly fat that was oozing out of the opening created by the recently-parted pants flaps. The concentrated amount of creamy flab was forcefully pushing the zipper down, although thankfully not so far that too much of Banagher’s underwear was on display.

Quickly, the brunette pulled down began frantically trying to pull his somewhat ill-fitting shirt down over his even more exposed navel, a tint of red appearing on his cheeks (that had nothing to do with exhaustion) as he did so.

"I probably should've seen that coming, heh heh." Banagher noted, grinning sheepishly.

"I’ll admit, it doesn’t exactly seem like the chances of that happening were like winning the lottery, or anything," Audrey said with a giggle. "At least in hindsight."

"Heh, is that supposed to mean anything special?" Banagher asked with a wink, forcing his blush down. "I didn’t know I was hanging out with a psychic!"

"Well, I’ll have you know I’ve been practicing ESP my whole life," Audrey teased, placing her hands on her hips. "If I hadn’t left my tarot cards at home, I bet I could easily predict that that big belly of yours is definitely going to be gurgling a ton while we walk!"

As if to compliment her comment, the brunette’s stomach did indeed let out a low grumble. It caused both teens to look at it once more, the blonde blushing as she realized a bit of her friend’s underwear was exposed by the forced-open flap that was sans button.

"Eh he heh,” Banagher said, rubbing the back of his head sheepishly. "You could probably make a career out of that."

Deciding that things were getting a tad awkward, Audrey wistfully looked out at the path again before dawning a small smile.

"Well, I suppose we should get going, huh?" she said easily. "I've heard it isn't good to just let things sit in a stuffed belly for too long."

Banagher nodded, and proceeded to follow after the blonde as they began to make their way forward.

However, Banagher found that walking with a big, bloated belly was difficult. The brunette rubbed his aching middle and burped as he continued walking, groaning all the while. His gut jiggling and bouncing with every step. Despite how uncomfortable he was, Banagher kept walking, he wasn't going to slow Audrey down over a stomachache.

While Audrey knew that preventing a war from breaking out was far more important then Banagher's stomach, it was hard for her to not help her overfed friend rest.

"Are... you sure you can walk?" Audrey asked.

"Don't –UURRP- worry." Banagher said. "We *huff* can't risk a war breaking out *huff* just because I have –UUURRRP- a stomachache."

Audrey let out a sigh, this wasn't an easy choice. "I know. But we can take a break." Audrey then threw Banagher's arm over her shoulder. "Let's find you a nice place to rest."

"Thanks, Audrey. I really appreciate it."

"You're welcome. This is the least I can do after you saved my life."
11511122.title: Bloated Banagher

115111221.content:
They soon spotted a bench near a fountain, it was perfect. Audrey and Banagher walked over as quickly as they could and gently sat down.

"We'll rest as long as you like." Audrey said.

"T-Thanks, Audrey." Banagher said, smiling. A burp soon escaped his lips.

Banagher rubbed his belly as he and Audrey chatted, occasionally letting out a burp. While Banagher was still enjoying hanging out with Audrey, his stomach still hurt a lot. Sitting down, rubbing his tummy, and burping did help him feel a little better, it wasn't enough help.

"Um, does your stomach really hurt, Banagher?" the blonde asked, ruffling a bit of her hair. "Because, if it does, I think I have a solution…"

This peaked Banagher’s interest. He looked up, raising an inquisitive eyebrow at his friend.

"Oh? What is it?"

Audrey made her way over to his side, somewhat closer than she had ever gotten before. Then, she hesitantly rose her hand, placing it on Banagher's gut, and looked down at the ground as she continued.

"It’s… um, I’ve heard belly rubs are really nice for upset stomachs… I think it helps to bring the gas out?"

Her face flushed red as she described it, and was waiting for Banagher's response. Seeing her like this, Banagher couldn't help but sigh as he cracked a smile.

"Does it? Well, seems like a good idea to me. You're pretty considerate, you know?"

"Oh, stop it," Audrey said, looking around frantically in what seemed like a desperate attempt to calm her nerves. "You'd do the same for me, right?"

"Yeah, I guess so," Banagher said, twiddling his thumbs a bit as he looked down, before suddenly looking up with a big grin. "I mean, compared to saving you from falling thousands of feet down to the ground? This would be easy!"

"True," Audrey said, her own mind flashing back to the event where they first met. "That was... something else, wasn't it..."

A few awkward seconds passed without any of them saying anything. Audrey didn’t exactly know how to tackle that idea exactly; she definitely was extremely grateful towards Banagher for doing that, but the idea of tackling those emotions and putting them into words was an incredibly daunting prospect for her. Which was why she was incredibly grateful when Banagher shifted the conversation over to more mundane matters.

"So, uh, start whenever you're ready." Banagher nervously said.

"R-Right! Sorry, this is my first time doing something like this." Audrey said, just as nervous.

"You don't need to apologize." Banagher responded, a comforting smile on his face. "You can start whenever you feel up to it."

Audrey nodded. After a few more seconds passed, Audrey began gently rubbing Banagher's belly.

"T-That feels really good, Audrey." Banagher moaned, smiling.

"I'm glad it does, B-Banagher." Audrey said, a warm smile on her face.

This went on for a few minutes, one teen leaning his head back and relaxing, letting his bloated gut surge out, while the other continued to move her hand in gentle circles on top. It was bliss for Banagher, truthfully, although he wouldn’t dare admit it that strongly. Although, the occasional belch with a small moan of satisfaction that escaped his lips every once in a while was definitely a good indicator that he was enjoying it immensely.

Audrey herself was also enjoying it: the sensation of bringing her hands over Banagher’s smooth, warm skin made her get slight goosebumps. This was the first time she ever had purposeful, physical contact with any sort of boy her own age. The experience was alien, yet incredibly refreshing for the sheltered princess.

"I have to admit, I’m surprised you’re doing this –URP- for me, what with us having just met a while ago and all." Banagher said, looking over at Audrey with a grateful, yet somewhat confused expression on his face.

"W-well, I don’t need reasons to help someone, right?” Audrey said, in a slightly flustered tone. “You’re in discomfort, so I decided to ‘give you a hand’, as it were."

"Oh, of course! I didn’t mean to imply that you don’t like helping people, or anything. It’s just –URRAAP- just that, this is a little…um…physical, I guess?"

"…Hmm, that’s true. It’s certainly a new experience for me, but I hope it’s not making you too uncomfortable."

"Not at all!” Banagher said confidently, giving his belly a slight pat. “It’s just a little –URP- new for me, too. Then again, I can't exactly imagine you needing me to do this," the brunette said in a goofy manner, giving his belly a lazy rub. "After -URP- all, I don't think you'd ever be the type of person to pig out like me."

Audrey was surprised by the sudden break in conversation, but when the words sunk in, she donned her own happy face as she began to giggle profusely. So much so, in fact, it wasn't until half a minute had passed that she could form a proper response.

"You certainly know how to shift the mood, Banagher. You're kind of weird, honestly."

For a moment, Banagher looked at her a little nervously, wondering if she suddenly thought he was weird in any way. Only to be answered by a light tap on his nose before Audrey leaned back a bit, pulling her pointer finger with her.

"Then again, it's probably one of your most charming points," she added, a small smile adorning her lips. "After all, weird doesn't always mean 'bad'. After all, do you know what the original Old English term that it's derived from, 'wryd', means?"

Banagher shook his head, genuinely at a loss (but simultaneously feeling a huge rush of heat enter his cheeks).

"It means 'destiny'," the blonde said jovially.
115111221.title: A Nice Belly Rub

choices: Banagher and Audrey gorge themselves on all the food they can find
Banagher and Audrey stuff themselves full of ice cream
1151113.content:
"Ready for your first day as an ordinary girl, Audrey?" Banagher asked his close friend.

"I hope so, I've been waiting a long time for this, Banagher." Audrey answered. "But now that I'm here, it's become more apparent then ever that I don't know anything about a normal life."

An ordinary girl. That's what Audrey Burne has wanted to be her entire life. Born into the leading family of the destroyed Principality of Zeon as Mineva Lao Zabi, she had never known what it was like to be normal. Though she had grown up in a world without the principality of Zeon, she still wasn't free from her family. As the sole surviving heir of the Zabi family, she had been a powerful symbol for those that wanted to revive Zeon, despite her openly protesting against the idea. Still, she had no one to turn to other then Neo-Zeon, so she stayed with them. She had accepted that she would ultimately never be able to live a normal life but when she met her best friend, Banagher Links, she soon realized that was not the case.

Now that they had ended the Laplace Conflict and Zeon together, she finally had the normal life she had desired her whole life. She had long discarded the name of Mineva Lao Zabi, the princess of Zeon. She was Audrey Burne, Banagher's somewhat socially awkward close friend. Standing with Banagher outside of the Gundam pilot's school dorm, where they both now lived, she was now going to enjoy her first day as an ordinary girl. Though there was one problem, she didn't actually know what normal people do.

"Don't worry, I'll help you through this." Banagher assured with a dorky grin. "Ask me whatever you want."

Audrey gave a small smile. "Thanks. So what do you think we should do first?"

"Let's see..." Banagher began thinking of all the things he usually did with his friends, Micott and Takuya. "We could play some video games."

Audrey's face lit up at the suggestion. "That would be wonderful! I've never played one before, I would love to try them out!"

"I've got a huge collection, we'll be playing games until tomorrow morning!" Banagher said, thoroughly excited to geek out with his blonde friend.

"I can't wait to see it! Though maybe we should do some other things first." The geeky blonde suggested. "We'll probably spend so much time playing video games we won't have time to do anything else."

"Good point." Banagher said as he began thinking of other things they could do. "We could watch TV."

"TV! TV!" Haro, who Banagher was holding, excitedly said.

"That'd be nice but I already watch a lot of TV so is it alright if we save that for later?" Audrey asked.

"Sure, no problem. Now, what else could we do..." Banagher almost immediately came up with the perfect idea. "I've got an idea. How about we try out all the different food this place has to offer? I already know you love hot dogs."

"That's a great idea! Though I'm a bit worried about our waistlines." Audrey looked down at her flat belly.

"Don't worry." Banagher assured his friend with a grin on his face. "Let's just focus on enjoying ourselves. We've earned it, don't you think?"

"You're right, Banagher." Audrey said with a small smile of her own. "Besides, if we gain any weight, we can just work it off. Where should we start?"

"I know a great ice cream parlor. The stuff there is amazing."
1151113.title: A Well-Earned Vacation

choices: Audrey and Banagher spend some more time on the bench
11511131.content:
"You're right, this stuff is amazing." Audrey said as she took a bite out of her ice cream.

"I come here all the time with Micott and Takuya during the summer." Banagher said before taking a bite out of his own ice cream. "It's the perfect way to beat the heat."

Banagher and Audrey were enjoying some nice, cold ice cream at the ice cream parlor Banagher has suggested. Audrey was having chocolate ice cream while her brown-haired friend was eating vanilla ice cream. It wasn't too hot outside right now but ice cream was always delicious.

"It's a shame they couldn't come." Audrey stated in a disappointed tone.

"Yeah, I really wish they didn't stay on the Nahel Argama." Banagher, disappointment obvious in his voice. While Banagher and Audrey returned to Industrial 7 as soon as the fighting ended, Takuya and Micott choose to stay aboard the Nahel Argama to help with it's repairs. It would only take two to three days for the ship to be fully repaired Banagher really wanted them to come back home with him. And Audrey wanted to get to know them better. Marida had also stayed behind, along with the rest of the Garencieres' crew. The Nahel Argama lost quite a few members of it's mobile suit team during the final battle, so Marida and the rest of the crew of the Garencieres stayed with the ship to fill in for them in case of an attack.

Seeing that Banagher's mood had a taken a turn for the worse, Audrey said something to perk him up.

"At least Haro's here." Said mechanical ball was currently siting in Banagher's lap.

"That's right! That's right!" Haro excitedly said as he bounced in Banagher's lap.

"And I'm glad he is." Banagher said with a smile, giving Haro a few affectionate pats. He was right back to normal.

"So am I." Audrey then took another bite out of her ice cream bowl. "You know, if Marida was here, she'd probably eat this place's entire stock of ice cream!" The blonde said with a giggle.

"And she'd still be hungry for more!" The two close friends then started laughing.

"I've gotta say, I did not expect her to have such a sweet tooth." Banagher said as their laughter started to die down.

"I didn't either."

It didn't take the two teens long to finish their bowls. And after that, they ate two more bowls each. They leaned back in their seats after finishing their last bowl, pleased smiles on their faces.

"Ahhh, that was delicious." Audrey said as she gave her stomach a few pats.

"You said it!" Banagher said as he rubbed his stomach.

"So where should we go next?"

"I know a place that has some pretty good burgers, you want to give it a try?"

"Sure, I've actually never eaten a hamburger before."

And so, Audrey and Banagher stuffed themselves with lots of different food and drinks as they went from place to place. Pizza, cookies, brownies, hamburgers, soda, smoothies, pretzels, and more all went into their stomachs. As they stuffed themselves more and more, their bellies grew bigger and bigger. By the time there was only one place left for them to visit, their guts has become just as round as Haro and even bigger. Their tummies were straining against the waistbands of their pants, desperately trying to pop the buttons off them. They were straining against Audrey's coat and Banagher's belt just as much. It didn't help that all the drinks the two close friends had drank was causing them belt out some belches.

"Hey, Banagher, –UUURRP-! Excuse me." Audrey said, cradling her swollen belly. "I think we might've overdone it."

"Yeah. I've never been so stuffed. UUURRAP!" Banagher moaned as he rubbed his bloated belly. "At least we've only got one stop left."


"What is it?"

A small smile appeared on Banagher's face. "It's the hot dog place we ate at when we first met."

Audrey started smiling herself. "I always did want to hang out with you there."

"Remember how you didn't want to eat while walking but as soon as you took a bite you had the biggest smile on your face?" Banagher chuckled as he and Audrey reminisced on the first time they ever hanged out.

"Heh heh, yeah. I was such a dork back then. I still am, really." Audrey chuckled as well. "Did I ever tell you I came up with my name from a movie poster I saw while we were eating?"

"Nope. Guess you learn something new everyday."

The two waddled over to the hot dog stand as fast as their packed middles would allow, Banagher held Haro by his right side. They ordered three hot dogs each, as well as some soda. They sat down on a nearby bench and began chowing down.

"Mmm, they're just as good as they were the first time." Audrey said as she took her first bite, her face lighting up in joy.

"Yeah, they taste just right," Banagher nodded.

Despite how full their bellies were, Audrey and Banagher had no problem eating their hot dogs. They just simply tasted that good, so good it was like the pain in their stomachs completely disappeared.

"Man, that was good!" Banagher sighed, leaning back. "I can't believe we ate all of that, though."

"Yes, it was strange," Audrey said with a hint of worry in her voice. "I don't know what came over m-"

Suddenly, Banagher's gut snapped his belt in half and Audrey's belly popped off her coat's buttons. Blushes immediately appeared on their faces.

"Well, uh," Banagher awkwardly said, trying to figure out what he should say. "That happened."

"It-It certainly did." Audrey said as she looked down at her round stomach.

Suddenly, the button on Banagher's pants popped off.

"Wh-what the...?!" Banagher cried out in surprise, seeing the valiant button ping across the ground.

Audrey gasped in shock as well, but that proved to be a fatal error, for her own pants button was only just strenuously kept on, and this one breath was the final straw. It too was flung by sheer force of her bloated stomach to the other side of the pathway, leaving more of her skin exposed.

"Me too?!" Audrey couldn't believe it. "D-did I really eat so much?"

The buttons on their pants then popped off at the same time and the resulting belly fat that came pouring through the now open flaps forced their zippers down all the way, exposing a bit of their underwear. Both their faces turned scarlet

A few awkward seconds of silence passed as they looked down at their huge bellies and open clothes, not really sure what to say.

"Great meal though, right?" Banagher said, forcing out a chuckle. "I haven't had great food like that in a long time."

"Oh, m-me neither. It was, ah, very good." Audrey said, still a bit shocked by what had happened. She looked down at her dome of a stomach. "We certainly helped ourselves to a lot of it."

"I guess you can say our guts are proof that we had a good time." Banagher said with a dorky smile.

Audrey giggled. "That's a good way of looking at it. It was actually kinda fun eating so much."

"I gotta say, you can really pack it away! Maybe you and I should enter an eating contest at some point!" Banagher said, giving a big smile.

Audrey gave a chuckle before grinning and giving him a (very light) punch on the shoulder.

"Yeah, and ruin even more of my clothes? What a fantastic offer, I’ll have to get back to you on that."

This was punctuated with even more laughter from the bloated teens. They both then just leaned back in their seats, letting out pleased sighs.

"I could've gone without the wardrobe malfunctions but today was really fun." Audrey said, smiling warmly. "I think I would even call it awesome. I am using the word awesome correctly, right?"

Banagher let out a friendly chuckle. "Yeah, I would call today awesome too."

The bloated teens spent some time looking up at the sky and trying to pick out cloud formations.

"Aw, man..." Banagher said as he placed a hand on his middle and began rubbing methodically to help ease the stuffed feeling from within.

Audrey looked at his belly, along with his circulating hand, then at the brunette's face with a quizzical look in her eyes.

"Banagher, why are you doing that out in public? Isn't that a bit rude?"

Banagher was snapped out of his internal bliss at Audrey's words. He looked to her for a moment before offering a warm grin.

"Well, maaaaybe. But, when you got a belly as stuffed as this-" here he gave a slap to his stomach for emphasis- "it's okay to bend social norms a bit, wouldn't you say?"

Audrey looked away, blushing. Then, she slowly raised a hand to her own belly and began rubbing as well. She exhaled a bit in contentment as it really did help to soothe the digestion within a bit.

"See, doesn't that make you feel better?" Banagher said as he focused back on himself once more.

"It-It really does." Audrey said with a pleased smile. "UUURRP! Excuse me."

"UUURRRRP!" Banagher belched back with a grin.

115111311.content:
The overfed duo spent some more time chatting and rubbing their stomachs, along with occasionally letting out a belch.

"Well, I think it's time to head home." Audrey said. "Assuming we can even walk with these bellies."

"That's gonna suck." Banagher noted.

After getting up, with quite a bit of difficulty due to how bloated they were, Banagher and Audrey were ready to head home. After standing up, which was easier said then done, they leaned on each other for support, their big bellies touching.

"Um, our stomachs are touching, A-Audrey." Banagher said, blushing up a storm.

"S-So they are." Audrey stuttered, her face just as red as Banagher's, which is to say very red.

"Do you uh, w-want them to not t-touch?"

"W-Well, it doesn't f-feel uncomfortable. URRAAP! Excuse me. In fact, i-it actually feels kinda n-nice.

"Y-yeah, It does."

Neither of them could really explain it but for some reason, feeling their big bellies rub together actually felt nice.

"Love! Love!" Haro said, causing Banagher's and Audrey's faces to turn even redder.

The overfed duo began waddling back to their dorm, their guts jiggling and bouncing with every footfall. Occasionally, Audrey or Banagher would let out a loud burp, much to their embarrassment. Fortunately, it wouldn't take them long to reach the dorm.

"If this keeps up we'll need someone to roll us around by the end of the week." Audrey joked, rubbing her stuffed middle.

"Just like me." Haro said as he bounced alongside them. Banagher wanted to keep holding the little guy but he really needed a free hand to give his aching stomach a belly rub. Haro didn't mind, he didn't want Banagher to feel uncomfortable.

"I feel like I need someone to roll me right now." Banagher said, giving his tummy a few rubs.

The two then finally reached their dorm. As as they entered, they waddled over to the couch as fast as their bloated forms would allow and planted their asses down.

"You know, even though we're so bloated, today was amazing." Audrey said with a smile, giving her gut a much needed rub.

'Yeah, it was." Banagher concurred, smiling himself as he gave his own giant gut a massage. "You ready to –UUURRRP- play some video games?"

"Yeah, which one should we –UUURRRAAP-!" Audrey immediately slapped both her hands over her mouth, giving a blush. She couldn't believe that she had just belt out a huge burp like that. Of course, she had burped quite a lot today (which she wasn't a huge fan of either) but she hadn't burped THAT loudly before.

"E-E-Excuse me. I'm really s-sorry, Banagher."

"UUURRAAAP!"

But then she was cut off by a huge belch, courtesy of Banagher. She looked at her friend's grinning face, surprised. She wasn't expecting Banagher to belt out a burp like that. It didn't seem like he had done so accidentally and it was clear from the blush on his face that he was embarrassed. SO why did he intentionally embarrass himself?

"Heh heh, excuse me." The Gundam pilot said, a goofy smile on his face.

Audrey just stared at him, lost for words. There wasn't really much she knew to say at that point, so she decided to wait for Banagher to contribute his own story. After scratching his head a bit, her friend obliged.

"Well, you just seemed to be feeling down there, so...I kinda wanted to make you feel a bit better?" Banagher almost asked the last part. "...Did I do it wrong? I'm new to all this, so you can have away at me now."

Audrey realized that Banagher had intentionally burped to help her feel less embarrassed by sharing her problem with her. And it worked perfectly. Audrey couldn't help but smile, Banagher was always good at cheering people up. He was such a sweet (and cute) guy.

"Actually, you did it perfectly." Audrey proclaimed.

"I did?" Banagher asked.

"Yes, with just one belch you managed to –UUUURRRP-! Sorry about that!" Audrey's blush returned.

"Don't worry about it, today's all about having fun." Banagher said in a friendly tone, chuckling a bit. "So you should let loose and burp as much as you can!"

Audrey thought about what her overfed friend said for a few seconds and then belted out an even a larger burp without excusing herself, her blush intensifying.

"Good one!" Banagher complimented, a dorky smile on his face.

"Thanks, Banagher!" Audrey said, an equally dorky smile on her own face. She had no idea what was getting into them but she loved it!

And so, Audrey and Banagher had a burping contest. They rubbed their stomachs, coaxing out several large belches. The burps they let out were loud and were occasionally followed up by giggle fits from the both of them, as they were having an absolute blast. "UUUUUURRP!" Audrey belched

As if there was something intimate about the whole thing, like they could forget all the troubles of world and all its colonies.

Suddenly, both felt a rumbling deep in their guts. It started out as just a small thing at first, but then built up quickly. Before either of them knew it, a large expulsion of gas exited their mouths, filling the air with evidence of their meal.

Audrey and Banagher simultaneously belted out a massive belch. They immediately burst out into laughter. Audrey never would've imagined that this is how her first day as a normal girl would've gone. 115113113.content:
Banagher looked down at his body, a mixture of many emotions swirling through his mind. He was standing in his room, on top of a white scale that read that he was now 200 pounds. It was official now: he was fat. Obese. No longer could he be considered the slim young man he used to be.

Sighing, he fell back onto his bed, the mattress creaking beneath his large weight. He looked down at his belly once more, noticing that lying down only made it look bigger. It was like a giant, soft mound that loomed over him, pretty much blocking off the view of anything past its massive expanse. Banagher stood up and gave it a closer look, a look of disgust on his face.

His stomach was quite the enormous thing, so big and round it was pressing against the hem of his pants, the fabric barely able to contain it. So far, it didn’t have any massive front rolls that turned it into a double-belly, instead just making it appear like one spherical, large mass. Of course, there were plenty of side-rolls that accompanied his love handles, and those could be quite deep, especially if the brunette ever decided to bend over to either side for whatever reason. All of this helped to make Banagher’s belly incredibly soft and jiggly, no hints of muscle left within.

Of course, that wasn’t the only part of his body that got bigger, much to the Gundam pilot’s dismay. Banagher’s legs were huge, and there was a lot more junk in his trunk as well. Gone were the toned legs that met up with an equally firm ass; now they had been replaced with legs that were so huge they squished and chaffed together anytime the brunette walked, and a giant bubble butt that jiggled and wobbled with every step the poor young man made.

In terms of Banagher’s chest, that was also quite different. It used to have muscles honed from hours of hard work, pecs that were nearly as hard as rocks. But not anymore; now his chest was so flabby and big that it could almost use a bra. His moobs were huge, squishing up against each other anytime the brunette lied down, and they jiggled tremendously with every little movement they young man made. They weren’t big enough to lie on his stomach, but if he gained anymore weight, Banagher was a little afraid of what would happen.

Finally, there was the brunette’s face. While it always had a bit of softness to it in the past, that only became much more pronounced as the pounds piled on. Banagher’s cheeks had filled out to the point of becoming cherubic, and his chin was now double-tiered. It also wasn’t too unlikely to see this same face red and drenched with sweat after a particularly grueling thing the out-of-shape Gundam pilot had to do, his panting only serving to show the bigger features of his visage.

The reason Banagher had gained weight was his close friend, Audrey Burne. They two had decided to dorm together at Banagher's school after the Laplace conflict ended. Their had grown even closer to each other as well, to the point of becoming lovers, though they were still too nervous to admit they were boyfriend and girlfriend. The two would often enjoy hot dogs together, like they did when they first met.

Because of Audrey's kindness, she would often give Banagher a lot of food, unintentionally fattening him up. They both knew he was fat, but they didn't really know what to say. As a result, they avoided talking about it as much possible. Granted, they both enjoyed a little belly play; that was at least one good thing about Banagher's new weight.

Micott and Takuya also didn't say anything, though Micott did "accidentally" take a picture of Banagher's stomach exclusively when it was supposed to display both her and the Gundam pilot's bodies in full view. Banagher's weight gain didn't affect his relationship with his friends, which helped him feel a little better about his flab.

Marida was more blunt, and had no problems telling Banagher he was fat and out-of-shape. However, she didn't say that to be mean. In fact, she was concerned for him, especially since she saw how distressed he was over his new pounds. It was just her lack of social skills that made it come off harsher than intended. So, she offered to help Banagher lose some weight, which the brunette accepted eagerly, both to be nice to Marida and slim down a bit.

"Good morning Banagher." Audrey said as she walked into his room. "Ready for breakfast?"

"Morning Audrey, and yeah, I could go for some cereal." Banagher said as he picked up Haro.

Audrey could tell that Banagher was just checking his weight and probably wasn't happy with it. Spending some time with him would be a good way to get his mind off of it.

Banagher could feel his belly, ass, and moobs jiggle and bounce as he and Audrey descended down the stairs, catching both of their attention.

"So, uh, where are Takuya and Micott?" Banagher asked, blushing.

"Their picking up a video game, the one that's about two girls trapped in a city fighting mechanical bears. I forgot the name." Audrey answered as they reached the end of the stairs.

"Oh yeah, I forgot. I was thinking about something else." Banagher said as he placed a hand on his tummy. He was glad that he'd be jiggling a little less, now that they were off the stairs.

"Anyways, I'll have to show you it. It's part of a series, I think you'll like it."

"It sounds interesting." Audrey replied.

The two then began watching TV as they enjoyed their breakfast on the couch.

1151131133.content:
Lazing around in the living room of Banagher’s dorm, Banagher and Audrey really had no idea what to do. It was a nice, peaceful day, but there wasn’t much they could think of to occupy their time. Aside from playing some video games, those were always fun. But otherwise, nada.

That was, of course, until Audrey’s stomach gave a loud growl. Sitting at the dining room table, she sported a massive blush as she put her hands to her stomach, hoping Banagher hadn’t heard that. Unfortuanetly, from the way his full face turned to look at her, he had.

Thankfully, though, the brunette wasn’t nearly the type of person who’d make fun of her for being hungry. Instead, he got up and walked on over to his friend, a goofy smile on his face the whole while. Audrey couldn’t help but notice how much his belly jiggled with every step.

“So, feeling a little peckish?” the Gundam pilot asked as he made it to the table. “Because if you are, we could go out to get something.”

Audrey looked up, flattered that Banagher would make that type of suggestion.

“Are you sure, Banagher? I could just make a sandwich or something here, we have the ingredients…”

“No, of course not! I know just the place to bring you, and besides, I want a bit more food myself,” the eager young man said, placing a hand on his rotund middle.

Audrey sighed, then gave a little smile. Banagher was always good at persuading her to do things.

++

Audrey stared at the menu of an interesting restaurant that caught her eye, called “Po’s Hideout”, lost in thought. This was her first time going out to eat in a while, and the options on display were quite staggering. So many dishes were right in front of her eyes, each one begging for attention. Corn dogs, calzones, pizza, fried chicken, apple fritters, and even more! The poor young woman had no idea where to start!

Thankfully, though, she wasn’t alone. No, Banagher Links was next to her, eyeing her indecisive expression, having already made his decision as to what to order a while ago. Realizing that his blonde friend may need some help, the brunette put on a small smile and tapped Audrey’s shoulder. This startled the princess, causing her to look up in the young man’s brown eyes.

“What’s the matter, Audrey? Having a hard time choosing what to order?”

“What gave it away?” the blonde said, giving a little smirk to her friend. “Yes, this menu just has so much to choose! I have no idea if any of it’ll be good or not…”

“Well, as someone who’s had all this stuff before, I can tell you that all this stuff tastes really great!” Banagher said, placing a hand on his round middle. “And this place has some very experienced chefs, too.”

Audrey still seemed a little uncertain, even with her friend’s reassurances. Banagher realized that seeing through example would probably work better than words; the blonde princess was that type of person, after all. She needed to see something in order to believe it, and it was looking as if he’d have to be the one to show her the light.

“Okay, how about this? I’ll order a whole bunch of that stuff, and you can try it after I’ve tasted it and shown you it’s good. Deal?”

Taking a moment to think this over, Audrey eventually nodded in confirmation.

“Yes, that does sound nice. You have to understand, I grew up in a very different type of environment than what most have been exposed to. I’m not used to the food that’s served to most others, as a result. I hope I don’t come off as being cumbersome.”

“Who, you? Are you joking? I’d never consider you a burden!” Banagher said firmly, turning to face the entrance of the restaurant. “Come on, we have a few meals to order.”

+++

About a half hour later presented a sight that attracted the stares of most patrons of Po’s Hideout, nearly making their jaws drop. For over at a table near the middle of the establishment, there was a practical feast laid out in front of only two people, a brunette man and a blonde woman. However, it seemed as if the young man was the only one of the two who was actually doing any eating whatsoever.

Banagher Links was certainly showing Audrey he liked good food, alright. He was practically shoveling it all into his mouth, caught up in his own gluttony. He was partaking in his own greedy desires with such gluttonous abandon, it even shocked Audrey a bit.

One such showing of his… passion for the delicacies was when he took two slices of bread, stuck a large calzone in between both, and chomped down it with sinful relish. He then took two slices of pizza in each of his hands, alternating taking bites out of each of them, practically inhaling all the greasy sauce and cheese goodness.

The reason as to why he was being such a glutton was because even though he ordered most of the meals for him and Audrey to share, the moment he took a bite out of the first dish, his eyes lit up in ecstasy and he ate the entire plate of fired calamari.

After letting out a burp, Banagher realized his mistake and apologized profusely to Audrey.

“Oh, damn, I finished everything! Sorry, Audrey, I really didn’t mean to!” he said, bowing his head in sorrow.

Audrey, on the other hand, felt something within her light up. Something about watching Banagher stuff his face with all sorts of food, watching his stomach get slightly bigger as a result, made the blonde princess want to see him eat more. Thus, she responded in a way that she felt would get him to continue.

“Oh, Banagher, please don’t apologize! Obviously, you’ve shown me that the fried calamari is really good!” she said as she picked up a piece and chomped down on it, pleasure visible on her face. “But, I’m not entirely sure about everything else. Do you mind if you try some more dishes for me, please?”

Banagher’s eyes widened. He placed a hand on his stomach, realizing that while he wasn’t full yet, it probably wouldn’t be too long before he got to that point. But then he saw the look in Audrey’s eyes, a somewhat pleading look, and he made his decision.

“Okay, Audrey, will do. I’ll eat more of this food, and then I’ll show you that it’s all delicious!” he declared as he began to get to work on the pie.

As a result, he ended up losing himself in his gluttony, since Audrey made no attempts at getting him to stop. He just kept on eating and eating, causing his shirt to ride up and his belly actually started to force his zipper down on his pants. Absentmindedly, Banagher unbuttoned them, allowing his stomach to billow out as he continued to stuff his face. However, that still left his belt, which was already tight before his stuffing. As a result, Banagher had an idea. The brunette began to inhale hard, forcing his stomach to expand out. After a few seconds, a large SNAP! Was heard as the belt was broken by the large amount of adipose spilling forth. Grunting, Banagher returned to his meal.

As Audrey watched on, she realized that he’d have to stop at some point, when his stomach wouldn’t be able to take much more.

What to do in that scenario?
