115121211123321121131211111111111111.content:
After getting their breakfast from the cafeteria, with Banagher jokingly remarking he's surprised they've even got room for breakfast after last night, the blonde led the brunette to the lounge room Mihiro took her, Takuya, and Micott to when they first boarded the room, in hopes of finding the latter two there. Fortunately, they were.

"Hey guys." Banagher before letting out a yawn as he and Audrey walked in, Haro rolling alongside them.

"There you are." Micott said before she noticed Banagher's starter belly and how jiggled with his every step.

"Man, you two really slept in." Takuya remarked as he turned his attention away from his mobile suit magazine.

"Sleepyheads! Sleepyheads!" Haro said, as Audrey and Banagher sat down together on one of the couches. Their orb-shaped friend then hopped onto the couch and sat right next to Banagher.

"Like you're any better." Micott teased Takuya. "Of course, it's not like anyone would blame any of us for sleeping in after yesterday."

"That's... actually not why we slept in." Banagher said. He and Audrey began eating their respective breakfasts.

"Huh? So why did you sleep in?" Takuya asked.

"We were up all night eating." Banagher explained with a sheepish grin.

"And watching TV." Audrey added.

"Wait, so that's why you've got a gut now?" Micott asked Banagher, eyeing said gut.

"Yup!" Banagher gave his belly a few pats for emphasis, causing it to jiggle. "You should've seen our stomachs last night, they were huge."

"They... certainly were." Andrey said, a slight tinge of red in her soft cheeks. "We also had fun watching Mobile Suit Gundam last night. Banagher introduced me to it."

"I'm not surprised, Banagher loves that show as much as I do." Takuya replied.

Micott felt more and more jealous as she heard about how Audrey and Banagher spent so much time together last night. Why Audrey instead of her when she and Banagher had been such close friends for years? What did Audrey have that she didn't?

"Thought I'd find you here." Mihiro said after she opened the lounge room door. "Banagher, if you're feeling well enough we'd like you to explain to us what lead to you getting in that Gundam." The Federation officer said as she walked over to Banagher.

"Sure. Do I have to see the captain or something?"

"Actually you'll be meeting with commander Daguza Mackle, he's waiting for you in the hanger. I can show you the way." Mihiro explained. "But first you need to finish your breakfast." She added in the tone of a big sister.

Uh, right." Banagher said before he returned to his breakfast. He was caught a bit off guard by how a member of the Federation forces was acting like a big sister to him.

"Everyone needs a good breakfast to recover, Banagher." She said with a small smile. The ensign then noticed how chunky Banagher's belly was, along with the rest of him. "Was Banagher always chubby?" She pondered. Granted, she had only known for him less then a day but she could've sworn all that pudge wasn't there yesterday.

When Banagher finished his breakfast and left with Mihiro for the hanger, Micott was still thinking about how Banagher had spent all that time last night with Audrey. She couldn't stand how Banagher seemingly picked Audrey over her, despite Audrey not knowing Banagher nearly as long as she did. She wanted to spend that moment with Banagher, she wnated so badly to pig out with Banagher. Suddenly it hit her. If Audrey and Banagher could get tons of food last night, then that means she could do the same.

Later in the hanger, Banagher had just finished explaining how he ended up in the Unicorn to Daguza, though he decided not to tell him that he was Cardeas' son, as he felt there was no chance of Daguza believing that. Banagher was sitting in the Unicorn's cockpit as Daguza stood in the opened cockpit door, facing Banagher. Banagher had turned on the Unicorn to demonstrate that he was the only one who could use it, as Daguza requested.

"And you stand by the story?" Daguza almost rhetorically asked, skepticism was clearly evident in his voice despite his calm demeanor. "You expect us to believe that Cardeas Vist just gave it to a boy?"

"Yes." Banagher answered with a stiff voice.

"So did he say anything when he gave you this gift?"

"Like I said, he told me to take the mobile suit and use it to protect everyone." Banagher answered. "That's all he said."

"There are multiple details about your story that don't make sense." Daguza bluntly told him, partly in hopes it would get Banagher to tell him the full story. "That said, it is an indisputable fact that this mobile suit is set to only allow you to pilot it. So it seems that Cardeas did give it you. You're free to go for now, though this is far from the end of our investigation."

Banagher silently walked out. Normally he would've said "Thank you" or something like that but he just wnated to get away from this whole scene. He felt like he had just barely dodged a bullet and had no guarantee that another one wasn't going to be aimed at him in the future.

"Would it be easier to believe if I told him Cardeas was my father?" Banagher mumbled in frustration as soon as he thought he was out of earshot.

However, he wasn't. As soon as Daguza heard that, everything started to make sense to him. Still, the commander of ECOAS felt it would be better to avoid a direct confrontation with Banagher for now.

When Banagher was led back to the lounge room by Mihiro, who then returned to her regular duties, for the second time in two days he saw a girl with an absurd amount of food waiting for him. This time it was Micott.

"Hey, Banagher, I was just about to dig in." Micott said in a causal tone despite this being anything but a normal meal.

"I wasn't expecting lunch to be so big." Banagher said as he walked over to Micott, eyeing the impressive feast she had gotten. The brunette had mostly gotten different types of snacks like chips and pretzels, thoguh she also got stuff like an extra large pizza and a tub of ice cream. There was also some fast food like hamburgers.

"I wasn't either." Audrey commented.

"Hey, it's not like you two have any room to talk." Micott teased with a grin as she gave Banagher's belly a poke, the Gundam pilot's soft tummy allowing her finger a bit of lee-way before it met resistance. She did this partly to emphasize her point but for reasons she didn't understand, she really wanted to feel Banagher's gut.

"Good point, heh heh!" Banagher said with a sheepish grin, giving his tummy a few pats. Audrey didn't say anything but blushed in silence.

"You walked right into that one, Banagher." An amused Takuya commented.

"So why don't you help me finish all this?" Micott suggested as part of her plan. "There's no way I'll be able to eat it all by myself."

"Well, I just had breakfast so I'm-" Banagher was then unexpectedly cut off as Micott forced a slice of pizza in his mouth.

"Just eat already." Micott said before she took a bite out of a burger.

And so, Micott and Banagher started binging. Despite the experience being rather fun for him, Banagher didn't get why Micott was acting like this, being completely oblivious to Micott's crush on him and that she was jealous of Audrey. Audrey herself was equally oblivious and confused.

Takuya let out a chuckle at the event, being the only one besides Micott who knew exactly what was going on.

"What's so funny, Mr. Takuya?" Audrey asked the freckled young man.

"Micott and Banagher, obviously."

"Does Miss Micott usually act like this?"

"She's always been pretty feisty but this is the first time she's ever done this." Takuya then grabbed two bags of chips, Banagher and Micott were too engrossed in their gluttony to notice. "Here, a little snack to go with the show." He said as he handed Audrey one of the bags and then opened his own.

"Thank you." Audrey said before she opened her bag. "This is certainly a sight." It was also far from what Audrey thought a normal life would be like.

1151212111233211211312111111111111111.content:
"UUURRRP! Man, I'm stuffed." Micott moaned, rubbing her stuffed belly.

"Oof, me too. UURRP!" Banagher groaned, giving his bloated tummy a few pets.

Micott and Banagher rubbed their stuffed bellies as they rested on the couch and burped up a storm, having finally finished their feast after nearly an hour of binging. Micott's belly had swollen into a big round ball like Haro. Banagher's gut had as well but it was even bigger then Haro because of the weight he had gained.

"Is this -URAP- what it was like after binging with Audrey?" Micott asked.

"Yeah, UURRRRP!" Banagher answered. "Except this time I'm the chubby one."

"Man, I didn't think you two would eat all of that." Takuya commented as Banagher and Micott continued to burp.

"I knew Banagher would." Audrey said.

"I'm pretty impressed with how much you ate, Banagher." Micott said. "I've never seen someone eat that much in one sitting before."

"We knew you ate a lot last night but we didn't think it was this much." Takuya added.

"Heh, thanks." Banagher said. "You can really -UURRRP- pack it away too, Micott."

"T - URRRP- Thanks, Banagher." Micott said, thinking about how her plan had worked perfectly.

"If you two entered an eating contest, you'd win, hands down." Takuya complimented with a grin.

"Big winners! Big winners!" Haro said, sitting right next to Audrey.

Audrey knew Takuya was joking and not actually suggesting they enter an eating contest, though he really did believe they could win one, his words actually made her think about joining one with Banagher. As well as Micott and Takuya if there was an eating contest with teams of four. The princess used to think that eating contests were absolutely disgusting (as well as all the belching, bloated bellies, and weight gain that came with them) and couldn't even begin to see why someone would participate in one. But now her experiences with Banagher had caused the idea to seem a lot more appealing to the blonde. There was just something so wonderful and fun about letting go and pigging out with him.

"Guess this means I'll be as chubby as you and Audrey when this all digests." Micott said as she looked down at her orb of a middle and gave it a few pats.

"Yeah but it's only a little bit of fat, it won't take long to lose it." Banagher assured.

"About that eating contest idea." Audrey suddenly said, ruffling a bit of her hair. "Do you think maybe... we could have one between the four of us? Tomorrow, of course. Miss Micott and Banagher are obviously too full right now."

"I was just joking about that." Takuya said. "Though I have no doubt that if Banagher and-"

"Did you call me "miss" -UUURRRAP- "Micott"?" Micott asked Audrey.

"Well, yes. Is that a problem?" Audrey answered.

"Does that mean you'll call me Mr.Takuya?" Takuya teased.

"Is there something wrong with that?"

"It's weird to call people your age Mr or Miss -URRRRRP-, Audrey." Banagher explained.

"Oh, I see."

"And how come you never call Banagher -UUUURRP- that?" Micott said, wondering just how close Banagher and Audrey actually are.

"T-That's because..." Audrey stuttered, blushing and trying to understand why herself.

Hours later, when Banagher was less bloated, he and Audrey began the process of cleaning his room of the remains of their binge last night. They knew they had eaten a truly huge amount of food but seeing all the empty bags of chips and pizza boxes among others really drove home to them just how much they really pigged out.

"In hindsight, we probably should've thrown out the bags as soon as we ate the food in them." Audrey noted as she picked up another empty chip bag and placed on top of an equally empty pizza box to make it easier for her to carry it to the garbage disposal room.

"Maybe." Banagher responded, grabbing another empty soda can. "But it would've been pretty hard for us to walk around with those huge bloated guts."

Banagher's rather colorful choice of words to describe their stomachs last night caused to Audrey to imagine them walking aorund with even bigger stomachs that were jiggling wildly, stomachs the size of a yoga ball.

"That's true."

The two teens then made a trip to the garbage disposal room and drooped off as much of their trash there as they could carry at once. This was their third trip there, and it wasn't going to be the last one or even the second to last one today.

When they got back to Banagher's room Audrey started picking out trash to throw out while Banagher took a break and laid down on the couch, his tummy still bloated enough that it pushed his jacket up enough to expose most of it but Banagher didn't really mind.

"What are you doing?" Audrey asked.

"Taking a break." Banagher explained, a little surprised by Audrey's confusion.

"I really think we should finish cleaning up as soon as possible." Audrey said as she started grabbing more empty bags and cans. "Honestly, you're being really lazy."

"There's nothing wrong with taking a little break." Banagher lazily scratched his belly. "You should take a break too. I mean, we both already did a lot of work."

"Why put off things that need to be done anyways? It's just being lazy."

"UURRP!" Banagher belched, which is universally considered a poor way to start one's argument. "Sorry about that. Anyways, I think always worrying about eventualities is only gonna stress you out and keep you from enjoying life."

Audrey then reflected on how the people she had spent nearly her entire life were mostly servants and soldiers of Neo-Zeon, people who would work day in and day out for her. People who lived to serve her. She knew that this was not normal behavior for people but she only realized now that her upbringing had given her unfair expectations of how much normal people like Banagher should work.

"I guess you're right. Maybe even a light snack wouldn't hurt. Right?"

11512121112332112113121111111111111111.content:
The next day, a plentiful plethora of food stood before the competitors. Pizza, hamburgers, cookies, cakes, corn dogs, kebabs, curry, brownies, fried fish, and hot dogs among others filled the table they were all seated at.

The eating contest was being done with three rounds and three teams of two. Audrey and Banagher were naturally teamed up, Micott and Takuya were the next team, and Riddhe and Mihiro were the last team. The two Federation officers were lucky enough to get a long break, which Riddhe felt was best spent joining this friendly eating contest he overheard Audrey and the others talking about.

"I can't believe you talked me into this." Mihiro said. Just looking at all the food they were about to devour made her feel fat.

"Hey, it's a good way to take our minds off of everything and relax." Riddhe argued.

"If I pop a button or break my belt, you're paying for it." Mihiro had a feeling that it was more a case of when then if. Already she couldn't get the image of herself with a huge gut and burping up a storm out of her mind.

Haro was siting next to Banagher, ready to act as a clock of sorts for the competition. He would announce when each round was over.

Looking at the huge spread of food, Audrey felt a little bit of dread form all the weight she was going to gain from this. But that was what surprised her, she only felt a little bit of dread. In fact, she actually felt really excited. Just a few days ago, she would've refused this contest without hesitation, she would've found the idea completely disgusting. Yet here she was, ready to give it her all.

"Ready, Audrey?" Banagher said.

"Ready!"

Smirking, Audrey and Banagher then happily bumped their big bellies together, causing both spheres of fat to jiggle.

Micott saw that, her cheeks turning red. She wouldn't admit it but she really loved seeing Banagher's gut jiggle. She just wished it was her belly he was bumping his with.

Micott looked down at her belly. It had grown from her binge yesterday into a round ball of soft fat that filled up a little bit of her lap. It was now fat enough to jiggle. Her breast were notably larger, though they were a little smaller then Audrey's. But her butt was bigger then Audrey's and thighs were thicker then Audrey's own. Her ass filled up her chair and her legs would always touch when she walked.

"You look fired up." Takuya commented. "Guess you see this as your chance to upstage Audrey." He teased.

"It's noting like that." Micott said, which would've only further convinced Takuya she was jealous if he wasn't already 100% convinced of that.

"If you say so." Takuya sarcastically said.

"Alright…Ready…Set..." Takuya said to get everyone's attention. All the competitors got ready to start digging in. A few got their knife and fork ready while the others were prepared to grab something as fast as possible.

"Go!" Takuya yelled.

Audrey and Banagher started digging into the fast food, greedily shoveling as much as they could into their mouth. Banagher started with a slice of pizza, chomping down in it as fast he could and getting some of it on his chubby cheeks. In contrast to Audrey, who while eating quickly, still managed to retain her perfect manners and elegance. Any food stuffs that got on her face were soon wiped away with a napkin. She started eating with hot dogs, as Banagher and Haro expected. After finishing his first pizza slice, Banagher started alternating between different foods, taking a bite out of a slice of pizza and then another out of a burger. After finishing her first hot dog, Audrey picked up one in each hand and alternated between taking bites out of each one.

Micott started with the ice cream, eating scoops as fast as she possibly could. The brunette was extra pumped for this, viewing it as her chance to outshine Audrey. Her previous plan on dragging Banagher into a mutual binging session with her was pretty much a success, but she would need to keep grabbing Banagher's attention (as well as hopefully his gut one day) if she was going to completely outshine Audrey. Takuya started with a slice of cake. He was eating at a decently fast pace but powered by pure jealously and love, Micott was eating way faster then him. It was actually impressive. Takuya started to wonder exactly how fat and bloated Micott was willing to get to win this one-sided war with Audrey. At any rate it meant he picked a good partner for an eating contest.

Riddhe was eating at a pretty decent speed. Not as fast as Audrey or Micott but still fast. compared to Mihiro though, he was astounding. The brunette ensign was eating at what was easily the slowest pace out of the six of them. This was partly because she was the least enthusiastic about the contest out of the six, and partly because she just wasn't as good at competitive eating as the others. Some encouragement from Riddhe got her to speed up her pace a little, enough that Riddhe didn't have to pull the team by himself. Part of why Riddhe was enjoying the contest was that being invited to an eating contest was subconsciously viewed by him as further confirmation that he wasn't being being treated differently because he belonged to influential family. He was a normal person, and becoming that was was why he had joined the military in the first place. He didn't know it, but he in the same room as someone who had similar issues that would eventually result in getting fat: Audrey.

"Times up! Times up!" Haro excitably said when the timer ran out. "Round one over! Round one over!"

All six competitors stooped eating and reclined back into their spot. It was only the first round and already they were all feeling rather full and a bit bloated, their bellies had swollen up a little. Belches escaped their lips as they rubbed their tummy. None of them were considering quitting but they still needed a bit to let their gut rest and expel some gas.

"Man, Audrey. You can really pack it away!" Banagher complimented the blonde before letting out a small burp. "Maybe we should enter a real eating -UURRP- contest some day."

"As long as you -UUURAP- don't mind us having to be rolled home afterwards." Audrey joked and gave her gut a pat, the two lovebirds giggled. "And thank you for the compliment. You're quite skilled at being a glutton yourself."

"That reminds me. UUURRP! Who won this round?" Takuya asked. Everyone was so caught up in binging they had pretty much forgotten they were having a contest.
11512121112332112113121111111111111111.title: Round 1: Eat!

choices: Riddhe and Mihiro win the next round, necessitating a tiebreaker round
Audrey and Banagher win and then celebrate by bumping bellies
Micott and Takuya win, Micott then gets a belly rub from Banagher
The contest is interrupted by a Neo-Zeon attack on the Nahel Argama
115121211123321121131211111111111111111.content:
"I think..." Banagher paused to belch. "I think we did."

Riddhe took a brief moment to count how many dishes each team had finished. "Yeah, looks like it. And unsurprisingly me and Mihiro were dead last."

Naturally this left Micott frustrated, she had been outdone by Audrey again. Coming in second place wasn't even a nice consolation because there was no way Riddhe and Mihiro were going to not acme in last place as long as the latter was eating at the slow speed she was.

"So how are you guys holding up so far?" Takuya asked. "Me, I've got more then enough room for the next two rounds."

"I think I'll be able to eat for the next two rounds." Audrey said, placing a hand on her belly to check whether or not it felt firm and full.

"I've still got more then enough room to eat everyone under the table!" Micott boasted as she gave her stomach a slap for emphasis that made it jiggle. The brunette had forgotten for a moment that this was a team effort.

"I really don't get what everyone sees in this." Mihiro thought out loud, shaking her head.

Micott was a bit disappointed that her boasting elicited a response from Mihiro instead of Audrey, the latter not even seeming to care.

The group soon got the next set of food and started digging in.

Like before, Audrey and Banagher were eating purely for the fun of the contest and the taste of the food. And also like before, they were doing really good in the contest. This worried Micott, with everyone still eating at the same speed as the last round the results were bound to be the same. Even though Audrey was pudgy when she first met her, and she did see her with huge gut before then that she now suspected was a really stuffed belly, she never would've expected someone as petite and polite as Audrey would be so good at pigging out. Hell, she wouldn't have even thought the blonde would be the type to even join this if it wasn't for that late night binge Banagher told her he had with Audrey.

Micott decided to kick it up a notch. She started eating as fast as she possibly could, wolfing down everything she could. She wasn't going to bother tying to pace herself anymore, she was betting it all on her sheer speed and willpower. The taste of the food was just a nice bonus at this point, all she was focused on was winning. Sometimes she wouldn't even finish what she was eating before she took a bite out of something else. Sometimes it was two of the same food, like when she took one slice of pizza in each hand and took a bite out of each until they were both resting in her sloshing stomach, and sometimes it was two completely different foods, like when she took a bite out of a burger and then a kebab before she sent both to her stomach. She was only pausing to either breath, drink, or belch. she didn't give a damn about manners at this point. She couldn't care less about all the crumbs and food stuffs getting on her face, clothes, belly, and even her cleavage.

This was the round when pants had trouble containing their gluttony.

Micott's stomach was unsurprisingly the first one to pop the button of her shorts, allowing her distended belly to pour further out, forcing her zipper to come undone. But she oculdn't care less, not even the fact that a bit of her underwear was showing. Besides, everyone would soon be in the same state. A predication that would soon turn out to be true.

Being the experienced piggies of the group, the veterans if you will, Audrey and Banagher realized when their pants (and belt, in Banagher's case) where feeling tight and wardrobe malfunctions were on the horizon. SO they undid their pants buttons and zippers, Banagher also undoing his belt. This gave their bellies the freedom they needed, easing the pressure on them. The lovebirds blushed a bit and gave each other a nervous smile and chuckle when they saw that a bit of their underwear was visible, but they were used to getting oddly personal with each other at this point so it wasn't as bad as it would've been when they first met. In any case, they quickly returned to gorging.

Riddhe and Mihiro didn't have the foresight Audrey and Banagher had, their stomachs snapped their belts and popped their buttons, allowing their bellies to surge forth and force their zippers to be undone. They both blushed at the sight as they looked down at their stomachs in surprise.

Mihiro poked Riddhe's belly to get his attention. Which worked but as soon as Riddhe look at Mihiro, he accidentally burped in her face.

"Gee, thanks, Riddhe." Mihiro said sarcastically in an annoyed tone with an equally annoyed expression to boot.

"Sorry about that!" He nervously said, terrified that anything he said would just make Mihiro even more mad. That or another belch would slip out while he was still facing her.

"Just wanted to remind you that you're -UURP- paying for the replacement belts and pants. UUURRP!" Mihiro said before she intentionally burped in Riddhe's face as revenge. "UUUURRP! There, now we're even in that regard."

Just as their bellies grew as they continued to eat, so did their belches. Audrey and Banagher were pretty used to burping loudly at this point, but the others weren't. Of course Micott ddn't care about how big her belches were, so that really only left Takuya, Riddhe, and Mihiro as the ones surprised and embarrassed over their burps. as much as they wished they could swallow their burps down, they did appreciate how it made their tummies feel better.

Eventually Haro announced the second round was over, leaving everyone swollen and moaning. The gluttons were leaned back in their chairs, moaning and burping as they tenderly rubbed their swollen bellies.Takuya, Riddhe, and Mihiro's bellies were as big and round as Haro, completely filling up their laps. Takuya's forced his shirt to rise above his navel, while Mihiro and Riddhe's forced them to unzip their uniforms, their own bellies forcing the shirts they worse under their uniforms to rise above their bellybuttons.

Audrey and Banagher's bellies were even bigger then Haro and just as round. Their shirts could only cover the top of their stomach. Audrey had already undone the buttons on her coat at this point. No way was she going to pop them off right in front of Mihiro after she was kind enough to sow them back on for her.

"UUUUUURP! Whew, man at this rate I'm going to huge by the end of the week." Banagher said, imagining how he would look obese.

"You'll be a complete -UUURRRRRP- ball by then." Audrey teased with a giggle, poking Banagher's belly. The brunette's words made her also wonder how he would look as a complete butterball. She felt he would look really cute as one. "Guess I'll have to be in charge of rolling you around. UUURAP! Assuming I'm in any better shape then, which I probably won't be." She grabbed a handful of her belly fat.

"Guess Micott will have to roll us around. You up for it, Mi -UUURP- cott? ... Micott?

"UUUUUUURRRAAP! Ughhhh..." Micott groaned. Her speed eating had left her with a gigantic stomachache. "W -URAAAAP- What do you say?"

"Are -UURAAAP- you okay, Micott?" Takuya asked. "You look like you're about to throw up."

A sickly gurgle sounded from the depths of her stomach, causing her to groan in pain. She burped again. "I'm-I'm fine."

"Do you want some pills?" Mihiro asked. "There's plenty of types I can get in the med -UUURRP- bay."

"No thanks, URAP. I'm fine." Micott really wanted to say yes but there was no way she was going to take one, especially if Audrey hadn't. To her it would be cheating in the contest to win Banagher's heart. And his belly.

"Are you certain you're okay, Miss-Er, I mean Micott." Audrey asked after she burped. "You look like you need a belly rub."

"Only if Banagher -UURRRRRP-! I mean, I said I'm fine!" Micott said, frustrated that to hear that coming from Audrey of all people.

"I can give you a rub if you want." Banagher offered.

It was REALLY hard for Micott to turn that down but she was determined to be the bigger glutton then Audrey not to cheat. But if he started giving Audrey one during the contest, then she was going to ask Banagher if he could rub two tummies at once.

"No thanks. Anyways, who won this round?"

"UUUUURRRP! You and Takuya, of course." Riddhe said as he rubbed his own belly.
115121211123321121131211111111111111111.title: Round 2: Burp!

choices: Audrey and Banagher check out their fattened up bodies, now officially fat
Meanwhile, Marida tries to lose weight by working out
Neo-Zeon attacks the Nahel Argama while everyone is still bloated
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
The third and final round proved to be the most challenging for everyone, as that was when the feeling of being stuffed really started hitting the competitors. Even Audrey and Banagher's eating paces were slowing down. In Micott's case, she was reduced to the slowest eater because of how much her stomach hurt from her speed eating. She still had the same drive as before, but no one in her state could eat any faster then at a snail's pace. Takuya initially tried to eat faster to make up for Micott but soon ran out of energy and had to return to eating at a slow pace.

The faster eaters slowing down gave Riddhe and Mihiro the advantage. While they had slowed down too, their somewhat poor performance meant they hadn't eaten quite as much as everyone else, so their speed was noticeably faster then the other slightly more bloated teams. Though the two certainty didn't feel like they were any less bloated then the others. Mihiro was dreading the effects all this food was going to have on her figure by next morning. In stark contrast to Riddhe, who didn't even think they would have any visible weight gain.

As for Audrey and Banagher, they were still eating but were a bit more focused on giving themselves belly rubs as they did so. Despite being so stuffed, Audrey was still enjoying the chance to pig out and enjoy herself, and Banagher was enjoying seeing her do so. He was impressed by how she was still able to have perfect table manners during an eating contest. Well, aside from all the belching of course, but bothering to wipe her mouth with a napkin was Godly levels of table manners for an eating contest.

'Time's up! Times up! Round over! Round over!" Haro announced, bouncing up and down in his spot next to Banagher.

Each competitor immediately dropped what they were eating, except for Audrey who just finished her bite of hamburger, and leaned back in their chair, moaning with their hands on their big bellies.

"UUUUUUURRRRRRAAAAP!"

They all released a massive belch at the same time. The combined power of all six belches was enough to shake the room itself, the many dishes on the table clattering, and jiggle each of their huge bellies. They sighed in relief when their eruption was over.

"I'm so -UUUURRRP- full..." Audrey moaned as she rubbed her belly.

Banagher burped. "I couldn't eat another bite. I'll explode."

"I think you're going to anyways. URRP!" Takuya joked, giving his tummy a few pats.

"Uggghh... URAAAP! So who won?" Micott asked, tenderly massaging her swollen gut.

"I'm way too full -UUUURP- to count." Riddhe groaned, rubbing his own belly and belching.

"I'm pretty sure -URRRRP- we all are." Mihiro moaned, rubbing the top of her belly.

Luckily Haro was there to count for them. He hopped onto the table and counted how many empty dishes, as well as empty wrappers, pizza boxes and bowls, were in front of each person.

"Riddhe and Mihiro won." He explained.

The first reply was a loud burp from Banagher as he pressed down on his belly.

"Does that mean we're doing a tie -URP- breaker round?" Takuya gave the second response.

"UUURRRRP! Do we have to? URAP!" Mihiro groaned.

"I don't -URP- I don't think we even have enough food for another round." Banagher said. He was correct, no one saw on the table anywhere near enough food for another round.

"Maybe we could have -UUURP- a burping contest." Takuya suggested.

"UUUURP! What's -UURP- that?" Audrey asked.

"Well, it's a game where you see who can belt out the biggest b -URRRRRP-!" Banagher explained. Burping the word burp wasn't intended but he still felt it was a nice touch.

"I see, URRRRP! That sounds rather weird but also kinda fun." Audrey said, still rubbing her huge gut. "But after those really loud belches we all let out, I'm not sure if any of us have a lot of gas left... I can't believe I just said that."

Banagher chuckled. He then reached over and began rubbing his blonde friend's belly, who then did the same to him. Both chubsters were sporting goofy smiles.

Micott was only able to watch Audrey and Banagher act like such love birds for a few seconds before looking away in frustration.

"Looks like someone wants a belly rub." Takuya teased. "I'm not B -UURAP- Banagher but I can give you one if you like. And give me one too of course."

"Thanks, I can really use one." Micott said as she and Takuya started rubbing each other's stomachs. "But seriously, Bana- UUURRP- gher's just my best friend, like you."

Micott moaned in pleasure as Takuya's hand came over her sore middle, she was not expecting it to feel this good. She wasn't expecting feeling Takuya's belly to feel so good either. It really helped her take her mind off her feelings of frustration and envy towards Audrey. For the first time since the contest started, she could focus on the fun she had during it. Even her animosity towards Audrey had calmed down a bit. Sure she still had no idea why Banagher was so smitten with her, and sure there was still something really off about Audrey, but the blonde was still her friend.

"Ah, UUUURRP! I never would've imagined that pigging out could be so fun." Audrey said in an amused tone.

"You -UUURRRP- said it." Banagher replied.

Audrey and Banagher then happily bumped their big bellies together, jiggling them in the process. The impact immediately caused them to belch loudly in unison.

"UUUUURRRRAAP!"

The two lovebirds let out a little laugh.

"Man, we're going to get so fat -UURRRRP- from this." Banagher said as he gave his gut a hearty slap for emphasis.

"To think this all started from a hot -UUUURRP- dog." Audrey mused as she gave her belly a shake.
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.title: Final Round: Fatten Up!

choices: Audrey and Banagher go out on a dinner date
Audrey and Banagher join the tiebreaker round for last night's eating contest
Mihiro drags Audrey, Banagher, Micott, Takuya, and Riddhe with her to work out
Audrey asks Banagher about how he obtained the Unicorn Gundam
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Audrey yawned and stretched as she woke up. She took a looked aorund what had become her room as she reflected on things.

"This has been my room for three days. Well, three days and one night to be exact. This ship has been my home for three days. Spending time, "hanging out" as they called it, with Banagher, Micott, Takuya, Riddhe, and Mihiro has been my lifestyle for four days, counting the day I arrived at Industrial 7. And they have been my family for four days." Audrey thought to herself. "I've lived for sixteen years, four days is a small percentage of my life. Yet it feels like this has been my life for years. I want it to never end."

But the princess knew it can't last forever. The Nahel Argama will eventually reach it's destination of Luna II. For all her political experience, it was difficult for Audrey to predict what will occur there. Banagher's status as the only one who can pilot the Unicorn will most likely protect him. If not then they'll destroy the Unicorn Gundam, then the Federation probably won't care less about Banagher. If that's still not enough to save him, then she'll see if she can convince the Nahel Argama crew or even Neo-Zeon to save him.

Now that she thought about it, she still didn't know how or why Banagher had the Unicorn Gundam. She would have to ask him soon so she could plan their next move.

Luna II wouldn't be the end of their troubles. There was still the matter of Laplace's Box and Neo-Zeon. When that was all over, would they even be able to return to their normal lives?

A growl of hunger from her stomach broke Audrey out of her thoughts. She blushed and looked down at it. "This is significantly harder to get used to then my new life." She said to her tummy.

She got out of her bed and looked down at her stomach, blushing even harder. It was so big. She gave it a poke, her finger sinking in before it met resistance. When she removed her finger, the fat jiggled back into place without a mark.

"I can't even see my feet."

The buttons on her pajama shirt were visibly tight.

The princess of Zeon grabbed the sides of her big belly and gave it a good shake, she was shocked by how much it jiggled. Her face got even more red from the sight of her bouncy belly in motion. Even when she released the orb, it still took a second to stop jiggling.

"I... I have to lose this thing."

Said thing then growled again to remind it's owner again it was time for breakfast. Audrey sighed, her stomach was right. The blonde got dressed and did her hair before she left her room to walk to the mess hall, cringing as her tum jiggled with every step like a blob of jelly. When she got there, she looked aorund but couldn't see any of her friends. This confused her, they should be eating breakfast by now. Was the clock in her room wrong? She looked at the nearby clock, it read 11:13. Five minutes since she woke up, which were spent getting dressed, doing her hair, and playing with her belly.

11:13 and there was no sight of her friends. They couldn't still be asleep at this time, could they? That would be incredibly lazy. She walked to Banagher's room and knocked on the door.

"Banagher? Are you there?"

No response.

Making sure no one else was nearby, Audrey opened the door. Sure enough, she saw Banagher, sleeping, snoring, and much fatter. He was on his back, his stomach sticking straight up into the air like a mighty mountain. His gut was rising up and down with every breath. His pajama shirt had ridden his orb of a belly to the point not even his incredibly deep bellybutton was covered. Haro was in sleep mode by the side of the bed.

Shaking her head playfully, Audrey gave a little smile. She expected no less from her pal.

The blonde walked over to Banagher, nearly lost in the tantalizing way his tummy moved with every breath. Haro woke up and was about to greet Audrey, who put a finger to her lips to indicate that she wants him to be quiet.

She placed her hands on the blubbery surface of his massive belly and started rubbing and playing with it, amused by how none of this woke the brunette up. She loved how it felt in her hands, it was like a wonderful pillow. She rubbed, pat, jiggled, and shook her close friend's sphere of adipose, having the time of her life. She loved watching all the fat jiggle from the contact. At one point she even stuck a finger in Banagher's navel. Sometimes she'd grab handholds of Banagher's belly flesh. Audrey had no idea what had gotten into her, but this was way too much fun.

When she finally had enough fun, she removed her hands from the snoring brunette's belly and took a moment to look at the large expanse. She then gave it a big slap, the fat belly jiggling greatly from the impact.

"Ow!" Banagher jolted awake.

"Good morning, Banagher." Audrey sweetly said.

"Morning, Audrey." Banagher in a somewhat annoyed tone. He then yawned.

"Good morning, Banagher! Good morning, Audrey!" Haro joyfully said.

"Morning, Haro." Banagher said, still a bit annoyed at Audrey's method for waking him up.

"Good morning, Haro." Audrey said, she then returned her attention to Banagher. "I'll wait outside while you get dressed. I didn't have breakfast yet, so lets eat together."

"Sounds good, I'll be done in a sec."

Audrey then waited outside Banagher's room. To pass the time, she started playing with her belly after she checked that no one was nearby. She did things like rubbing it, feeling it up, shaking it, and slapping it. She also checked to see how deep her bellybutton was now. This made her embarrassed, but she had nothing better to do. Plus it was almost fun. Almost. At least, that's what she told herself.

She realized that Banagher should've been done getting dressed by now. She opened his door to see that yes, he had gone back to sleep, still in his pajamas. She walked over and slapped his gut again.

"I'm up, I'm up!"

He quickly got dressed and left his room. Allowing both teens to see how fat the other had become.

As the pounds continued to pile on Audrey and Banagher’s bodies, they made their marks known. If one were to look at the couple, it would be difficult to discern which of the two had received a larger share of weight.

Audrey’s stomach had ballooned to such proportions the young woman had never even contemplated. In such a short span, it had gone from mostly trim to a reservoir of fat. A reservoir so full and heavy, it hung low enough to obscure a fair portion of her crotch while standing. Two meaty love handles flared from her sides, positioned just below a small roll that partitioned them from the rest of her abdomen’s expanse.

If there was one thing Audrey’s weight gain excelled at, it was bringing her chest it to its true voluminous glory. Supple as marshmallows and nearly large as cantaloupes, they’d grown to such an extent that they made jokes of any bra Audrey attempted to contain them in. They pooled over the top of her abdomen when she stood or sat down; they hung like ripened berries when she bent over.

The assets on Audrey’s lower end weren’t anything to scoff at either, though. Her ass had grown to a size ill-suited for her skinny jeans, making it and her legs a tight squeeze. It didn’t even jiggle, it was so compressed. Though while the princess’ ass hadn’t yet managed to escape the her clothes, that didn’t mean it didn’t make its presence known. There were plenty of times in which Audrey vied for a seat, only to find that most could barely contain it. They got the job done, but armchairs and wide stools had had become her preferred seating of choice.

All of this was topped off with Audrey’s face, which had received comparatively little change. It acquired a hint of a double chin through all the gaining (the extra fat helping to obscure her growing neck), as well as chubby cheeks that created a small alcove for her mouth. Beyond that, however, she was still just as easy to recognize as Zeon’s former royalty.

Banagher had undergone a simpler gain, though just as pronounced. Most of it was centered in his stomach, which was so large that the poor guy gave up on trying to keep his pants closed. It hung even further down than Audrey’s, to the point it pretty much did obscure his crotch. Any shirt Banagher wore, meanwhile, could barely obscure it. His navel ran deep; it could fit a whole finger without difficulty.

His chest had become soft and pliable, not as much as Audrey’s, but only due to the inherent differences in biology between man and woman. Banagher’s jiggly posterior also jutted out further than any fit male’s would have any right to, and his thighs were constantly rubbing against each other, light as the sensation was.

Banagher’s face gain was more pronounced than Audrey’s, with a more pronounced double chin and cheeks. It hadn’t gotten to such an extent that his neck was swaddled with fat or anything, but it was certainly on that track.

"Ready for breakfast?" Audrey asked.

"Yeah, I'm starving." Banagher gave his middle a few pats for emphasis, the mass of fat wobbling from it.
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.title: New Day, New Fat

choices: Audrey and Banagher happily stuff themselves with pizza
Someone walks in on Audrey and Banagher's binge
A bloated Mihiro drags the also bloated Audrey and Banagher off to exercise

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
"There are two hundred billion stars in the galaxy, and this is only a small part of that seen from here." Audrey mused aloud as she looked at the view of space the recreational room gave her and Banagher.

"I never really thought of it like that." Banagher said as he also looked at the stars. "I like looking at the stars when I think about where I belong. Heh, Micott says I sometimes completely space out and she gets mad when I forget she and Takuya are there."

"I see. That sounds like something you'd both do." Audrey only needed a second to imagine something like that happening with the two of them. "I find myself looking at the stars often too."

"Wondering where your place in the world is too?"

"Yes."

"Hey, Audrey?

"Hm?"

"When are you going to take your shot?"

Banagher was referring to a shot in a game of pool. The two teens had been spending time after breakfast playing various games in the recreational room.

"Oh! Uh, sorry. I got caught up in our conversation." The blonde then made her shot, which didn't earn her a single point. For the third shot in a row. "Whats the score again?"

"Uh, six to seventeen."

Audrey sighed in frustration, not that she was surprised she was doing so poorly. "This game is harder then chess."

'You wanna play something else?"

"Yes please."

After eating breakfast with Micott, Takuya, Haro, Mihiro and Riddhe, the circle of friends split into two groups. Apparently Banagher's childhood friends and the two Federation officers were going to finish up the eating contest from yesterday, which they would need Haro for to count the dishes. Riddhe himself was surprised he was able to drag Mihiro with him into this again. Especially given the obvious effect the eating contest had on all their bodies. Not only had Audrey and Banagher gone from chubby to fat, but Takuya, Riddhe, and Mihiro had gone from thin as rials to pudgy.

Riddhe's gain was mostly focused on his belly, which was now a round potbelly that got jiggly with every step. He did also have more junk in his trunk, which made the cockpit of his ReZEL a bit snug. Some moobs were beginning to develop as well. His face was already soft, and his weight gain only made it softer, making his cheeks more round and chubby.

Mihiro's gain had spread evenly, but with a bit more emphasis her chest and butt, the former making her bra a bit snug and the latter nearly reaching bubble butt status, though she did also have a pudgy tummy, wider legs, and a rounder face.

Takuya's weight gain had spread completely evenly. A round soft belly suited his status as a geek, which Micott teased him about as she gave it a slap to see it jiggle. Man boobs were starting to form and his butt was fatter. His freckles went along well with his fatter cheeks.

Mihiro told them that after this she was going to help them all get in shape. It was a bit hard to resist to temptation to note that Audrey and Banagher needed it the most but she didn't want to be mean.

So this left the duo of Audrey and Banagher alone for a whole day. The Gundam pilot suggested they check out the recreational room, and the princess suggested they bring four boxes of hot extra pizza with them, two for each of them. The chef of the Nahel Argama was already used to what gluttons this duo could be and found it charming to see a young couple enjoying themselves so much, so she got the pizza ready on the double.

"I can't believe people throw something this sharp just to pass the time." Audrey said as she looked at the throwing dart.

"I can see why you'd think that." Banagher then threw his dart, which landed in the inner ring of the board. "Especially now that we've got this huge balloons attached to us." He gave his tummy a few pats.

"What balloons?" Audrey then threw her own dart, which hit the outer ring.

"Ya know, the ones we're putting all that food in." Banagher threw another dart, which landed in the outer ring.

"I still don't get what-Oh! Now I get it. He he!" Audrey threw another dart, which barely even managed to hit the board. "Miss Mihiro would probably be mad at us if she saw how much pizza we're going to eat."

"If she does, just point out she got roped into another eating contest." Banagher half jokingly said as they continued ot play, Audrey consistently getting low scores.

"I imagine she's already a bit mad at herself over that. Which team do you think is going to win?" Audrey was imagining all of them as being so fat they were cartoon-ish balls of fat that needed to be rolled around. She found it an oddly cute idea.

"I'd say Takuya and Micott, they were amazing yesterday, especially Micott."

"I'm tempted to say Mr Riddhe and Miss Mihiro-"

"You can call them Riddhe and Mihiro, it's pretty safe to say they're our friends at this point."

"R-right. As I was saying I would normally expect Riddhe and Mihiro to win, seeing how they're adults, but after their rather poor performance and how well Micott and Takuya did, I have to agree with you."

"Well, I think Riddhe did pretty good, it was Mihiro that held him back."

"That's true." Audrey threw the last dart of the game, which surprisingly nearly got to the bullseye.

"Nice shot!"

"Thank you, Banagher." Audrey felt some glee, not just from the shot itself, but also the praise she got from Banagher. "Now, how about some chess?"

"Sure, though you'll probably win every match. I can barely keep up with you on checkers."

Meanwhile, on the bridge of the ship, Captain Otto Mitas had just finished a frustrating argument with Daguza that did nothing to sway either of their minds.

"I know that ECOAS can do as they please during an operation, but I wish they'd get off our backs while we're giving them a free ride." Otto complained. "To say nothing of that prima donna from Anaheim!"

"Complaining to us about it won't affect the situation." Second in command Liam Borrinea reminded him.

Otto just grumbled. He knew that but it was always nice to have someone complain with you, to know you're not the only one with those feelings. An alarm then set off. "Hm?"

"The derelict ship we encountered has decelerated." One of the bridge crew stated. "Now traveling at relative speed zero."

"Haunted by ghosts of the One Year War." Otto mused. "Have the mobile suits eliminate it. They can move something that size, no problem."

"But they've already returned." Liam reminded her captain.

"Th-they what?"

"Well those were your orders, Captain. Would you like to give the order to send them back out?" Liam rhetorically asked. A question like that normally wouldn't be rhetorical, but she knew her captain well enough that in order to hide his embarrassment he would exclaim along the lines of-

"Just blast it with the main guns!"

Back at the recreational room, Audrey and Banagher were enjoying a game of chess.

"The knight can't do that." Audrey once again informed Banagher on the rules of chess.

"I knew it was too easy." Banagher said. "Why is the knight a horse anyways?"

"It's to represent a knight riding the horse, if the piece were to depict that in full, it would clash badly with the style of the other pieces."

"Then it should be a suit of armor, that would be much cooler." Banagher then made his next move.

"You can't deliberately move your king into check."

Banagher sighed. "I have no idea how so many people can remember all the rules."

"Video games seem much more complicated."

"No way. They're much easier."

"I can't make heads or tails of the terms used on the back of the case."

"That's just because you haven't played any yet." Banagher used a pawn to make the only move he thought could be even remotely good.

"Well I'll be able to once those games are finished downloading." Audrey made her move. "I knew the previous crew of this ship was unorthodox but I never would've imagined they'd use military funds to buy video games."

"To be fair, I can't imagine going a whole year without video games." Banagher commented.

The stomach of both teens then growled loudly in hunger. Their chubby cheeks went a bit red at that.

"Sounds like it's time for some pizza." Banagher said with sheepish grin.

"Yes, all the games we've been playing have worked up quite the healthy appetite." Audrey said wearing a similar grin, resting a hand on the top of her dome of a middle self-consciously.

As the fat love birds started eating pizza to their hearts' content, Marida was exercising in her room on the Garencieres. The completely obese redhead was wearing a purple workout bra, purple workout shorts, and purple workout shoes. With the song she had playing already stuck in her head, she was ready for the first exercise: Touching her toes. It was a simple yet effective way to start working out again after neglecting her diet and exercise regime for so long.

Though there was the problem that she couldn't even see her feet, her huge belly and chest completely blocking her view. She sucked in her stomach but she still couldn't see her feet. She inhaled deeply and then exhaled.

"I can do this."

She reached down to touch her toes, her belly squishing against her tits and legs as she did so. The Neo-Zeon pilot's face turned red with exhaustion as she sweat and huffed.

"*Huff* Come... on! *Huff* *Huff*"

She almost reached them but soon had to give up, and planted her large booty on the floor to catch her breath.

"Okay, *Huff*, that won't work." She wiped the sweat from her brow with her meaty arm.

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
"Push ups should be easier."

Unfortunately they weren't. Not only did her gut make it rather hard to do a proper push up, squishing against the floor like a pillow with every push up, but the redhead got out of breath rather quickly, only able to do twenty push ups.

"Jumping *Huff* jacks will work, my stomach can't possibly get in the way of that."

It didn't but jumping jacks were even more exhausting as she had to use her entire body for the exercise instead of just half at most. Her entire body jiggled with every jump, and the jumping itself was murder on her out-of-shape legs. After only fourteen jumping jacks, she had to stop.

The only exercise she could do now, having left her exercise equipment at home, were sit ups. She knew they would be the hardest but she was determined to lose weight no matter what.

"I *Huff* can do... at *Huff* least.... one!" Marida face was red as tomato as she sweat profusely. The expression on the poor redhead's made it clear as day how painful this was.

She tried with all her might, trying to heave her upper body up, pressing against her mighty gut that was covered in sweat. After thirty seconds of this pain, Marida simply had to give up. She flopped back onto her back, her upper body jostling from the impact. Huffing and puffing, the Kshatriya pilot was as filled with frustration as she was ice cream on a hot day.

"*Huff* *Huff*, I *Huff* need to lose weight *Huff*" She looked at her humongous belly, which was taking up the majority of her view.

"Hey, Marida." Gilboa's friendly voice rang over the intercom. "We found the Federation ship that's got the key to the box. Head to the bridge and the captain will brief you on the plan."

Marida had to take a few seconds to catch her breath before she could answer. "Under -*Huff*- Understood!"

She returned her attention to her titanic tummy, it was like a mighty mountain that stood in her way, or a huge monument to her gluttony. It pretty much was both to her.

"I can't believe I let myself go so badly." She thought to herself. "I'm a complete hog, unlike princess Mineva."

+++

"UUUURRAAP! Ahh, this is the life." Audrey belched loudly as she slapped her big belly in satisfaction, happily stuffing herself with pizza.

"Man, you said it! UUUUURRRRP!" Banagher agreed, belching loudly as he gave his massive gut a few pats. He was also happily pigging out on pizza as they conversed. "You know, there's something awesome about a girl who can belch like a monster!"

Audrey blushed and smiled at Banagher's compliment. "Thank you, Banagher. And I must say, there's something equally awesome about a boy who can also belch like a monster! I'm using the word awesome correctly, right?"

"Thanks, and don't worry, you are." Banagher said with a goofy grin, blushing in joy. "Never had a girl compliment my burping skills before."

"You're criminally underrated. UURRRAP!"

The recreational room was oddly empty the whole day, so Audrey and Banagher were free to gorge and belch as much as they wanted without fear of embarrassment. The princess didn't even have her coat or pants buttoned and zippered, as she was in private with Banagher, who had to walk around with his pants and belt undone. The two obese teens were already halfway through their first pizza. They leaned back in the comfortable lounge cushions as they gazed at the stars together, shooting the breeze with each other and wishing this moment would never end.

But Banagher got halfway through his sixth slice when he hit a wall.

"UUUURAP! Ugh..." Banagher groaned, rubbing his swollen belly with one hand as he contemplatively looked at the slice of pizza in his other.

"What's wrong, Bana -URP- gher?" Audrey asked in a concerned tone. She couldn't recall ever seeing her overfed friend like this.

"I'm... I'm just not feeling up to it today. I'm full already." Banagher placed his half finished slice back in the pizza box next to him.

"But you've eaten far more then this in one sitting before." A certain disappointed blonde said.

"I know. UUURP! I don't know -URAP- what's wrong with me." Banagher groaned, disappointing Audrey felt far worse then the discomfort he was feeling but there simply wasn't anything he could do. "I feel like I have a huge rock in my gut. I'm really sorry, Audrey. Next time we'll eat three extra large pizzas and a huge bowl of ice -URP- cream. I promise."

"I understand." Audrey said, she tired to hide her disappointment but Banagher was the one person she wasn't capable of lying to. Well, except when it came to her identity.

"Damn it, I completely failed you." Banagher said, the guilt he felt evident in his voice. "I'm a fat guy spending time with a girl as wonderful as you, do you have any idea how lucky I am? All I had to do to keep you happy was talk with you and pig out and I couldn't even do the second part right. I'm really sorry, Audrey. I'll make it up to you somehow."

Audrey placed a soft hand on her friend's equally soft hand. "It wasn't luck, you've earned this time with me." Audrey looked Banagher right in the eyes, her face was one of pure confidence. No blushing, no stuttering.

Those emerald green eyes, just looking at them filled with Banagher with a soothing warmth. "It's okay, you didn't fail me. Just talking with you is enough." Audrey assured him. She then let out a loud unladylike burp. "Excuse me." Unlike every other time Audrey passed gas when she didn't mean to, there was no embarrassment.

"Audrey... thanks." A smile smile formed on Banagher's chubby face.

"You're welcome. And I think there's a way for you to finish eating all your pizza." Audrey eyed the two pizza boxes stacked on top of each next to Banagher, she noticed that the brunette had left the top one open."Perfect." She thought to herself. "You just need a helping hand." She told Banagher with a mischievous grin on her face.

"What do you-" That was all Banagher could get out before Audrey tackled him to the ground, their big bellies hitting together and jiggling like jello.

Audrey was on top of her best friend now. Still smiling, she grabbed a slice of pizza. "Open wide."

"Audrey, what are you-" Banagher's words were stifled as she shoved the pizza in his mouth, which he started eating. The blonde made sure she was doing it in a way that ensured Banagher didn't choke. When Banagher finished his slice, Audrey grabbed another one and shoved it into his mouth.

This went on for what felt like ages. As soon as Banagher finished his slice, Audrey forced another one in his awaiting maw as soon she was sure he had properly chewed and swallowed. She could feel her friend's belly getting big and bigger, pressing against her own stuffed gut more and more with every slice. She always kept a hand lovingly on the Unicorn Gundam pilot's sizable stomach, giving it a soothing rub that eased all the aches inside it. After every couple of bites, the princess of Zeon held a can of soda or a bottle of water up to Banagher's lips so he could drink it.

Somehow, this felt amazing to Banagher. The sensation of Audrey's love for him, his belly pressing into her's, how he could just lay there and be fed, and the massage she gave him, everything was perfect. Not only did Audrey find feeding Banagher like this incredibly fun, she loved how his confused expression gradually turned into one of pure pleasure and love. It erased all worries she had that she might've went a little too far. The brunette's chubby cheeks often had bits of foodstuff, like cheese and ketchup, on them. It was a cute sight but a messy one, so she always wiped his cheeks with a napkin.

"All done." Audrey eventually said in a sweet tone with an equally sweet smile. She gave Banagher's gut a few friendly pats, making him burp again.

Audrey got off her friend, who then slowly sat up. His tummy was absolutely stuffed to the brim, the biggest Audrey had ever seen it. It forced his hoodie and shirt to ride up even further past his navel.

"How do you feel?" She asked.

Banagher had to let out three great belches before he could answer. "UUUURRRP! UUURRRAAP! UUUURRP! I feel..." Banagher looked down at his stomach, he nearly did a double take at it, and then looked at Audrey's. "I feel..." He suddenly gained a mischievous grin of his own. "I feel like two can play at that!"

The stuffed to the brim pilot then tackled Audrey just like she had to him, their bellies once again jiggling like they were blobs of jelly. Unlike when Audrey did this to him, they were both smiling.

"Ready, Audrey?" He said as he held a slice of pizza.

"Ready!" Banagher then shoved the pizza into Audrey's mouth, the blonde moaning in joy.

The blonde loved how being fed like this felt, not just because of the amount of pleasure it gave her, but also because she knew this was the feeling she was able to give her fat best friend. Banagher's feeding of her was more or less the same as how Audrey fed him, but she had to remind him to wipe her cheeks, and there was a bit more belly play. Banagher viewed this as partly his way of thanking Audrey for how she comforted him.

"I'm not a strong person with clear resolve. And I have no idea what the hell I'm going to do about the Unicorn or Laplace's box." Banagher thought to himself. "But I know that I belong by Audrey's side, and that's all I need."

"And with that, you're done." Banagher said as he put the last slice of pizza in Audrey's mouth. He then rolled off her. "How do you feel?"

Audrey finished eating and sat up. Her stomach was the biggest it had ever been, it forced her blouse to ride up well above her bellybutton. "I feel great. UUUUURRRRRP!" She said with a goofy smile.

"UUUURRRAAAP!"

Audrey and Banagher belched loudly in unison as they laid flat on their backs, their huge bellies sticking straight up into the air as proud testaments to their gluttony and close friendship, watching the stars together. Pleased grins were evident on their round faces as they gave each other nice belly rubs, burps and moans escaping their lips.

"Well, excuse us!" Audrey joked, covering her mouth in a mock gesture of politeness. "You know, UUUURP! Of all the things I'd think would happen in a normal life, this wouldn't have entered my head in a million -UURAP- years. Do you normally get this bloat -URP- ed?" She joked.

"Nah, we've both -URRRP- experienced a lot of new stuff these past few days." Banagher played along.

"It's a good thing I wasn't this fat back when we first met, would've made it much harder for you to catch me."

"But if I was this fat back then, you could've used my gut as an airbag." Banagher said with a grin, he then inhaled a lot of air, puffing up his stomach. His blonde friend giggled at the sight.

"That would've an interesting little way to -UUURRRP- make the crash landing easier."

Banagher released his breath, his tummy deflating back to it's normal massive size. "Heh, you sure about the "little" part?"

"Good point. Speaking of your big belly, I think it would make for an excellent pillow." She joked and gave said big belly a pat before resuming massaging it.

Banagher's cheeks went red. A cute girl, Audrey no less, using him as a bed? "H-Hey, if you want, you could give it a try."

Audrey's cheeks turned a similar shade of red, she immediately realized that might've sounded a bit too close to flirting."Oh, uh, maybe another time. You -UURP- You're really full, so my head would obviously cause you discomfort. Yeah..."

"R-Right." Banagher thought to himself that his fat best friend's tummy would make for a pretty nice pillow too.

A few seconds of awkward silence passed, only the sounds of two fat bellies gurgling and being rubbed filled the room.

"Hey, Audrey?"

"Yes?"

"I just wanted to say -UUUUURRP-! Sorry about that, I wanted to say thanks."

"For what?"

"For giving me a place where I feel like I belong."

The Zabi felt both her heart warm at that, and guilt at the same time. On one hand, she was so happy she could help Banagher. On the other hand, that place was incredibly dangerous. A part of her wanted to shoo Banagher away for his own good. The rest of her wanted to give Banagher a big hug and thank him for everything. Though despite all the physical contact they had, hugging was still something a tad too romantic for the socially inexperienced blonde. Belly rubs were just helping a friend out, right?

"I'm... happy to help." Audrey said. "There's something I want to say too. Thank you for -UUUURRAAP-! Oh, great, now I've got that habit too." She pouted.

Banagher chuckled.

"Thank you for -UUURRRP-!" Audrey was now visibly frustrated. "Thank you for -URAAAAP-!" Audrey looked even more angry.

"You wanna wait until your stomach settles down?"

"N -URP- No. I need to say this now." Audrey thumped her chest to get a belch out, her big boobs jiggling from the action, which Banagher thought was really hot. "Thank you being such a wonderful friend. Whew, I finally -UUURRRRP-!"

Banagher let out a bellyful laugh, his stomach and chubby cheeks jiggling.

"It's not funny!" Audrey said, Banagher kept laughing. "Your sense of humor is incredibly immature." It only took a few seconds for the Zabi's pout to turn into a barely restrained grin. Then a smile. Then a chuckle. And finally she was laughing as hard as Banagher.

The bloated couple spent more time, chatting, belching and giving each other tummy rubs they looked at the stars. They talked about a variety of things, like dreams, how they reacted when realized they got so fat, bets on how much fatter they and their friends would by the end of the week, TV shows they liked, what video games Banagher wnated to show her, or how despite spending so much time looking at the stars neither of them actually knew any constellations. The blonde also told the brunette about some amusing stories of Marida's weight gain, such as how she once snapped a belt right in front of Full Frontal, though Audrey just referred to him vaguely as "her superior".

After an hour of this, Banagher remembered those games should be done downloading now. Still bloated as hell, it was really tough for either of these fatso to get up, even with them helping each other, but they eventually did it. It felt like exercise to them. The Zabi buttoned her coat and pants, as well as did her zipper, to look presentable. Despite being several sizes larger then when she woke up, somehow she was able to do it. It was very uncomfortable though.

The two of them started walking to Banagher's room, their legs and stomachs jiggling and jostling with every footfall. There were the normal symptoms that came after their now-customary large meals: some belches here, some groans there. At one point, Audrey became seriously worried that a button on her dress might pop off, forcing Banagher to (somewhat disingenuously) assure her everything would be fine. It’d be one thing if something like that were to happen in private; the two had gotten used to their clothes malfunctioning from their ballooning weights. But Audrey was a princess at heart, and the thought of showing that sort of indecency in public would be one she’d rather avoid.

Not far from the brunette's room, they passed Daguza and Conroy in the hallway. Initially the soldiers paid them no mind, but Daguza realized the blonde looked very familiar.

"You there, the blonde." The ECOAS officers stopped walking, the duo they addressed followed suit. "Whats your name?"

Audrey swallowed down a burp. "ECOAS". She thought. "I should've factored them in. It only makes sense an anti-terrorist unit would be searching for me." "My name is Audrey Burne." She answered. "Is that all? As you can see, me and my friend just had a big lunch, and we would like to return to his quarters to digest." The girl formally going by the name of Mineva Lao Zabi could feel Daguza scanning her face like a hawk examining his prey to determine if it was time to strike. She felt like she was getting an x-ray done.

"Is it me or is there some hostility between these two?" The brunette pondered.

"Go ahead, I won't stop you." Daguza said.

"Thank you." She and her equally engorged friend resumed walking.

As soon as they were out of earshot, ECOAS officers being experts at indicating when that was, Conroy asked his superior a question. "Something up, commander?"

"Conroy, I think we found her. That was Mineva Lao Zabi."

Conroy's relaxed disposition was gone right there and then. "I'll boot up the database."

+++

Audrey groaned as she sat down on the edge of Banagher's bed alongside it's owner, she and Banagher had mercifully made it without collapsing. She undid her coat and pants, letting her tummy surge out.

"Do you know him?" The pilot asked.

"The ECOAS officer?"

"Yeah, you seemed kinda pissed off at him."

"You're just imagining it."

"Well, anyways we've got a few games to pick from. We can start with-"

The room shook, causing them to fall off the bed, with Audrey landing right on top of Banagher, the impact making them burp simultaneously.

"Oh God, I'm too full for this." Banagher groaned. Audrey belched in agreement.

The source of the quaking was a missile. It hadn't hit the Nahel Argama but rather the debris of the destroyed colony around it, which the explosion had sent some of colliding with the ship.

"All units, scramble!" Liam ordered on the bridge, the first one to recover from the sock of such a sudden attack. "Turn about, full speed!"

"Damage report and scan the area!" Otto demanded.

"There's no one out there!" One of the bridge radarman reported.

"Look harder!"

Another wave of missiles was fired from the Neo-Zeon vessel, Rewloola. They all missed the ship and hit the debris around it, triggering the same reaction.

"We've fallen into a trap." Liam said

As Otto was about to contemplate their next move, Alberto's annoyed voice was transmitted via the intercom. "This is your fault, Captain! You and your indecision!"

"Off!"

"If we had-" A bridge crewman quickly cut the link.

"I've got intense heat signatures approaching at high speed." The radarman reported. "I count four total. They're approaching from directly above us."

"Are they missiles?" The captain asked.

"No, sir. Not judging by the flight paths. I'd say they're mobile suits. But the way they're navigating the debris field... It's impossible... The lead machine is approaching at... three times the speed of the others!"

The lead machine that was navigating the debris field as if it were just a minor distraction was a red mobile suit known as the Sinanju, the Red Comet's successor machine to the Sazabi.

"This should be interesting." Uttered it's pilot, Full Frontal, the Second Coming of Char Aznable. "Let's test the performance of your brand-new Gundam."

All the while in his room, Banagher's eyes widen as he felt some sort of uneasiness. Of course the whole situation made him more then uneasy (and nauseous from how the ship was shaking and that Audrey was still on top of him) but what he felt here was different. More like it was coming from just one person.

"Are these the same guys that attacked the colony?" He asked, not even trying to get up as he knew it was impossible with Audrey still on him.

Speaking of Audrey, she slapped her hands over her mouth as she felt her lunch about to come up. Banagher winced as he saw that, afraid she was about to hurl on him. Thankfully for both of them, the nausea passed. "Oh I'm going to kill Marida." She groaned.

Things weren't any better in the mess hall.

"Ah! I can't take this anymore! UUUURRRP!" Micott yelled in frustration with her hands grabbing her head, her stomach stuffed to the gills. Her shorts unbuttoned and unzipped.

"Micott, we've gotta look -UUURRP- for normal suits!" Takuya instructed, equally as full. His belt undone along with his pants. "This ship could get a hole blasted into it any second!" Haro bounced back onto the cushion next to Takuya, having been knocked off it by the shaking.

"Micott, Takuya, put these on." Mihiro passed them normal suits. Like them, she was stuffed, her uniform pants and belt undone. She was glad their guts were about to be covered by the normal suits, even if the bulge would still be visible.

Riddhe was already on his way to the hanger. He wasn't going to let a bloated stomach stop him from fighting.

The turrets on the Nahel Argama fired in vain at the Sinanju, the red machine easily managed to dodge every shot and return fire, destroying eight turrets.

"Anti-air def-What're you doing?!" Otto yelled. He and the rest of the bridge crew had just gotten into their normal suits.

"We can't acquire a lock." One of the gunners informed.

"Forget the system, just shoot!"

The Argama fired anti-air missiles at the Sinanju and moved back. The missiles all missed but it at least forced the Sinanju far enough away from the ship that Full Frontal couldn't fire back for a few moments.

"Banagher -UUURRAP-! Not again." Audrey attempted to start. She rolled off her friend before trying again. "Banagher, listen to me. That machine's systems are registered to your biometric data. Which means it can't be operated by anyone but you."

Banagher's face was one of pure confusion. "That's what I'm told, but... but how do you -UURP- know all of this?

Audrey burped. "I want you to come with me."

The rear main gun of the ship was destroyed. The explosion caused another tremor in the ship, which proved annoying to Conroy's work on the Nahel Argama's terminal, whcih they had uploaded their data to via hard drives.

"Agh." He groaned. "Damn amateurs."

"Don't worry. As long as they believe we have the Box, they will try to neutralize our ship without destroying our engines." Daguza assured his partner.

"I find it hard to believe a single mobile suit can neutralize the ship."

Before the fighting broke out in Industrial 7, the ECOAS team had downloaded data on the staff and students of the Anaheim Electronics Industrial College. Knowing the close ties the Vist Foundation had to the school, even ignoring that Cardeas Vist was the chairman of it, they had suspicions of Vist Foundation members among the denizens of the school. Having been told that all the civilians aboard this ship belonged to that school including Audrey, looking at her student ID was an easy way to confirm their suspicions of her identity.

"There we go." Conroy said as he found the fake file Cardeas had forged on her.

Audrey Burne
Sex: Female Age: 16
Birthplace: Side 1, 003 Eden

Student Code: ALB05674293800

Department: Technology
Faculty: Resource Development

"Yup, definitely a fake. The photo doesn't even have her wearing the uniform. Probably just used the best shot a security camera gave him."

"Given the situation, Cardeas and the rest of the Vist Foundation most likely didn't have time to properly forge the ID. They probably planned on doing later." Daguza surmised. "At any rate, I'm certain who's attacking this ship is aware that Mineva is on it."

"We can escape if we go now." Audrey stated, she then slowly stood up. "We could head back to Industrial -UUUURRP- 7 with Micott and Takuya. You'll all sneak onto a cargo vessel and find some place to hide in one of the Sides. While you do that, I'll figure out some way to dispose of that machine. I'll contact -UUURAAP-!"

"Aud -URP- rey..." Banagher uttered. He then started the process of standing up. "What's been with you today?" He thought to himself. Just a few minutes she was laughing with him about dumb stuff like Marida burping over the intercom. Now she was reminding him of how distant she was when they first met. Before she ate that faithful hot dog.

"If we don't do it... That thing is just too dangerous. I can't let anyone get their hands on it."

"Now just wait a sec!" Now standing up, Banagher grabbed the Audrey's shoulders and got closer, their stomachs pressing together.

"No, I -UUURRAAP- will explain it to you -URAP- later!"

"If you won't tell me anything, then how can you expect me to agree -UUUUURAAP- with you? Stop trying to convince me by talking like this. It isn't fair." Those words Banagher spoke were enough to make Audrey's visibly surprised, it made her realize she hadn't considered Banagher's feelings at all when she came up with this plan, just his safety. "Audrey, what do you wanna do? Don't tell me what it is that you should do, your responsi -UUURRRP- bility. Tell me what it is that you want to do. If you do, I'll..."

Audrey looked down at her feet in guilt and uncertainty. Well, she tried to, her massive stomach completely blocked the sight of them. She racked her mind for the answer to what was the most difficult question she had ever been faced with. "... I want -UUUURRRP-!"

Before the Zabi heir could start again, the door suddenly slid open, revealing the intimidating sight of Daguza and Conroy in their ECOAS gear. Audrey moved away from Banagher in hopes he wouldn't get caught up in this. Conroy stood in front of Banagher to keep him away from Audrey without roughing him up. Daguza roughly grabbed Audrey by her soft shoulder and pulled her towards him.

"W-What are you-" Banagher said in protest as he tired to intervene but was kept back by Conroy.

"You know why I'm here." Daguza stated to Andrey, who just solemnly looked down in defeat. She silently went with him.

Banagher tried to follow her but was physically held back by Conroy.
