Skip to the end of the party
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
The group returned to the game, with Marida joining them, of course. She too was interested about video games, but unlike her little sister, which was a sense of childlike wonder, the redhead's was more out of curiosity as to what her little siblings were so interested in. Upon finishing the second Free Time event, Audrey figured now was a good time to try out a different game. Once asked what they should play next, Banagher, Takuya, Haro, and Micott had some difficulty coming up with an answer. Since this was her first time, they wanted her to play something she wouldn't lose at during her first session. Danganronpa fit the bill perfectly for that, but they didn't want her to play another visual novel just yet, as that might give her the wrong idea of what most video games are like. Given that her skills were, put bluntly, absolutely horrendous, there weren't many other games they were certain she could tackle yet. Even a Zelda or Mario game was dubious.

"Oh, hey, I've got an idea." Takuya was the one who came up with a game. He got up and waddled over to one of the boxes that held Banagher's games and started shuffling through "You know, we probably it, hoping it had the one specific game he was looking for. "You know, we probably should've set your room up before throwing a party in it."

"I know but I'm really not feeling up to it." Banagher explained.

"Sounds like someone-" Audrey was going to finish it with "a little lazy" but she realized just in time that would come off as making fun of Banagher's very justified fatigue. "Er, really tired."

"If you're still tired tomorrow, I could set it up for you." The ever dutiful Marida suggested.

"Thanks but I should do it myself. Besides, you don't where I'd like to put my stuff." Banagher replied.

"Found it!" Takuya said as he pulled his game of choice out. "This here's a little obscure gem called Fable 3. Well, pretty much every game's obscure to you, but anyways, it's got a lot of story to it, parts of the gameplay that don't involve fighting, and what does isn't too hard, and it's co-op, so Banagher'll be there to help."

"Question, what's 'co-op'?" Audrey asked, very clearly unaware of what was and wasn't common knowledge among gamers, which she was trying to consider herself one.

"It mean you play the game with someone."

"Isn't that what we're already doing?"

"Co-op is when you and someone else play the game at the same time."

"You can do that?!" A very excited Audrey said a sort of childlike wonder.

"We've REALLY got a lot to teach you." Micott commented.

"You forgot to mention you can make your character fat." Banagher pointed out, patting his chubby belly cheerfully for emphasis.

"Oh yeah. Can't believe I forgot that when we're all, you know." Takuya looked down at his stomach and jiggled it. He noted that it wasn't as giant ad Banagher's, but it was still pretty damn big, so he felt he had earned a few peaks from Micott.

"Why is that an option?" Marida asked.

"Because it's fun." Micott answered. Even Audrey knew that.

"If I'm understanding this right, you create your own character in this game, right?" Audrey asked s Takuya handed her the game case. Just to look at the art though, she had no idea how to put a game disc in a console yet.

"Yeah, though it works differently then most games." Banagher began. "Your character's appearance changes based on what you do."

"I never would've thought a video game could have a feature like that." The amazed princess said.

In a way, Fable 3 was the first proper video Audrey played, if one counted visual novels as something else, so it was fitting that it starred a princess. One who leads a rebellion against a tyrannous kingdom run by her own family no less. Upon starting the game and being asked to pick the gender of the hero, it was very clear that even this little bit of control she had over the game amazed her, which the others found endearing. After picking her outfit, going with the Elegant Princess outfit, a choice that didn't surprise anyone, she started exploring the castle courtyard at the very beginning of the game. She asked how she could make her hero gain weight, figuring her avatar should look a little more like her, and was disappointed when Micott told her there's no place to get food yet.

It was shortly after her first real battle, a swarm of bats that dealt very little damage but Banagher was there to help just in case, that Mihiro, Riddhe, and Shin walked in, each carrying a bunch of food.

"Hey, guys. Ready to eat? You must be starving, Banagher." Mihiro said as she and the others each put down their respective hauls, but when she looked at her fellow party members, she was very confused to see that Banagher was just as fat as ever. In fact, Mihiro was pretty sure he was even fatter! "Erm..."

"Did I do something wrong?" A confused Banagher asked.

"No, it's nothing like that. It's just that I thought being a prisoner would make you lose some weight." She felt she said that a little too harshly but she couldn't really think of another way. "You know, since you wouldn't be given a lot of food." She looked at the huge gut that filled up Banagher's lap, the result of many binges. It wasn't the only result either, there was also those man boobs that rested on it, that huge butt filled the chair in the Unicorn's cockpit, chunky and out-of-shape legs, and that adorable round and double-chinned face. Despite it all, he was still incredibly soft and jiggly, like he was never even gone.

"Marida took really good care of me." Smirking, Banagher rubbed his chubby belly as he thought back on all the tasty meals Marida stuffed him with.

"I made sure he never went hungry. He even won Best Eater." Marida complimented, obviously proud of her fat, little bro.

"Hey, we won that together."

Mihiro couldn't tell if Marida kidnapped him or adopted him.

Banagher's focus shifted to Shin. "Have we met? You look kinda familiar."

"Forgot you two don't know each other." Micott said.

"I'm Shin Matsunaga."

"Wait, you're the White Wolf? That Shin Matsunaga?"

"I didn't think I'd still be well-known among Federation citizens."

"I've played as you in games!' A starstruck Banagher said.

"You'll have to show me that game later." Audrey said.

"This feels so unreal, I'm surrounded by people I've seen in games and TV!" Banagher said.

"I knew you'd react like that." Micott commented, an amused look on her face. "You should've seen Takuya when they met. Pretty sure he pissed himself in excitement."

"I did not." Takuya whined.

"Audrey's told me a lot about you, Banagher." Shin started as she sat down in a chair next to the couch Marida was using. "She tells me you're everything she could ask for in a knight and more."

"Really? I'm glad I'm doing a good job. Wasn't expecting you to call me her knight."

"It was her words."

Banagher then looked at Audrey, who felt all eyes were on her. "I thought we were joking when we talking about how I'm your knight."

Audrey blushed. "I may have seriously called you my knight on one or two occasions."

"You should keep calling him that, it's cute." Mihiro commented as she smiled and took a seat with Riddhe on the couch Marida was using. While she said that, Takuya looked over at Micott, the brunette didn't show it but Takuya knew she wished she could call Banagher her knight.

"I'm not trying to be cute." Audrey pouted, her soft chubbiness make her look even cuter, especially the chubbiness of her face, a side effect of her weight gain she did not appreciate.

"It's been too long, Banagher. How are you holding up?" Riddhe asked in a friendly way, showing an equally friendly smile.

Banagher opened his mouth but for a moment, nothing came out. He REALLY wanted to say he was good as new, or something to that effect, but he couldn't bring himself to lie that much to his friends, even if it was for their sake. "I'm still kinda, you know out of it, but it's great to be back." He scratched the back of his head. "A-Anyways, how are we going to do the eating contest? Round-based like last time?"

"Nah." Takuya said through a mouthful of chips. Thankfully he finished chewing before he started to explain things, or else else Banagher, Audrey, and Marida wouldn't be able to understand him. "This time we're just going to see who can eat the most, works way better with a party this way. Same teams as before."

"Would you mind if I join in?" Marida asked, figuring her gut was big enough to fill up a whole team. Marida demolishes the competition with her gut

choices: Riddhe and Mihiro (unsurprisngly) drop out first
Skip to the aftermath of the eating contest
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Takuya grabbed the 8 pack of beer and pulled out two, one for himself and one for Micott. He handed her her beer but just as they were about to start drinking they suddenly found them yanked from their hands as Mihiro said "Give me that!" She glared at them like a mother would, a glare most people could instantly identify as that of a worried mother. They couldn't explain why, but somehow to Takuya and Micott, Mihiro's chubby body, which had a lot of weight go to her ass and legs, made her give off even more of a motherly feeling. "I can't believe you two."

"What's wrong?" Audrey asked.

"I caught these two trying to drink beer."

"What?!" Audrey instantly paused her game, which annoyed Banagher, and joined Mihiro in glaring at them, glaring that Marida joined in as well.

"Aw c'mon, it's a party." Micott defended herself and her pal. "Everyone does it."

"Not like we drink all the time." Takuya argued.

"You shouldn't be drinking at all." Mihiro was about to say that, but Audrey beat her to the punch.

"Not you too." Micott whined.

"You should've known whose side she'd take." Shin chuckled.

"Help me out here, Banagher. Maybe they'll listen to you." Audrey requested, using this as an excuse to pat Banagher's belly to get his attention.

Banagher didn't look too concerned. "it's not really a big deal." He casually said.

"Banagher!" Audrey glared daggers at him, daggers that were dulled by both how close they were, and how chubby her double-chinned face was.

"Relax, they're not even not even the heaviest drinkers at her parties." He noted that he probably shouldn't have used the term "heaviest".

"Don't tell me you've been at those parties." Marida asked.

"Well, yeah." He shrugged.

"I can't believe you." Audrey chided, she didn't yell but her disappointment was conveyed just as well as if she had.

"Banagher, you have a problem,"The way Marida said that reminded Banagher of his mom. Sometimes he forgot Marida was only eighteen. "And we're going to help you through this. the first step is-"

"Woah, woah! You guys completely have the wrong idea." Micott interpreted. "Banagher is like, the only person at my parties who doesn't drink or smoke."

"Yeah, he's completely straight-edge, and I don't get how you thought for even a second that a guy like him would even touch the stuff." Takuya had trouble even imagining Banagher doing any sort of drugs or alcohol. Well, maybe wine but that would solely be when he's an adult, and only because Audrey was drinking it too.

"Oh." An embarrassed Audrey said. "Sorry, I should've known you were "hard-edged."

"Straight edge." Takuya corrected.

"I'm sorry too." Marida said. "I could cook you some pasta as an apology if you want."

"Sheesh, no wonder Banagher's fatter then ever." Takuya said as he looked at Banagher's massive belly, the jiggly orb filling up his lap and then some.

"It's fine, no worries. Let just get back to the game." Banagher said, with is trademark reassuring grin, a grin that allowed Audrey to grin too.

"Right, we still have to find the relic." Audrey said.

"But do you want me to make any pasta?" Marida asked.

As Banagher told her she didn't have to, Mihiro elbowed Riddhe in the gut, making it jiggle. "You should've said something, this was a serious conversation."

"Since when do I have to be a part of every conversation?"

The partygoers ate like there was no tomorrow, which was a pretty good attitude to have for a party. Whether it was sweets like ice cream or fast food like hamburgers, it all went into their growing bellies. They could all feel their bellies swelling up, getting bigger and fuller, pressing more against the waistband of their pants. Or short shorts, in Micott's case. If someone just met them and saw them like this, they'd think their stomachs had never seen a single skinny day in their life. Micott and Takuya were mainly eating classic junk food like potato chips and the like, along with some burgers and pizza. They drank plenty of soda, no party was complete without it.

Audrey and Banagher were enjoying a similar diet, but without the chicken. Looking to rectify that, Banagher said "Hey, Taku -URP- ya, can you pass the chicken?"

"Sure, no problem. BUUURRP!" He said and belched as he handed over a bucket of chicken, which he correctly assumed Banagher wanted instead of the nuggets. His stomach was looking swollen and was pressing against the waistband of his belt even more hone usual.

"Heh, good one." Banagher pulled out a drumstick and starting eating it, earning a curious look from Audrey. Which he had long learned by now wasn't hard to earn.

"What's that?" The princess asked.

"Hmm?" Banagher swallowed and then charmingly burped. "It's chicken."

"I've never seen chicken like that before. It looks like a weapon, like some kind of mace"

Banagher chuckled. "Guess it kinda does. It's called drumstick chicken. You wanna try it?"

"Sure."Audrey paused their game and was handed two drumsticks by Banagher. She looked at them hesitatingly, they were easily the most bizarre looking food she had even seen. Granted, she knew was naive in that department, but she still felt her opinion counted for something. She slowly took a bite, partly because she was unsure about eating it and partly because it was a lot harder to chew then she thought. And then just like that, she did a complete 180.

Audrey's face lit up and she started ferociously taking bits out of her chicken, alternating between each one. The speed was eating at was incredible, it actually impressed Banagher and the others. This was almost the most enthusiastic anyone had seen her over food. The others had trouble saying anything as they saw her chew and chew, stripping pieces off of her drumsticks with a truly ravenous appetite. It was like she was going too fast to even enjoy the taste, though she certainly was enjoying it, and that was exactly like she was being such an eating machine. Crumbs were getting all over her lips and cheeks, and the normally very polite princess didn't seem to give a damn. The speed at which she was eating was even greater then that of some professional eaters. Banagher couldn't say way, but for some reason this was really hot. if he wasn't so amazed he would be cheering her on to eat the entire bucket.

"Good God, Audrey, slow -UURP- down! You're going to eat yourself sick!"

Those concerned words from Mihiro snapped Audrey out of her gluttonous stupor. She needed a second to process what she had done, and when she did, her chubby cheeks grew scarlet. "Sorry! BBBBUUUURRRP! Excuse me." She looked at how much of the drumsticks she had eaten, which was a lot, and then down at her huge tummy, past her plentiful tits. It was definitely more swollen then before, if her pants and coat still had their buttons her little eating frenzy would've definitely popped them off.

"Aw, let her -BURP- enjoy herself." Riddhe placed a soft hand on Mihiro's soft shoulder. "It's what partying is all about."

"Yeah, and besides, that was really awesome." Banagher said, his grin showed how impressed he was by his friend's gluttony.

"R-Really?" Audrey asked, her chubby face looked pleased to hear that.

"Yeah, I've never seen a girl go to town on chicken like that before." Banagher said, unknowingly making Micott jealous.

"Were your father here he'd say you can eat even more then he can." Shin's lips formed a nostalgic smirk. "Without realizing that you could take offense to that, of course."

"You've truly got an appetite -BWWOORP- to match Banagher's." Marida said before she resumed digging into her ice cream. She thought on how adorable they must look at dinner dates, just completely demolishing all the food in site as a couple, and then giving each other sweet belly rubs after.

"Man, I knew you were good, Audrey, -BUURRARP- but not that good!" An amazed Takuya said.

"You do know that means we're losing, -BOOOORRP-, right?" Micott pointed out.

"Oh, whoops."

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Once Audrey and Banagher completed the first real quest of Fable 3 and had earned themselves some pocket change, it was time for them to use the long awaited weight gain system. Three times Audrey had asked Banagher if they could make their characters fat yet. The first was naturally at the start of the game, the second was when they entered the Dweller Camp (which turned out to be a a bit inappropriate, as she learned literally seconds later the people living in it were suffering from starvation), and the final time was upon arriving at Brightwall. But now it was time. When they headed to the food stalls Banagher said "Let's plump them up." but Audrey surprisingly suggested they don't have their Heroes reach obesity yet. Instead she proposed that they only have them gain a little weight for now, saying that it would be more interesting to have them slowly gain weight during the story, you know, much like they had themselves. Banagher said it was a good idea and Riddhe teased that Audrey is really putting a lot of thought into how she and Banagher are going to make their characters fat.

Shortly after their Heroes had their first binge, and demonstrated their belching prowess, Audrey and Banagher decided to switch to a new game. Both to switch hings up and because Micott and Takuya complained about how they wanted to play. Speaking of switching, they went with Super Smash Brothers. Banagher wasn't sure about that, Audrey's reaction times were still abysmal, and not only was Smash Bros a fast game but now she would be going up against other players. Micott was able to convince him saying they'll all just play against the CPU. It was a fun experience for them all but Audrey wasn't much help. She enjoyed herself but she was clearly rather overwhelmed and not able to do much. She wished she was able to help more but the others reminded her that the point was to have fun, which she was.

It was when they were playing this game that they became noticeably bloated, making their respective performances more sluggish.

"Ooof. BUUUURRP!" Takuya removed one hand from his controller to place on his belly and massage it, his belt was very close to breaking.

Banagher and Micott burped loudly as their bellies gurgled, stilling holding their controllers. The male brunette was glad his button and belt had been popped beforehand, it made being this bloated way more comfortable, while the female brunette was on the verge of popping the button on her short shorts. On the other couch Marida was seen still shoveling loads of ice cream into her mouth with one hand and rubbed her gut with the other, already the lower parts of her top were starting to part as her swelling belly pushed them apart. She was both the one who had eaten the most food so far and the one who was the least full, she was completely correct in thinking she could eat enough to make up for her lack of a partner. Riddhe and Mihiro next to her had first class seats to all her gorging and belching. It both impressed them and made it clear how completely outclassed they were by her.

Speaking of Riddhe and Mihiro, they had to take a complete break from eating to give their tummies some much needed rubs. "OOOORRRP! I'm going to put on so much weight from this." Mihiro said as she looked down at her big belly, her uniform's belt was visibly straining. "How much bigger is this thing going to get?" She thought.

"No regrets though, -UUURRAAP- right?" Riddhe said, his belt in the same state.

"None at -BUURRP- all. For me at least, my waistline -BURP- has plenty.

"Hey, Banagher? BUUURRRUURP!" Audrey belched, still holding her controller with both hands despite her belly asking for rub, she simply wanted to play that much. Like Banagher, she was very swollen and very glad she had already popped off all her buttons. Though she wished she had popped them here, where she could impress her friends. "What does the B button do again?"

Banagher burped again. "The B button makes you -BUUURRRRP-!"

"The B button makes you burp?" Audrey blinked.

"No, the B button makes you -OOORARRRP-! It makes you -URRRRRRRP-! It makes you -BURURRRARP-!"

Audrey tilted her head.

"Dammit! BUURRP! This is so -URRRAARRP- annoying! BUUURRURP! Where's the off button on this thing?"

"What thing?"

"My belly! BUUUUURRRP!"

Their already bloated stomachs grew even larger as they kept eating and eating. It was pretty amazing how much Audrey, Banagher, Micott, and Takuya were able to eat while gaming, having no problem at all keeping up with the others. Everyone's eating speed was starting to slow down and they found themselves having to take more breaks, Mihiro in particular. With how much bigger their already bloated bellies were getting as they kept on eating and eating, it didn't take long for the buttons to start flying.

The partygoers ate like there was no tomorrow, which was a pretty good attitude to have for a party. Whether it was sweets like ice cream or fast food like hamburgers, it all went into their growing bellies. They could all feel their bellies swelling up, getting bigger and fuller, pressing more against the waistband of their pants. Or short shorts, in Micott's case. If someone just met them and saw them like this, they'd think their stomachs had never seen a single skinny day in their life. Micott and Takuya were mainly eating classic junk food like potato chips and the like, along with some burgers and pizza. They drank plenty of soda, no party was complete without it.

The one on Micott's short shorts was the first one to go, blasted off her big, gurgling tummy, exposing some of her underwear. Micott's only response was to belch loudly for the umpteenth time as she looked down at her gut, but in a pleasant surprise, she actually got a response from Banagher. He gave her a thumbs up and said that pretty good, that she really sent that thing flying. Micott thanked him and couldn't stop herself from having a huge smile that her chubby cheeks and double chin made even cuter. Takuya teased her on how Banagher always brings out her biggest smiles, which made her pout at him.

Takuya's belt and pants button went next, not long after Micott's button. It happened right after he ate another big handful of chips, finishing his fifth bag of them, and downed it with more soda. He sighed in relief as his tummy bugled forward. The freckled brunette took it as a sign he and Micott were making good progress in the contest. He was also pleased to see that Micott was currently looking at this gut, impressed with it, but before either of them said something, Banagher took the opportunity to get a little friendly payback at him over what he said about his inability to wear a belt. Though Takuya shot back (after burping) that he had to stuff himself to break his belt, Banagher didn't.

"Yeah... Well..." That was Banagher's weak comeback as he adorably pouted.

A little smirk on her face, Audrey placed a hand on her pal's gut and stroked it. "He's got you there, Bana -OOORRRP- gher."

His response was to burp as he kept pouting, which Audrey though was incredibly cute. She couldn't help it, she just had to pinch those puffy creeks. "Marida is right, you are a puppy."

And finally, Riddhe and Mihiro's belts were snapped in half. Riddhe's went first, not surprising since he was the better eater of the two. When it did, he sighed in relief, he and Mihiro already were nearly at their limits, and pat it, then went right back to eating, unaware of Mihiro staring at his tummy. "To think he used to be skinny just a week ago. I don't get how he can be so nonchalant about it... and why am I still looking at it?"

"You -UUUUURRP- need something?" Riddhe casually said.

"H -URP- Huh?"

"You're staring at me like you want something."

"I-I wasn't staring! UUUUURRP!' Mihiro quickly turned her red face away from started shoveling cookies into her mouth as fast as she could.

Riddhe stared at her in confusion for a few seconds before he shrugged his shoulders. "Well, okay then."

Ten minutes later was when Mihiro's belt broke. She leaned back in defeat, moaning with her hands on her gut. "That's it. BUUUURRRP! I can't eat any -BUUURRP- more, I'll explode." She moaned again as she slowly rubbed her beach ball of a gut with both hands, desperate to sooth it.

Riddhe was in a similar sate as her, not feeling quite as defeated but definitely feeling just as stuffed. He too was leaning back and rubbing his belly."OOOORRRP! Whew, I was hoping -UUURRRRARP- we wouldn't come in last place again."

"At least that means we'll gain the least weight out of -BURP- everyone."
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.title: Two Time Last Place Losers

choices: Marida wins her third Best Eater title
The power of love outeats Marida
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Thirty minutes later and right after their latest match, Takuya put his controller down and leaned back, hands on his swollen gut as he sighed. "I think I'm too -UURRAARRP- stuffed for more Smash."

The other three immediately followed suit. "Oof, yeah, me too BUUURRP!" Micott groaned as she rubbed her belly. The she and friends were right next to each other with their bellies bulging out almost made it look they were a group of giant Haros sitting side by side. Haro actually sitting next to Banagher helped the comparison. "Let's switch to some -URP- thing a little slower."

"Like what?" Audrey said before she burped again in an unladylike manner. It was certainly unbecoming of a princess.

Banagher licked some ice cream off his lips. "Hmm... How about Pokemon? BOOOORRRP!"

Takuya burped. "Oh yeah! BURRRP!We've still got an extra copy of Pokemon Shield, right? I'll go get it." Grunting, Takuya heaved himself with all his might, and even then it still took a few seconds for him to get up. Not that anyone blamed him for having trouble with that while he was still so incredibly bloated. When was able to launch himself off the couch, he landed a good foot away with an "Oof.". Cradling his belly, he slowly lumbered along to one of the boxes, letting out a groan or a belch here and there looking like he was about to fall over any second now and take forever to get back up.

"You -URP- want me to get it?" A concerned Mihiro asked.

"No, no, that's fine. You just stay there and digest."

"In that case, I'll get it. I'm not bloated." Shin was correct, he was the only one in the room who hadn't overeaten, not counting Haro for obvious reasons.

"You don't even know what it looks like. UURRRRP!" Takuya was partly correct. While it would take a little longer for someone who isn't familiar with the box art to pick out, the giant, colorful letters reading "Pokemon Shield" would be more then enough of a hint for even Audrey. However, he was way too stuffed to the gills to realize that. Plus he really didn't want these painful step that made his belly slosh and jiggle to be in vain. When he got over to the box, he took a small break before she bent over and rummaged around in it, unaware that Micott had been paying great attention to his massive ass, as she had been since he started slowly waddling to the box, each step making his legs and butt jostle.

He wasn't excited when he saw that the game was at the very bottom of the box, but still, he had to grab it. Bending over a little, the squishing did not help with the rumblings in his gut, and picked it up. "Got it! OOORRRARP!" He said as he grabbed, standing up as quickly as he could in his bloated condition.

"Great, please bring it over here." Audrey requested.

"R-Right." As much as he didn't want to, Takuya started slowly lumbering back to the couch, it was just as uncomfortable as it was last time. In fact, it was actually felt worse, since this time it was adding discomfort onto discomfort.

"You can do it, Takuya! You can do it!" Haro cheered.

"Do you -OOOORRRRP- want me to help?" Marida asked after gulping down another mouthful of ice cream. She shoveled another one into her greedy mouth right after she said that.

"No thanks. UUURRAARP! I'm fine." Takuya said, wobbling even slower then he was the first time. When he finally reached the couch, he ungracefully flopped down onto it, his soft and plentiful tummy and moobs jostling. He let out a big sigh of relief, he reminded Banagher of how he and Marida looked that one time they jogged to the Bistro Gleissner. "Here you go." The poor guy said.

"You're gonna have to put it in the Switch, you know."

Takuya did not look amused. "... You do it."

When Micott did it and the game started up, Audrey was clearly blown away by the graphics. Compared to the good but outdated graphics of Fable 3, the stylized drawings of Danganronpa, the mix of realism and carton that was Super Smash Brothers' art style, Pokemon Shield's incredibly colorful graphics were something she had never seen. And when she saw the Dynamax feature in the opening, after only just comprehending the basic idea of the game, she was truly amazed. If one was to only look at her chunky face with zero context, they'd think she was watching a fireworks show. When it was time for Audrey to pick her starter, she went with Scorbunny, whom she took a liking to as soon as she saw her. Of course, she liked all three, but Scorbunny was the one she could look and immediately pick. In terms of appearance, she went well with Banagher's Sobble. Takuya had a Grooky while Micott also picked Sobble, though hers was a girl, unlike Banagher's.

As they played, Riddhe, who had noticed a while ago how much of a big eater Marida was for ice cream, asked her about it. "I see you're a big fan of ice cream."

Marida had just finished her latest bowl. She let her spoon drop into. She wiped off the splotches of ice cream that was on her lips and cherubic cheeks, and then belched loudly "BUUUUURRRP! Excuse me. It's my favorite." here, she looked a little embarrassed, a bit of a blush to her puffy cheeks. "Though I'm sure you could tell, since, well..." Rather then finish that sentence, she choose to look down at the piles of empty bowls and give her giant, stuffed gut a few pats before belching loudly. "UUUURRRRRRRP!"

She wasn't exaggerating when said you could tell just from the bowls that ice cream was her favorite. On the coffee table in front of her couch, there was five piles of empty bowls, each pile had at least three bowls, most of them had more. It was like that gag in cartoons where a character would be shown with a huge pile of empty plates after an enormous meal, but this was real. Before today Riddhe didn't think it was possible to impress him with eating prowers anymore, after all he had spent nearly a week living with Audrey, but Marida was here to prove him wrong.

"That's pretty impress -URRRRRP- ive. As you can see," Riddhe gave a light slap to his stomach, jiggling it. "URRRRRRP! I can't eat nearly as much."

Marida looked a little surprised, she wasn't expecting her ability to gorge herself to impress anyone but Audrey and Banagher. Her surprise and embarrassment then left her visage, returning to her normal, stoic but fat look. "You may have come in last place but you ate much more then -URP- most people can. That's an achievement."

"Thanks. So is this the first time you've been in an eating contest?"

"Yes, though I've won Best Eater at two different places."

"Jeez, I used to think Audrey -BWWAAARP- and Banagher had this in the bag but now I'm not sure." Mihiro commented as she massaged her aching tummy.

Audrey wanted to complete the Pokedex but that wasn't the main reason she was catching every new Pokemon she came across, it was because each new one she found instantly interested her. The first one she caught was Wooloo, who she loved because he was sweet, round, and fluffy, just like Banagher. Banagher was about to tell her about the evolution feature but Takuya stopped him and told him they shouldn't spoil it for her, so she'll be surprised when it happens.

Her most notable capture was Stufful, not because of the Pokemon himself but because how capturing it went. At level 13, it was higher then most of her Pokemon but still manageable. Once she got his health into the red, she threw a Pokeball at him, only for him to break free. So threw another at him, which he also broke free of. She threw it again, and again, and again. When she asked the others what she was doing wrong, they couldn't explain why, she did everything wrong, it just looked like she was having bad luck. She kept on throwing Pokeballs, even as most of her Pokemons' health got low. Takuya suggested leaving and coming back to Stufful but Audrey immediately shot that down after she burped again, saying he was too cute to wait on. Thankfully her persistence eventually paid off.

After that it was a good time for her to try out the camping feature. Again Audrey's chubby face lit up as she played with her Pokemon, though you could argue it was lit the entire time she was playing. She was truly just as full of joy as she was food and soda as she played with her Pokemon. When she tried cooking curry Audrey looked interested in it. "What's that?"

"It's curry. I used to make it all the time during camping trips with my family." Takuya explained.

"Mmm. Looks delicious." Audrey said.

"You're still hungry?" Micott said before eating a huge handful of pretzel.

"Well, um, I prefer the term curious." Audrey said as she ruffled a bit of her hair.

Shortly after that, while Audrey was preparing more curry, Takuya let out a massive belch, easily his biggest that whole night. "BWWWAARRRP! Alright, I'm stuffed. I've gotta drop out before I explode." He pat his tummy in a satisfied fashion.

"I can still -BURRRRRP- I'm still in the game." Micott forced more pretzels into her mouth, she then grunted as her tummy gurgled loudly. She took a break from eating to rub it, she could feel it gurgle. "Ah, forget it. Third place ain't bad when it's up against you two gluttons."

"G -BUUURRRP- Glutton?" Audrey blushed, placing a hand on her soft tummy as she looked down at it. She still couldn't even see her feet. "I'm not a glutton, right, Banagher?"

"Uh, I'm just going to sit here and belch. Uh... belch."

While everyone was still chatting like normal, and Audrey wasn't done with Pokemon yet, the eating contest was starting to become as entertaining as a good show or video game. So it was natural that they would discuss it.

"So who -URP- do you guys think is gonna win?" Takuya asked, he and Micott were still massaging their gurgling stomachs. "My money's on Banagher and Audrey. I mean, just look at them -BUURRRRP- eat."

"Yeah but Marida is way bigger. BUUURP! Err, no offense." Riddhe said, he and Mihiro tending to their own bellies. Out of all of them, Mihiro seemed to be handling her stomachache the worst.

"None -BWAAAP- taken. it's not like you said was untrue." Marida finished another bowl of ice cream, then immediately began scooping chocolate ice cream out of it's cartoon and placed the scoops into the large bowl. Belching, she rubbed her now completely exposed stomach with one hand as she did the scooping with the other. "if anything, it's a compliment in this context, since having the bigger belly is my key to -UUUURRAARP- victory." Showing a rare, small competitive smirk, she gave her gut a proud slap, she belched again as it jiggled, the jiggling emphasizing her point further. Even as packed full as she was, the Puru's stomach still had plenty of jiggle to it.

"Haven't seen you this pumped up -UUUURRRP- since we won Best Eater at the parlor." Banagher commented, looking at the way her tummy jostled and swayed from the impact of her pudgy palm.

"I don't think you even get like this -BEEEELLCH- when you're in a battle." Audrey said, also looking at Marida's jiggles as she chowed down on a hamburger. Saying theta reminded her of how much trouble Marida has when she tires to zip up her normal suit.

"Yeah, BURARARP! But you're both pretty pumped too." Micott commented, rubbing her underbelly. "And it's two on one. ORARP!"

"I can't believe I'm actually engaging in this discussion, but that's a moot point. UURRRAARR!" Mihiro said as she tenderly rubbed the middle of her gut with both hands. "Marida is as big as the two of them combined."

Marida gulped down another spoonful of ice cream. "Actually, that's not true. I'm not THAT big."

Takuya casually burped. "So that just leaves Haro and Shin."

"I have faith in the princess and Banagher." Shin answered as he fondly looked on at them as they kept pigging out and gaming.

"Me too! Me too!" Haro said as he excitedly started bouncing on Banagher's big belly, each bounce forcing a burp out of the poor guy.

"Oof! BURP! Haro, -URRRRRP- watch the -BOOORRP- belly! UUURRRRP!" He groaned.

Audrey giggled at this, though said giggling was quickly interrupted by a startled belch she let out once Haro decided to start bouncing on her huge belly instead.

Even though they were already so full, it took way longer then one would think for them to start slowing down. Whether it was ice cream, cake, chips, pretzels, cookies, hot dogs, burgers, or whatever, they just keep on shoveling more of it into their mouths, their bellies growing with every gulp. While Marida and Banagher were sitting normally, with their massive bellies past their laps, Audrey was sitting with her legs crossed, which meant the sides of her gut were touching her legs. Banagher thought she looked pretty cute like that.

At one point Banagher grunted and ten burped loudly as he rubbed his stomach, his round face showing some exhaustion. "Oof. BBBUURRRP! Ahhh..."

"You okay?" A concerned Audrey asked, taking a quick break from her gorging to check up on him. She saw that his belly was nearly as large as it was when they finished their "reunion binge" (as they liked to call it), which is to say it was nearly the most bloated Audrey have ever seen it.

"Y-Yeah, I'm -URP- fine." Banagher said before he resumed eating a bag of chips. "How about you?" He said through a mouthful, Audrey barely able to understand what he was saying.

"Please don't talk with your mouthful." Audrey then burped into her fist. "And I'm fine too, thank you for asking." She looked down at her gut, seeing that it too was starting to reach the size it had at the end of the reunion binge. "Though I think I'm going to need some belly rubs to get through this." Smirking, she grabbed Banagher's pudgy hand, she nearly dropped it out of surprise (having never touched a salt covered hand before), and led it over to the top of her belly.

"Heh, I'll be happy to oblige. Though I'm gonna need some too." Smirking as well, his had more emphasis from his chubby cheeks, Banagher did the same with Audrey's hand, a hand which still wasn't used to the feeling of a salt covered one.

Still smirking, they looked each other in the eyes before they closed them and simultaneously unleashed a massive belch, one big enough to make their bellies jiggle. "BUUUUUUUURRRRP!" When their five seconds long gaseous eruption ended, they let out a bellyful (no pun intended) laugh, Banagher's cheeks and Audrey's boobs jiggling along with their tummies. Still smirking, they looked each other in the eyes before they closed them and simultaneously unleashed a massive belch, one big enough to make their bellies jiggle. "BUUUUUUUURRRRP!" When their five seconds long gaseous eruption ended and Banagher saw Audrey's emerald green eyes as she saw his chocolate brown eyes, they let out a bellyful (no pun intended) laugh, Banagher's cheeks and Audrey's boobs jiggling along with their tummies.

The belly rubs really helped but as much as they did, Audrey ten minutes later could feel herself reaching her limit, and looking at Banagher told her that he was too. Looking at Marida told her a different story though, she looked stuffed but ready for more. She had to keep massaging her big gut, which let out some gurgles here and there, often announcing a belch was coming up, but her fat, double chinned face showed no signs of fatigue. Audrey never would've thought gluttony could look intimidating but here she was.

That was when she got an idea, and her face showed that instead of fatigue. She whispered something to Banagher, who looked interested. "You sure that will work?" He asked.

"It works in porker-I mean poker." Was her answer.

Marida heard that and while a bit curious about it, she simply decided to not interject herself into that conversation. It was obviously private if Audrey whispered most of it.

The two suddenly stopped whispering amongst themselves, then shifted their blubbery bodies back to face the table filled with food. Marida couldn't help but notice the glances one would shoot the other as they slowly ate around a cupcake or a burger.

When Marida was casually talking with Riddhe, she found their conversation to be interrupted by the unmistakable sounds of cheerful giggling. She and the blond stopped talking and looked at the source of said giggling, which was Audrey and Banagher, who Marida expected to be the source. Almost as soon as they looked t them, the chubby couple forced themselves to stop giggling. With that oddity seemingly over, Marida and Riddhe returned to their chat.

Of course, that was far from the last time Marida or Riddhe caught them doing something suspicious. Every now and then Marida would have to take a break form eating to look at her little siblings, who would immediately stop whatever they were doing, be it mischievous giggling or equally mischievous whispering. One time when Marida caught them they opted to distract her with some belching. Which they probably needed to do anyways.

Even as all three bellies grew even more bloated, the giggling didn't cease, if anything, it seemed to become even more common. Each bout of giggling or whispering made Marida even more curious, it was very clearly related to her somehow, and most likely the eating contest too, but what could you say about an eating contest that's so important you'd want it secret? How do you strategize an eating contest?

Soon Marida had to take a break from eating. She let he spoon drop into her bowl of ice cream and immediately leaned back into the couch. She unleashed a mighty "BUUUUURRRAAARRRP!"as she massaged her blubbery belly with both hands, letting out a few more burps. here, she heard Audrey and Banagher giggling again, but this time when she looked at them, they weren't able to contain it. "Alright, -OOOORRRRP- what are you two plotting?" Marida asked.

"Looks like you caught us. UUUUURRRRP!" Banagher said, he and Audrey were still grinning. "It was a good plan, Audrey. Guess we got -BWWWAARP- a little too enthusiastic."

"BURRAPPP! Ah... haha... yeah, but it was so much fun, I couldn't stop giggling!" His bloated partner in crime said as each give the other a soothing belly rub.

"What plan?" Marida asked.

"When we saw how you kept eating without looking at all tired while we were running out of energy, we actually considered giving up." Audrey began. "But that gave me an idea, what if the roles were reversed? What if we looked like we could eat far more then you? So we hid how tired we were and made you believe that we ready for five more courses." She then placed her free hand on her very bloated tummy. "Of course, that didn't really work out. UUUURRRRP! Oof..."

Marida showed a small smile on her double-chinned face. "Well, that's the quite the impressive plan you come up with. It's -BEEEELLCH- a good thing I caught you when I did. I'm not sure how much more ice cream my stomach could've handled." here she gave a few pats to her orb-shaped middle. "BUUUUURRRRRRP!"

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
It took Marida a second to process that someone had come with this in-depth a strategy for something as mundane, some (including Audrey just a week ago) would say undignified, as an eating contest. But when she did process it, she laughed. It wasn't a hard laugh, but it was enough to her belly and chubby cheeks jiggle and jostle, which made another burp bubble up. "Well, that's quite the impressive plan you come up with. BEEEELLCH! I didn't think it was possible to strategize an eating contest but you two never fail to impress." Those words filled her little siblings with a warm feeling. "I think you've earned some victory belly rubs." Micott hoped they would accept, she'd feel less jealous if it was Banagher's big sister doing it, and not his obvious girlfriend.

"'Victory -BOOORRRPP- belly rubs'? Seriously, Marida?" A cheeky (literally and figuratively) Banagher teased, he and Audrey chuckling.

"UUURRAARP! That's something I'd expect from you, Banagher." Audrey said in a friendly teasing sort of way. "We'd like that, but can you actually stand up?"

Marida answered her question by trying to get up but that was less successful then it usually was after a good meal, even with her trying to use the chair itself as support. The poor woman was so full she could hear gut sloshing as she tried to push herself up. She could only try for ten seconds, which she spent red in the face and grunting, before plopping back down. She considered herself and the chair lucky that she didn't demolish the poor thing with her massive behind. She rested her hands on the top of her orb-shaped middle and resumed rubbing it. "I can't. UUUUUUURRP!"

"Don't worry about it, it's not like we can get up either." Banagher assured.

"We don't even have to try to know that." Audrey said as she looked down at her gut and rubbed it.

"Hey, can any -BURURRRRRP- of us besides Shin stand up?" Riddhe asked aloud. No one answered.

The party slowed down after that, and how could it not when every single member of it besides Shin was absolutely stuffed to the brim? There was still plenty of gaming between the four Anaheim Electronics student but they had to stick with Pokemon, anything else (except Fable and Danganronpa) was too fast-paced for them when they were so bloated and sluggish. And for Audrey even when she wasn't.

Slowly it got harder and harder to stay awake, the massive amount of food they had eaten putting them on the edge of a food coma, being pinned to their seats by their giant bellies also made it harder to stay awake, and then there was the belly rubs Audrey and Banagher and Micott and Takuya gave each other. All of them dozed off at least once, only to be quickly awoken by someone sitting near them. The first one to doze off was (unsurprisingly) Banagher, who was woken via a playful belly slap from Audrey, who knew he fell asleep the second she felt his hand stop moving over her tummy. He wasn't the only one woken up like that. Riddhe, the second one to doze off, was awoken the same way by Mihiro. He later got a little revenge by waking Mihiro up the same way when she dozed off.

Except for Shin (and Haro), Marida was the only one who never dozed off. In fact, she didn't even seem sleepy, and the others couldn't tell if she just didn't let her drowsiness show or if she simply wasn't drowsy at all. She was definitely full though, no doubt about that.

"Hey," Takuya paused to let out a big yawn. "What time is it?"

Mihiro was the one to answer his question. "It's -UURRAARP- 1:13."

Before she said something, Audrey had to belt out yet another loud, unladylike burp. "Wow, we're really -URRRRRRRR- staying up late." She said with a hint of pride. Unfortunately for her, she was the only one.

"It's not that late." Takuya said.

"It's not?"

"Nah, we stay up later even -BOUUURRRP- on school nights." Micott added.

"Oh." Audrey said, trying to hide her disappointment. She didn't sound disappointed but in this context, a simple "Oh" told them she was disappointed.

"But Hey," Banagher suddenly threw his arm around Audrey and pulled her closer, their chubby bellies touching. Audrey was a little startled by this, and visibly so. "UUUUUUURRRRRAP!" Banagher burped loudly with a goofy grin before he actually said what he wanted to. "All things considered this is pretty late for your first party. Princess aren't known for staying up late, -BURRP- you know."

"Or for b -UUUUUUUUURRRP- ing." Micott added, smirking.

"OOOOOOUUURP! Or for out-eating adults nearly twice their weight." Takuya also added, he too was smirking.

"Well, we mainly won because of our plan, but yes, I suppose I am doing pretty good for my first party." Audrey said, the sound of pride returning to her voice as she gave her tummy a few pats. She then burped loudly on purpose for emphasis. "BUUUURRRAAARP!"

"Excuse you, Audrey! Excuse you!" Haro sarcastically yet cheerfully as always said, resting right next to Banagher.

It was two hours later when it as finally time for everyone to turn in, which filled Audrey with two hours worth of pride in staying up so late. Staying up this late while being incredibly bloated was hard enough, no one was even sure how they managed to stay up like this, but getting up and waddling to your room, your body jiggling all over the place the whole time, was even harder.

"Would -UUURRRP- you guys mind if I just slept on the couch?" Riddhe said as he rubbed the lower half of his big belly. "Ow!" He jolted, as Mihiro had just pinched his belly.

"After stuffing our faces like that, -URRRRRP- being lazy is the last thing we should do." She said, looking a little annoyed.

"But I can't get up."

"If I can get up, then you can too."

"Well, can you?"

"Of course I can." Getting up wasn't quite as motivating as Mihiro wished it was. She slowly heaved herself up, visibly and audibly struggling. The others stared at her in curiosity if she would actually pull it off, and the answer was given in the form of having to plant her impressive ass back down in the couch. The others returned to focus to whatever they were looking at before, mainly to spare Mihiro the shame. Except for Riddhe, who was about to say something when Mihiro stopped him. "I'm -BUUUURRRP- not done yet!" True to her words, she tried again and was succeeded. After fifteen seconds. "There, -huff- you see that?" She said to Riddhe. "If I can do it then you've excuse."

"Fair enough." Riddhe supposed. "But since you're already up, you think you could give me a hand?"

Mihiro rolled her eyes but the officer obliged. "Sure." Riddhe reached out and she grabbed his soft hand. Trying to get him almost felt like lifting weights, which Mihiro planned on doing tomorrow. It was a big (no pun intended) struggle for both of them. When he was finally up, the force ended up making him slam his big gut right into Mihiro's causing plenty of jiggling and blushing from the duo.

"We... -BOORRP- really needed to work out." Mihiro ruefully said as she looked down at their swollen, jiggly bellies.

"Definitely. UUUURRRRP!" Riddhe said, giving his middle a poke, it was hard but with several layers of soft adipose.

Before wobbling out of the room, Mihiro looked at Micott and Takuya. "You two need any help getting -URP- up?"

"Nah, we'll be sleeping over." Micott answered as Takuya belched.

"You are?" A confused princess asked.

"Didn't we tell you?" Takuya said. "Guess we forgot but you guys don't mind, right?"

"Well, no, but where are you going to sleep?"

"The couches, obviously." Micott said.

"You're -BURRP- fine with sleeping on a couch?" Audrey sounded as if she were speaking with a group of savages.

"Hey, it happens at parties." Takuya causally said, further making Audrey feel like she was talking to barbarians.

After Riddhe and Mihiro waddled out with as much grace as they could muster, which was not much, Shin looked at Marida, who was as bloated as ever, and saw that she was in need of assistance. He found it a little funny, he had been briefed on her before the attack on Palau, heard how many skilled Federation soldiers she had killed on her own, including a veteran of the Second Neo-Zeon War, yet here she was, fat and defeated by her own stomach. It was rather endearing to him. "You need any help, Marida?"

"BUUUUURRRRP! A -BURRRP- Actually I think I'll be staying here too." She answered before burping again as she massaged her belly.

Banagher then burped right after her. Hearing her belt out a big one like that just made him want to burp with her. "But we've only got two couches."

"I don't mind sleeping here. BWAAARP! And, I, uh, don't know if it's actually possible for any of you pull me up until I digest."

Shin chuckled. "Then all see you all tommrow." Shin got up but before he left, he walked over to the bloated princess and gave her an affectionate pat on the head, smiling softly at her. "Good night, Audrey."

"Good night, Shin. BUUUUOOOORRP! Excuse me." A bit of a blush appeared on Audrey's smiling face. For some reason belching while talking to Shin felt different then when it was with her other companions.

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
It was annoying how only one person could use the bathroom to get changed, which could mean it would take a while for it to be your turn to get dressed. It didn't help that getting changed could take some time when you were as bloated as these four, both because their pajamas, while still very comfortable, were more of a squeeze these days. At the same time, no one was really eager to get up before they had completely digested. Well, except Banagher, who was still enjoying how he could wear his pajamas again.

"Wait, how can you two get dressed if your pajamas aren't here?" Audrey asked Takuya and Micott as Banagher struggled to squeeze into his pants. Since he was dealing with that, Audrey had to nurse her bloated stomach herself.

Takuya causally belched. "We do, we put 'em in your dresser before the party started."

Audrey's pudgy face instantly bore an annoyed look. "Please don't ever go through my dresser without my permission."

That was when Banagher left the bathroom, wearing the same white t-shirt and pajamas he wore when he first went to bed on the Argama. "Well, they fit even worse then I remember, but I'm glad I get to wear these again." Banagher said, looking down at his gut as he rubbed it in circles around the middle of it. "Means I'm home."

"You really wanna call -URRRRRRP- this place home?" Micott asked.

"Well, it sorta is." Banagher said as he walked over to his bed, and sat down on it, Audrey and Micott couldn't help but notice how much his belly was jiggling. The mattress creaked when Banagher planted his large butt down on it, a noise he was starting to get used to. "I mean it's safe, comfy, has stuff I like, even my old stuff now, and you guys -BUUUURRRP- are here."

"That's a good -OOOOORRP- atti -BURP- tude to have. URRRRRRRP!" Poor Marida said as she continued to massage her belly. Out of everyone, she seemed to be the one belching the most. "But does that mean -URAAAAP- you didn't consider our house home?"

"Of course he didn't! UUURRRRP!" Micott angrily said, though the belch and bloated stomach dampened the effect she was going for. "Why would he after you-"

"Actually, Micott," Banagher started as he rubbed a hand against the back of his head. "It's complicated." Bringing up Palau made Banagher think about the friends he had made there, Vincent, Chloe, and Gilboa and his family. He realized he hadn't thought of them since he left, he wondered why that was. Was it simply because he was too worried about Marida? Too glad to be home? Or perhaps it was out of guilt. He didn't know, all he did know was that he hoped they were all safe.

"If you say so." Micott didn't sound convinced.

Audrey was the next person to get changed, after getting up with Banagher's help. After Micott and Takuya also got changed, the group exchanged their goodnights and went to sleep, this time with Banagher using Audrey's big gut as a pillow. Even when the gigantic orb was stuffed to the brim, it still felt soft and fluffy to Banagher despite it's hardness, like a big pillow. Audrey initially felt rather nervous about letting Banagher using her tummy as a bed, despite it being something she wanted, but she soon enough eased into it, it really helped that Banagher looked like the cutest thing to her as he slept on her big belly.

Audrey's tummy gurgled, the blonde felt a powerful surge from it, and the brunette did too. Before either of them knew it, the princess let out a massive, unladylike "BUUUUURRRRRAARP!", loud enough that her boobs and tummy jiggled from the force of it.

"Excuse me." Blushing, she held a hand up to her mouth, but Banagher could see an amused smile behind it.

Grinning at her, the bloated Gundam pilot give her soft tummy a few pats, leading to some more jiggles and short but deep burp. "Good one."

"Thanks."

+++

"You know, Audrey, it feels really weird knowing that I was watching you, Shin, and Marida in shows and games and then ended up meeting you all." Banagher said as he pulled a High Grade of Shin's Zaku II out of one of the boxes that held his stuff in it. The Zaku even had a similar color scheme to the Unicorn Gundam. Now that he thought about it, was the Unicorn going to get a Gunpla once this newest conflict inevitably gets an anime? He liked how the Unicorn looked and normally he would love to get a Gunpla of it, but after all this, he never wanted to see it again. At least an anime of would mean Audrey would get her wish to voice herself.

"You think that's weird? We've gained nearly a hundred pounds in just a week and can't even fit in our clothes anymore." Audrey said before turning towards Banagher, holding a High Grade Delta Gundam. "We've got these big bellies hanging out and everything!" With her free hand she left her belly up and removed her hand, making it come flopping back down, jiggling wildly and bouncing up and down, the fat acting like waves of adipose. It was a sight Banagher couldn't keep his eyes off until it was over. There was something he liked about the way his blonde pal's gut jiggled like jello.

"You know, for someone who wants to lose weight, you sure do like playing with 'big bellies'." Takuya pointed out in a cheeky way.

"And what's that supposed to mean?" The princess defensively said with a blush, placing a hand on a chunky hip.

Takuya chuckled. "Oooh nothing." He grinned. "In all seriousness, we should lose some weight before beach season."

"More like a lot of weight." Micott snarked, pinching more then an inch of her plentiful love handles.

"Oh! I've never been to the beach before." Audrey said, wonder in her eyes, laced over her voice, and visible on her face.

"Did you do ANYTHING before you met us?

Audrey searched her mind's eye for something fun she did in her childhood. There was that time she went to a public library, with Haman as her escort, but that wasn't something that would impress her much more normal friends. "I once took a canoe across a lake with some other kids. I think that was the only time I did something with kids my age."

"Wow, your childhood really was bo-"

"How did you get along with them?" Marida cut Micott off.

"We got along well, though they complained that I talk like an adult." Audrey said nostalgically.

"Heh, yeah I can see you talking like that even as a kid." Takuya said in a bemused way, he imagined her wearing all these fancy clothes as a back then, and what he imagined wasn't too far from the truth.

"Speaking of my childhood," Audrey then presented the HG Delta Gundam with both hands. "I actually saw this machine in person, when the AEUG held negotiations with Neo-Zeon. Haman said it was Char Aznable's machine, I think it was called the Hyaku Shiki.

"Actually that's not it." Takuya got closer to her, his tummy jostling.

"It's not?"

"Nope, this is the Delta Gundam, it's the original design to the Zeta Gundam but they couldn't figure out how to make the transformation sequence work. So they shelved the design and just made the Hyaku Shiki, which is basically this but without the shield and wings."

"So it's a mobile suit that failed to become Gundam?"

"Huh, I never thought of it that way before but that's a pretty good way to put it."

Audrey turned the model back towards herself, she found herself looking at it deeper then she had meant to. Even now she could still looking back on her memories with Char, but it was bittersweet, and every day she found it to be a little more bitter and a little less sweet. Part of her wished he never cared for her, that he treated her as horribly as he does everyone. Half of her was saying it was better to suffer abuse and feel nothing but hatred for that person. The other half said it was best to just enjoy it for what it was.

Had her younger self been aware of what Zeon truly was, she would've supported his AEUG actions completely. But now, knowing how disappointing he would become, she couldn't feel any pride for those actions. Even so, she was certain he genuinely tried.

Char Aznable, the man who failed to become Gundam: That was how she would see him.

"You okay, Audrey?" Those words from Banagher brought Audrey's attention back to the here and now.

"O-Oh, yes, I'm fine. I was just noticing how the gold on this is so shiny I can see my fingerprints on it. Sorry."

"She's definitely lying." Banagher thought without the shadow of a doubt. "She never spaces out like that unless something's gotten to her. Still, it's probably best if I just pretend to buy it, no point in making whatever she's going through even harder." Banagher showed her a reassuring, chubby grin. "Actually, I'm pretty sure those are mine."

"They are? Don't you polish these things?"

"They're not vases." Banagher chuckled.

"Still."

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Unpacking was always a bothersome chore, and as Banagher, Audrey, Micott, Takuya, and Marida found out, being overweight only exacerbated that. Their large, orb-shaped bellies meant they couldn't maneuver properly when they tried to unpack. When leaning over to pick something up, they had to reach around their gut to grab it, crouching would make their bellies push their arms up, and when they were carrying something bigger then your average toy, their bellies got in the way of it, so they have to use their soft middles as a makeshift table for it. Not only did this make these acts more annoying to do but it made them more exhausting to do too. It was fine in small does, but to say "Banagher had a small amount of personal possessions" was to say an easily disproved lie.

Carrying the game systems was easily the worst, and they all dreaded having to do it. They'd have to do it by holding it just above their stomach as they carried, actually using their soft orb as support would be too uncomfortable. To all of them except Marida, it felt like lifting weights, and how out-of-shape they had gotten was not helping.

Banagher grunted as he tried to lean over to reach a Gunpla at the bottom of a large box, his belly getting in the way like it had been all day. Like the rest of them, except for Haro, he had gotten a little sweaty by this point, with some slight redness in his cherubic creeks to go with it. "Gh! Come... on!..." He suddenly heard what sounded like someone falling over. He got up and turned around to see Audrey sprawled on the floor, her gigantic belly sticking straight up into the air like a mighty mountain of dough and gluttony, looming over her, making it look even bigger to the poor girl. All eyes were upon her, including a pair of robotic ones. Her exhaustion had caused her to make a clumsy misstep that completely wrecked her balance. Her face was far more sweaty and red then then the others as she laid there in defeat, panting like she had had just run a marathon and won the gold.

Overall the sight was not surprising at all to her companions.

Banagher returned his focus to trying to reach the Gunpla, a HG Zeta Gundam, the Revive version to be specific. With some tummy squishing, he was able to grab it. Standing back up straight, he took a closer look at it. It was gonna suck when he had to that again to pick up the other parts (specifically the parts for the transformation, the Hyper Mega Launcher, and the Beam Sabers and the effects for them) but at least he had the main thing now. Turning around and seeing Audrey's bloated form (mostly her belly), having not moved at all, and the Zeta Gundam model at the same time made him remember a scene from Zeta Gundam that showed little Audrey (or Mineva, as she was known as back then) seeing the Zeta Gundam arrive the Neo-Zeon ship as she practiced her violin.

The brunette had two thoughts, the first was how absolutely massive Audrey was now compared to when she was a child. She looked like she could eat her child self! And the second was that she would love to see his model of the Zeta.

He walked over to his exhausted friend, sat down next to her, and put the High Grade Zeta Gundam on the very top of her chubby belly, juuust past her deep navel. Given how soft and squishy the strawberry blonde's stomach was, it was a miracle how the model stayed perfectly still on it, almost as if it was willed to do so by them. "Hey, Audrey, you saw the Zeta Gundam in real life, right?"

"-Pant- Huh?" You'd never guess from looking at her face that Audrey was in an air-conditioned room, but when she focused on the model specifically instead of Banagher, her face lit up with a smile that chubby cheeks placed emphasis on. "O-Oh! Yes! I did see this." She said as she picked it up and brought it closer to her face. "I was practicing my violin when it landed in the hanger. I never saw one before so it was really interesting. Huh, they actually really got it close to the real thing." On paper, the Zeta and the Unicorn had vastly different appearances. The Zeta was sleek with small shoulders, while the Unicorn had a more average body shape, the Zeta was white with blue, while the Unicorn was pure white, the Zeta transformed into something completely different, while the Unicorn transformed into a stronger form of itself. Even so, looking it, she could still see the same heroic spirit. "There's something about Gundams you just don't see in a Zeon mobile suit."

"Because they're not chunky like them?" Takuya commented, partially joking.

"Well, yes, that too. But I was referring to something deeper. It's amazing that a model was able to capture that." Audrey wasn't sure if that was more a compliment to the ones who manufactured this, or to the spirit of Gundam. Or perhaps to Banagher. Looking at the young man, she could feel from him that heroic spirit all who piloted the Gundam had, despite, well, him being rather obese and a complete goofball. And somewhat lazy as well.

While she had never meet a Gundam pilot before him, barring that Kamille was there for the negotiations with Neo Zeon, and even then they did not directly talk to each other, she had seen many images of them, as well as read about them. In Amuro's case she had also the anime that chronicled him. And in each Gundam pilot that she looked into, she felt the same heroic spirit she felt in Banagher.

"I get what you mean." Banagher said. "There's just something heroic about them."

"Heroic, that's the right word."

As Audrey concurred with him, Marida looked on at her tubby siblings. "Heroic's not the word I would use." She thought. Even with someone like Banagher in the cockpit, the sight of Gundam still filled her with rage and a desire to exterminate it. While mere toy replicas like these didn't do that, the face of Gundam still didn't elicit any positive emotions from her.

Still, she didn't say anything. There was no point in trying to ruin their fun. But what did end interrupt them was a big growl of hunger from Marida's stomach, loud enough that she instantly knew the others hard it. Blushing, she looked past her impressive bosom and down down at her large, fat stomach. Placing her meaty hands on it and feeling how incredibly soft it had gotten from her many binges, she thought on Takuya's recent comment on how many Zeon mobile suits had a very "chunky" appearance. The Kshatriya was no exception, so it's pilot felt it was rather fitting she too would have a "chunky" body.

Turning around, she saw the others smirking. "Well, someone's hungry." Banagher teased.

"I'm not that hungry, I can still help with the unpacking." Despite the blushing, Marida regained her serious, stoic look.

"Geez, haven't you heard of a snack break before?" Micott teased, throwing her hands behind her head. "I can see where Audrey gets her seriousness from."

"Believe it or not I was actually like this before I met her." Audrey said, missing Micott's joke. "Anyways, now actually is a good time for a snack break." As it they waited for the perfect timing, all five chubby bellies growled loudly in unison, it was almost like they wanted to encourage the idea of a snack break. Everyone looked at their soft middles, except Haro, of course, since he didn't have one.

"Sounds like we've worked up quite the appetite." Takuya said what everyone was thinking, giving his chubby tummy some eager pats.

1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Audrey, Banagher, Marida, Micott, and Takuya happily snacked together on the couch, well, Marida had to sit in a chair like last time. It was mostly stuff like potato chips and miniature pretzels, of which the initial appeal still hadn't entirely worn off for Audrey. The TV was on but it was mostly just white noise to them, the fatties and Haro were more focused in chatting with each other. It felt really rewarding to just rest after some hard work and snack to their heart's delight.

Some time into their snacking, Audrey felt pressure suddenly in her stomach and chest. She knew what it meant but before she could catch it, it flew out of her mouth as a big, unladylike burp. "Excuse me!" She said, blushing. She was fine with belting out some big ol' belches when she and her friends were well into a stuffing session, just completing pigging out. She even held some pride in the loud burps she could unleash, especially when they elicited a compliment from Banagher. But during some regular hanging out over a modest snack? That wasn't the time or place for burping, the princess still placed a lot of importance in manners.

"Hard to believe Audrey at this point is more manly then you, Banagher." Micott teased with a chubby grin as she lightly elbowed the obese pilot in his chubby tummy, not only did that jostle it a little but her elbow sank in slightly. Truly Banagher had gotten fat.

"Huh? How is Audrey more manly then me?" A confused Banagher asked before shoving some pretzels into his mouth.

"She's burped more then you today, and you're more soft and cuddly then her."

"I'm right here you know." Audrey interjected. "And I haven't belched more then him today."

"Yeah, and she's way more soft and cuddly then me." Banagher argued, thinking on all the belly play he had done with her massive gut, and how incredibly jiggly it was whenever she walked.

"I've gotta side with Micott here." Takuya chimed in after eating some more chips. "You're the big sister, right, Marida? What do you think?"

Marida wiped some crumbs off her face (having found the Argama has really good potato chips) before giving her official big sis opinion, which carries as much what as Marida does. "BUURRP! Excuse me. Well, I haven't spent as much with Minev-Audrey since she became overweight, but I know Banagher is very soft and cuddly."

"You would know, since you've played with my stomach so much." Banagher admitted as he rubbed his stomach in memory, he and Marida thinking fondly back on those days. If Marida could reach, she would've responded with some belly play.

"Has everyone but me played with Banagher's gut?" A frustrated Micott pouted, puffing her already chubby face

"Well, I haven't." Takuya answered.

"What do you think, Haro?" Audrey asked the robotic ball that was sitting next to Banagher.

"About who else has played with Banagher's big belly?"

"No, I mean about if I"m more manly then Banagher."

"Equally unmanly! Equally unmanly!"

"I was hoping for a different answer." Banagher grumbled.

"Hey, all messing around aside, you've got a really good thing going." Takuya said in his usual carefree tone. "You're really approachable and friendly when you aren't staring out into space. Audrey's tough and has this iron will." He said about the girl who had her fat tummy used as a pillow last night. "You two compliment each other like that."

"Well, we did call ourselves the brain, the heart, and the blubber." Audrey proudly said.

"Which one of you is the blubber?" Marida asked.

"We both are." Banagher said.

"I figured." Micott commented.

"Just for the record, we can all agree that Marida is the manliest one, right?" Audrey asked and voted.

"Oh, yeah." Takuya voted.

"Definitely." Banagher voted.

"She totally is." Micott voted.

"She's the big sister! The big sister!" Haro voted, flapping his ears.

Marida just burped loudly again and apologized for it, which just made her more manly in their eyes.

And that was when Mihiro barged in, her huge gut, big boobs, chunky legs, and gigantic butt jiggling. She evidently hadn't gotten a replacement uniform, as her stomach, the first thing the group noticed, was still hanging out, completely free in the air, as much as she wished it wasn't.

"Hey, Mihiro." Takuya causally said as Micott casually belched.

Seeing them all shoveling jack food after junk food into their greedy mouths, not minding at all how their big, soft, jiggly stomachs were completely exposed and sitting atop their chunky laps, Mihiro could only come to one conclusion. "Looks like I came just in time. C'mon, we've got a lot of weight to lose."

"What are you talking about?" Micott asked before eating another handful of chips.

"The Nahel Argama has a gym on it, and we've been putting off exercise for way too long. So let's go."

"Can't we just diet or something?" Takuya groaned. No gym class was one of the few positives of their current living situation and he wasn't eager to throw that away.

"Eating potato chips is not dieting." She sternly said. "Dieting was our plan this past week and now look at us, we're fatter then ever!" To drive her point home, she lifted her fat gut up with both her hold and then let it dropping, jiggling and bouncing like mad. It did work at driving her point home, the problem was that Banagher and Takuya thought that was hot.

"Fatties! Fatties!" Haro teased, bouncing on Banagher's tummy.

"Takuya, you even broke your belt last night." The ensign said as she pointed towards to the broken belt he was still wearing, having forgotten to actually remove it from his pants. To be fair to him, he was REALLY stuffed last night.

"Which means he can't poke fun at me over mine anymore." Banagher smugly said with a smug grin before shoveling another handful of pretzels into his mouth. Audrey was tempted to literally poke him in the gut but she felt that would be too childish.

"It'll be good to get back in the swing of exercising, right, Banagher?" Marida shifted to face her little brother. "It was hard work but work but we had a good streak going, until, well..." Marida placed her hands on the sides of her meaty gut and shook it, her fat belly bouncing up and down.

"No regrets about last night though, right?"

"None at all. I actually think I'll miss binging with you and the princess once we lose all this weight." The Puru fondly patted her stomach a few times as she said that, it undulated. "Thank you for arranging this, ensign Mihiro." Nonetheless, she said that as she got up with some minor difficulty.

"It's good to see I'm not the only one here putting effort into losing weight." Mihiro said.

"Then you've got no idea how bad this is going to get."

Audrey gulped.
