1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
With Haro already woken by Banagher's tumble to the ground, the brunette and rushed off to wake up his two other friends, with the robotic ball assisting him. Banagher went over to Micott while Haro went to Takuya. "Guys, wake up!" The pilot shook Micott awake by the shoulder, as firmly yet softly as humanly possible. "C'mon, wake up! Audrey's sleepwalking!"

"Ugh." Micott groaned as she opened her eyes and brushed some of her hair out of them. "Where is she?"

While Micott got to be gently woken up by her crush, Takuya got something much less pleasant. Namely Haro jumping up and down on his gut like a dog, sending the orb into a jiggling fit. "I'm Awake! I'm awake!" Takuya shouted after the first jump, but Haro was so caught up in it that he kept going.

"She left ten seconds ago." Grabbing Haro, Banagher ran outside his door, unknowingly treating Micott to the sight of his jiggly ass, and impatiently waited there for his friends. "We can catch up easily." As soon as he saw his friends on their feet, he started running after Audrey, who had evidently turned around the corner, as he couldn't see her or her massive butt jiggling.

At the same time, Takuya and Micott ran to the door, but suddenly found their momentum coming to a sudden and unexpected stop, as each well-fed teen felt the other's flabby flesh

"Damn it!" Micott said in frustration. Yes, they had gotten stuck together in the door frame, like a cartoon comedy duo.

"C'mon, not now!" Takuya said as they both futilely tried to squeeze out of there. "Banagher, help! We're stuck!"

Hearing his pleas, the Vist ran back to his chubby companions, his gut swaying form one to the next when he turned around. "I've gotcha!" Getting as close as he could, he grasped one hand from each of them. Micott was delighted to feel his big stomach touch her own, considering getting stuck in the door totally worth it. Takuya, not so much.

Banagher was already feeling a little tired. After all, he had woken up way too early, had to battle his sphere of a middle to get up, run out and away of his room, and finally run back to his room. For a chunky guy like him, that was a decently large amount of exercise. So it was impressive he didn't even take a second of rest before he started pulling.

But unfortunately for the three of them, Takuya and Micott were wedged in there tight. Banagher was putting in a good show, but his grunting and the slight redness of his face showed how much he was struggling.

"C'mon, Banagher!" Takuya cheered his friend.

"We're almost out!" Micott praised.

"You can do it! You can do it!" Haro chanted

The pilot kept it up for a total of 14 seconds, needing to take a break to catch his breath. "-pant- Just gimme -pant- a sec." Hunching forward and placing his hands on his meaty thighs, Banagher looked exhausted. "Can't believe I let them down after all that." He mused with guilt. "I can't do anything right, I'm just some useless, fat, blob... No, even if that's true, I can't fail them. I've gotta do this." With a determined look to make things right, Banagher grabbed his friends' hands again. "Okay, here we go!"

He pulled with all his might, and he found himself having more then thought. Just six seconds later, he freed his friends from their self-make prison, but immediately he almost regretted it, as the momentum none of them were thinking about sent them flying right into Banagher. The three of them crashed down hard to the ground, the poor brunette felt like he was being buried by his friends' fat, not that they were having fun either. At least their chubby friend's gigantic belly served as the best cushion they could ask for, but that still hurt like hell. Haro was the only one to get away from this unscathed due to his small size, giving him a front row seat to the intense jostling their entire bodies were doing.

"We're... not off to a good start." Takuya might as well have been telepathic, as he said what everyone there was thinking.

After the two rolled off the poor brunette, the three of them (with some difficulty) got up and ran off to the cafeteria as fast as group of chubby high schoolers possibly could, their bodies jiggling like a huge orb of gelatin during an earthquake. The jiggling movements her two fat friends made was something she found to be a nice show, and they thought the same of her.

What they DIDN'T like though, was all this running. Banagher's room wasn't as close tot he cafeteria as his tummy would like, so this meant a decent amount of running and jiggling. Banagher was handling this better then his friends, thanks to all the working he had been doing lately, even holding Haro the whole time didn't make thus more painful.

Upon reaching the cafeteria, they were greeted by the sounds of loud belching from Zeon's princess, and the sight of her large bod obscuring some of the fridge light as she munched away.

"Damn, look at her go." Having just entered the cafeteria, Micott couldn't get that good a look at the blonde, but she could tell from how the silhouette of her body was moving that she was pigging out fast and hard.

"Never saw her eat like that before." Banagher knew this was a bad thing, but he couldn't help but think a girl eating like that was pretty damn cool.

"So, you guys ready?" Takuya asked. "We grab her and drag her back to Banagher's room, right?"

Banagher knew the answer was probably yes, but he also knew he had to stick to his nice, huggable way. "Let's just see if we can get through to her first."

Haro voiced his approval by saying "With friendship!"

Approaching her normally, Banagher took the lead, with the other two humans following closely behind him. "Hey, Audrey?" When he called, Audrey turned around, her tummy swaying in a jiggly way. With a huge chicken nugget in her mouth, and a hamburger in each hand, she looked adorably goofy. "It's us, Banagher, Micott, Takuya, and Haro. You're sleepwalking right now, we're here to help you get back-"

Just as they were about to enter the kitchen, Audrey ran right up to Banagher, and with a fierce slam from her gut to his, sending both jiggling, she knocked him backwards, onto Takuya and Micott, once again, all three bodies shook with adipose. The princess slammed the kitchen doors shut before the others had a chance to even start getting up.

"God, she's so cute during the day but at night she turns into a real monster." Takuya commented.

"If someone needs to kick her fat ass to wake her up, I volunteer." A very annoyed Micott vented.

"I don't think any of us can, now that she's some kinda sumo wrestler." Banagher said, but what he was thinking was "If Audrey did that to anyone besides us, I'd tell her that was awesome."

It took around fifteen seconds for them all to get up, which is to say Audrey had fifteen extra seconds of gorging, and given the speed at which was shoveling food down her greedy moth, that meant she was eating a lot more during those fifteen seconds then you'd think.

Banagher tired to open the kitchen doors but found the handle barely moving. "Huh?" He tried again a few times and found the same result each time."She locked it."

"This whole night has just been one problem after another." Micott groaned.

"What? How the hell did she get the key? Let me try." Banagher stepped aside and let Takuya try. While he had the same difficulty the brunette had, it wasn't a fruitless attempt, as he did notice something crucial. "Hey, look! There's no keyhole!" The others looked to see that the young man was right, there was no keyhole. "She didn't lock it."

"Then why won't the door open?" Banagher questioned. Come to think of it, the handle did feel a little more loose then a locked one.

"Maybe she blocked it or something." The big bottomed brunette suggested.

"With a chair." Haro added.

"So we just kick the door until the chair is knocked away, grab Audrey, drag her to your room, and get some well-earned sleep." Takuya then attempted step one, his leg flab jostling with each kick. Unfortunately, nearly ten kicks later, and the doors still weren't budging. "Okay, let's all try kicking it at once."

Even a simultaneous, perfectly timed kick from the three of them didn't accomplish anything other then making three flabby legs wobble instead of just one. Haro even jumped out of Banagher's grasp to hit the door, which didn't work either.

"We gotta hit it with something stronger." Micott said as they heard Audrey rip another humongous burp.

"Like what?" Takuya asked. "The benches here are part of the floor." As he said that, Banagher looked down at his belly with a quizzical look, inspecting it with a poke, and grab of his blubber.

"Please tell me we don't have to do more walking." Micott groaned.

"We don't, I've got an idea." For the first time in a while, Banagher sounded confident, it was a little surprising to the others actually.

"What is it?"

To answer Micott's quesiton, Banagher gabbed his stomach and held it up to them, almost proudly. "We hit it with our stomachs!"

"Heh, nice one, Banagher." Takuya chuckled. "You always know how to keep our spirits up with a good joke."

"No, I'm serious." Banagher clarified. "Think about it, we've got over two weeks of gluttony in these things, and we can throw way more weight behind them. Audrey just knocked us down with her gut. If she can do it, why can't we?"

"You know, that actually makes sense." As a show of support, Takuya lifted his huge belly up in the same manner.

"This is really stupid, but," Here, Micott too grabbed the sides of her tum and lifted it, presenting it to her cute friends. "This whole situation is stupid, so it should work."

"Banagher's a hero!" Haro said as he rolled up to him.

"Hey, Audrey?" Before he could say anymore, the Unicorn Gundam's pilot slipped on an empty bag of chips, one Audrey has uncharacteristically thrown aside when she finished it. While he didn't fall over, he did lose his balance and bump into the blonde. "Sorry!"

He couldn't see it from his perspective, but he had knocked poor Audrey's swollen tummy into one of the fridge's shelves, her eyes widened the microsecond contact was made. "BOOOOOOOOOOORP! Ow!" He placed both hands on the top of the Zabi's very stuffed tummy and started gently moving them in soothing circles, the lucky girl emitting a sigh that proved she was enjoying this. "Feeling better?"

"Yeah-Yeah, I -BURRORRRP- do. Your belly rubs always make everything better." Her eyelids rose, a sign to everyone that was regaining her full awareness. "BWAAAARRP! Ooohh, what happened?"

Banagher looked down, unintentionally getting an eyeful of his and her middles. "I screwed up, I couldn't stop you."

"... Literally."

Again, they all heard the sound of a giggle trying to escape. "I'm sorry. It's just such a cu-Er, funny. Such a funny idea."

"It is pretty funny." Micott used her agreement as an excuse to gave Banagher's gut some loving pats, jostling the puffy orb.

"Back on topic, why weren't you able to restrain me?"

"You were surprisingly badass."

The princess raised an eyebrow quizzically. "What's wrong with my butt?"

Banagher opened his mouth to say something, but an amused Takuya caught him in time. "Don't, I love that she doesn't get it."

While that made Audrey even more confused, she decided to just drop the topic. "Anyways, I'm sorry I gave you all a hard time."

"It's not your fault." Banagher assured, he felt a gurgle beneath Audrey's blubber right before she belched again.

"We can't blame you for sleepwalking." Micott said.

"How's your stomach feeling now? Does it still hurt?"

The princess then placed her own hand on her massive tummy. "BUUUuRRRP! Aside from the normal aching when I'm bloated, and the indigestion, no, I'm fine."

Banagher looked relieved. "That's good. Which means it's time for me to eat." With a grunt, the chubby brunette got up and walked to the fridge, his confused friends watching.

"What are you doing?" The blonde of the group asked as she saw his butt bounce.

"You know me," Casually, he grabbed a huge assortment of various foods, from cookies to chicken and everything in between, and walked back to his friends. "I'm not one to leave you alone with a problem." He sat down and placed the huge pile in the middle of the circle they had unknowingly formed. The big-bellied pilot decided to start with a classic, a big hamburger.

"Oh, I getcha now."Takuya and Micott enthusiastically joined him. The former started eating some potato chips, while the latter helped herself to some chicken nuggets.

"Please don't." A guilty Audrey said, Haro by her side. "Just because I ruined my diet, doesn't mean you all should too."

"We're doing this for your sake." Micott said. "And because this is some good stuff."

The princess shamefully looked down, seeing her tummy, and knowing the others would soon be sporting similarly bloated middles. "I'm just -URP- dragging you all down with me again."

""Hey, don't think of it -munch- like that." Takuya, getting some crumbs on his tummy. "Think of it like we're supporting you in this."

"Takuya's right." Banagher said after taking another bite out of his burger. "Would you really feel better if we out-paced you during exercise? If we were all watching on the sidelines while you were alone on the mat?"

Audrey scoured the deepest regions of her mind for a counterargument, but every time she envisioned that scenario, she found that no, she didn't want to be the only jiggly one. "No..."

Or am I doing a crappy job at this?" Fittingly, he punctuated that sentence by taking another bite out of his burger.

"You kidding?" Micott rhetorically asked through a mouth of chicken, her words garbled. "Audrey wasn't kidding when you said you're the heart of this group."

"He's always been like this, Audrey." Haro informed, though the blonde could always tell that was the case. Something about Banagher just tells you that.

"With the way you were eating," Takuya spoke through another mouthful of chips. "You would've -OOOOUURRRRP- exploded if we didn't do that."

"I appreciate -BUUUURRRARP- you all stopping that." The blonde played along.

"You helped yourself too." The friendly as always Banagher pointed out.

"Just like you're all helping yourselves now?" Audrey poked fun at them as she literally poked her pal's gut, wearing traditional smirk one wore while engaging in a little friendly teasing, the chubbiness of her cheeks (and her double chin) making it look even cuter on her.

"Yup!" With a goofy grin, Banagher then shoved some more hamburger into his mouth, alternating between that in one hand, and a hot dog in the other, a true display of fast food gluttony on par with Audrey's.

Each of the three gluttons currently stuffing themselves were all in a mood for a separate category of food. Banagher was stuffing his big gut mainly with fast food, like corn dogs, burgers, pizza, and of course, hot dogs. Takuya was filling himself mostly with snacks, like chips, crackers, and pretzels. Lastly, Micott was pigging out on a nice selection of sweats. Cake, ice cream, chocolate, it was all going into her tummy.

"Speaking -UUUURAAARP- of help, what are we gonna do tomorrow?" Micott was the one to bring up the elephant-sized belly in the room, in between slices of cake. "We're still gonna run -BURARP- into the same problems. Maybe you could teach us some of that sumo stuff you picked up."

Predictably enough, Audrey's face flushed red as she complained with an angry look that her pudge rendered cute(r). "It's not sumo! And I'm not going to teach it!"

"Aw, come on. We could really use it." Takuya lazily scratched his belly, giving another belch.

"How else are we gonna st -OOOORRORP- op you?" Micott pointed out.

"They've got a point." Banagher remarked, much to Audrey's annoyance.

"Not you -UUURRARP- too..." She pouted. "Oh, all right. But you're better off asking Marida about this sort of stuff anyways." And with those complaints out of the way, it was time for the lesson. Placing her hands on the huge orb that filled up her lap as she sat with her legs, hearing and feeling it gurgle and bubble as she struggled to digest her raid, she unleashed a giant burp as she tried to think of the most dignified way she could word this. "You... -BWAAARRP- think of your body as a battery ram, with your stomach being the front of it, and throw all your weight into your enemy."

"Like a Snorlax?" Haro innocently ruined her attempt at dignity.

"I was hoping we were closer in weight to a Munchlax, but yes."

"That doesn't sound hard." Micott said.

"Well, she did literally do it in her sleep." Takuya couldn't resist making that pun, and he had no desire to resist the urge either. "So whose-" For once eager to learn something that didn't have anything to do with mobile suits, robotics, gaming, models, or anime, tried to stand up, but found his overstuffed stomach weighed more then he thought. "Ready for to try it out?" He soon realized that unfortunately, he wasn't ready himself, and gave up trying to stand up. He was barely able to lift himself off the ground. "Whew, didn't think -BURRAARP- I was that stuf -URRP- fed yet." His tummy gurgled in response to a poke, it's owner finding that as full as he was, he still had a pretty soft gut. "Can any of us move?"

Instead of an answer, all he got was some awkward silence, aside from more munching gluttony, gurgling tums, and gassy eruptions.

Haro ended up being the first one to say anything. "Do I count?"

+++

"Micott, -OORRRAARP- you know that trick I taught you to wake up a lazy friend?" As she said the last half of that sentence, she looked at Banagher to her side with a mischievous smirk which he noticed.

"BWAAAAP! It never gets old." Micott said, and her smirk added "I like where this is going."

As he kept munching on a burger, Banagher looked back at Audrey, just a tad nervously, his gaze saying "You're gonna make me the guinea pig, aren't ya?" and Audrey's continued gazing at him replied with "That's right."

"You'll like this one I forgot to tell you about. UUUURRRRRP! It helps expel the gas from a turbulent stomach." Having hyped the moment up well enough (even Takuya was curious, if not in the same way the girls were), the Zabi heir expelled some gas of her from her turbulent tummy, raised her hand up playfully menacingly, placed it on the top of the pilot's swollen belly, and pressed down, eliciting a "BWOOOOOOOORP!" from his lips, which had some ketchup on them. The blonde giggled and then so did the brunette.

"Now that's -UURRP- fun." Micott remarked, pleased in more then just one way.

"Nice move, but you left yourself open!" With a playful look, and an equally playful raise of his hand, Banagher got his "revenge" by doing the same to her, the pressure of his hand forcing a belch of equal magnitude out of the blonde. "OOOOOUUURRRRRRP!" She belched, and then laughed with her chunky, bloated soulmate. "Pardon us!"

Watching the display, Micott unexpectedly felt a plush hand push down on the top of her gut, resulting in the brunette burping too. "UUuUUUUUUURP! Hey!" She said at Takuya, but she couldn't stop herself from having a big grin.

"Had to get you before you got me!" Takuya joked, his belly wide and wide open.

"Well, I'm gonna get you anyways!" True to her words, Micott pushed down on Takuya's gut, making him burp just as loudly as everyone else. "UURRRURAARP!"

"You know, it really does help -URP- with the bloating." Banagher rubbed his tummy. "I know another a cool trick for that." The pilot then looked down at his orb of a middle, being not completely overstuffed yet, it was around equal to the size of Audrey's belly. He could see his stomach perfectly fine, but he couldn't see his exact target. "You just give yourself a poke here," he placed his index finger right next to his cavernous navel, then poked it, his entire finger fitting without difficulty. "And -BUUUUUUUUUURP-! Ahh..." He noticed the huge blushes Audrey and Micott were sporting, but had no idea of their nature nor that he was the cause behind it, something even Haro knew.

"Speak -URAAAURP- of buttons," Takuya was giving himself a belly rub with one hand, and a big pretzel with the other. "I think you lost yours again, Audrey."

"Huh?!" Blushing before she even looked down, Audrey held up the flaps of her pajama top and saw that yes, she had popped them off during her eating frenzy. "Oh, come on! BUUUUUUURRRP!" She belched in frustration.
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.title: Campfire

choices: Skip to the end of the party
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.content:
Audrey and Banagher versus Marida, a team of two big bellies up against one giant gut, an eating contest for the ages. This was a match that could go either way. While Marida was mush fatter then both of them, and could definitely defeat one of them alone, the amount of food the fat princess and her obese knight could pack away together was truly impressive, plus they could also give each other belly rubs. But even with that in mind, Marida was still an eating machine who had won Best Eater twice. So the question was which was more powerful, blubber from months of pigging out, or blubber from pigging out with a dear friend?

The size their bellies reached amazed the other party members, Audrey and Banagher already had some impressive bellies, each one being a huge ball of dough, with Banagher's being even bigger then Audrey's, and Marida's was even bigger then Banagher's gut. While the brunette and blonde's tummies were already hanging out for all to see even before the party, the redhead's actually forced the lower part of her top to spread, like someone opening a door and revealing themselves. Already each of the remaining contenders had eaten enough to make their stomachs swell to greatly. And as their bellies grew bigger, so did their belches, some of them reaching a level of sound that was able to send vibrations through the air. They also became more common as well.

While everyone was still chatting like normal, and Audrey wasn't done with Pokemon yet, the eating contest was starting to become as entertaining as a good show or video game. So it was natural that they would discuss it.

"So who -URP- do you guys think is gonna win?" Takuya asked, he and Micott were still massaging their gurgling stomachs. "My money's on Banagher and Audrey. I mean, just look at them -BUURRRRP- eat."

"Yeah but Marida is way bigger. BUUURP! Err, no offense." Riddhe said, he and Mihiro tending to their own bellies. Out of all of them, Mihiro seemed to be handling her stomachache the worst.

"None -BWAAAP- taken. it's not like you said was untrue." Marida finished another bowl of ice cream, then immediately began scooping chocolate ice cream out of it's cartoon and placed the scoops into the large bowl. Belching, she rubbed her now completely exposed stomach with one hand as she did the scooping with the other. "if anything, it's a compliment in this context, since having the bigger belly is my key to -UUUURRAARP- victory." Showing a rare, small competitive smirk, she gave her gut a proud slap, she belched again as it jiggled, the jiggling emphasizing her point further. Even as packed full as she was, the Puru's stomach still had plenty of jiggle to it.

"Haven't seen you this pumped up -UUUURRRP- since we won Best Eater at the parlor." Banagher commented, looking at the way her tummy jostled and swayed from the impact of her pudgy palm.

"I don't think you even get like this -BEEEELLCH- when you're in a battle." Audrey said, also looking at Marida's jiggles as she chowed down on a hamburger. Saying theta reminded her of how much trouble Marida has when she tires to zip up her normal suit.

"Yeah, BURARARP! But you're both pretty pumped too." Micott commented, rubbing her underbelly. "And it's two on one. ORARP!"

"I can't believe I'm actually engaging in this discussion, but that's a moot point. UURRRAARR!" Mihiro said as she tenderly rubbed the middle of her gut with both hands. "Marida is as big as the two of them combined."

Marida gulped down another spoonful of ice cream. "Actually, that's not true. I'm not THAT big."

Takuya casually burped. "So that just leaves Haro and Shin."

"I have faith in the princess and Banagher." Shin answered as he fondly looked on at them as they kept pigging out and gaming.

"Me too! Me too!" Haro said as he excitedly started bouncing on Banagher's big belly, each bounce forcing a burp out of the poor guy.

"Oof! BURP! Haro, -URRRRRP- watch the -BOOORRP- belly! UUURRRRP!" He groaned.

Audrey giggled at this, though said giggling was quickly interrupted by a startled belch she let out once Haro decided to start bouncing on her huge belly instead.

Even though they were already so full, it took way longer then one would think for them to start slowing down. Whether it was ice cream, cake, chips, pretzels, cookies, hot dogs, burgers, or whatever, they just keep on shoveling more of it into their mouths, their bellies growing with every gulp. While Marida and Banagher were sitting normally, with their massive bellies past their laps, Audrey was sitting with her legs crossed, which meant the sides of her gut were touching her legs. Banagher thought she looked pretty cute like that.

At one point Banagher grunted and ten burped loudly as he rubbed his stomach, his round face showing some exhaustion. "Oof. BBBUURRRP! Ahhh..."

"You okay?" A concerned Audrey asked, taking a quick break from her gorging to check up on him. She saw that his belly was nearly as large as it was when they finished their "reunion binge" (as they liked to call it), which is to say it was nearly the most bloated Audrey have ever seen it.

"Y-Yeah, I'm -URP- fine." Banagher said before he resumed eating a bag of chips. "How about you?" He said through a mouthful, Audrey barely able to understand what he was saying.

"Please don't talk with your mouthful." Audrey then burped into her fist. "And I'm fine too, thank you for asking." She looked down at her gut, seeing that it too was starting to reach the size it had at the end of the reunion binge. "Though I think I'm going to need some belly rubs to get through this." Smirking, she grabbed Banagher's pudgy hand, she nearly dropped it out of surprise (having never touched a salt covered hand before), and led it over to the top of her belly.

"Heh, I'll be happy to oblige. Though I'm gonna need some too." Smirking as well, his had more emphasis from his chubby cheeks, Banagher did the same with Audrey's hand, a hand which still wasn't used to the feeling of a salt covered one.

Still smirking, they looked each other in the eyes before they closed them and simultaneously unleashed a massive belch, one big enough to make their bellies jiggle. "BUUUUUUUURRRRP!" When their five seconds long gaseous eruption ended, they let out a bellyful (no pun intended) laugh, Banagher's cheeks and Audrey's boobs jiggling along with their tummies. Still smirking, they looked each other in the eyes before they closed them and simultaneously unleashed a massive belch, one big enough to make their bellies jiggle. "BUUUUUUUURRRRP!" When their five seconds long gaseous eruption ended and Banagher saw Audrey's emerald green eyes as she saw his chocolate brown eyes, they let out a bellyful (no pun intended) laugh, Banagher's cheeks and Audrey's boobs jiggling along with their tummies.

For a while the expansion of three contenders' respective bellies was the only reminder they weren't black holes. That night they ate more then any of the other partygoers had seen, it was only matched by the amount Audrey and Banagher ate during their reunion binge. For Takuya, Micott, Riddhe, Mihiro, and Haro, they saw the huge (no pun intended) improvement from how they performed in the last eating contest. Already they had eaten twice of what they could put away back then. Of course, that was over 50 pounds ago.

Marida's strategy was different, as weird as she felt coming up with a strategy for something as mundane as an eating contest. She started out by eating relatively slowly, keeping her stomach from getting too full too quickly. then when her opponents, Audrey and Banagher in this case, started to slow down, she would proportionality increase her speed, allowing her to easily catch up and surpass them in theory. This was a strategy competitive eaters often used but she didn't get the idea from that, instead she got it by applying a military strategy she knew to an eating contest. Which she was pretty sure was the strangest thing she had ever done and that it was 100% because of Banagher's influence. She actually felt a little giddy about this, though she kept a stoic face.

Of course, the success of Marida's plan depended on how much Audrey and Banagher could eat, which was a lot. Seeing how much the princess could pack away still was a little surprising to Marida. Just a week ago she used to have such a petite figure and a small appetite to go with it, now she was obese with a big belly and a big appetite. Her and Banagher's eating skills were so good that when they started to reach their limits, the fatter Marida was starting to reach her own. All three's eating speed seemed to get a little slower every minute. It was like a song that slows down towards the end.

Eventually, Banagher, Audrey, and Marida all dropped what they currently eating and flopped into their respective couches, each letting out a giant belch unison. Audrey and Banagher groaned as they massaged each other's tummies, Marida groaned too as she massaged her full gut. Their stomachs were massive, filling up their laps and then some. It almost looked like they had giant Haros in their laps, Haros they had earned with their amazing eating skills. Audrey and Banagher's were as massive as they were by the end of their reunion binge, while Marida's was nearly twice it's size when it wasn't full of food. All three champions of eating continued to groan and burp in both pain and pleasure, their stomachs gurgling and bubbling all the while.

"You guys done now?" Takuya asked.

Audrey belched, then Banagher, and then Marida, all three looking exhausted.

"Let's take that as a yes." An amused Micott said.

"Guess it's another tie then, huh?"
1151212111233211211312111111111111111111.title: Three Bellies Full of Possibilities

choices: Audrey and Banagher enter the eating contest
Marida enters the eating contest to get to Audrey
11512122.content:
"Hey, look at that." Banagher said, pointing to a nearby flyer.

"Look at what?" Mineva asked, after wiping her mouth with a napkin.

"It's an eating contest, you wanna enter?" Banagher answered.

"No, why would I?" Mineva replied.

Mineva didn't know much about normal people, but the idea of an eating contest seemed absolutely disgusting to her. Eating yourself sick, breaking belts, popping buttons, belching, seeing your stomach swell to an incredible size, gaining weight, getting fat, she couldn't comprehend why anyone would want to do any of that!

"I thought you might still be hungry." Banagher clarified. "You could eat as much as you'd want."

"Banagher, I just had five hotdogs and a large soda, I'm full." Mineva said. She didn't know why Banagher would think she was still hungry, but then again she did just have a rather large meal, maybe he assumed she had a big appetite. She couldn't really blame him if that was the case.

After giving her answer, Mineva's stomach let out a loud growl. She put a hand on her hungry tummy, blushing.

"I'll enter." Mineva said, turning her head away from Banagher, trying to hide her embarrassment.

'It starts in ten minutes. And don't worry, you don't have to eat everything. Just stop when you're full." Banagher assured, causing Mineva to feel a little better about entering.

'Oh, and how did you know my name?" He asked.

"Huh?" Mineva said, facing Banagher again.

"You called me Banagher, even though I never told you my name." Banagher said.

"Your pet called out your name when we crashed." Mineva said, referring to Haro, who was being held by Banagher.

"Haro! Haro!" The ball exclaimed.

"That's his name." Banagher said, a friendly smile on his face.

This earned a small chuckle from Mineva, who was smiling as well.

"Yeah, so I'm Banagher Links." Banagher said.

"And, I'm..." Mineva briefly paused, thinking of a name. She noticed a nearby movie poster.

"My name is Audrey. Audrey Burne."
11512122.title: An Eating Contest?

choices: They drop out and resume their journey to the mansion.
115121222.content:
"I can't believe we're doing this." Audrey said as she and Banagher walked up to a table where they would sign up for the eating contest.

"It's not like we're going to eat that much. We'll quit as soon as we're full." Banagher said, holding Haro in his arms. "Besides, this could be fun."

"I really don't see how it could."

The two then walked to the table and registered (after paying their entry fees, of course) for the contest as a team. Including them, there were four teams of two and the first place prize was a regular looking trophy that had a hot dog at the top of it.

Audrey and Banagher took their spots at their team's table, Haro sat in Banagher's lap. The chairs were comfortable enough but they were nothing like the ones Audrey had at home. As the princess of Zeon, Audrey lived in a luxurious mansion and the furniture there was some of the best there is. Much of it was personally crafted by Zeon loyalists. Audrey knew she was very spoiled and pampered (and she would be the first to admit it) and that she just needed time to adjust to a normal life but she honestly couldn't imagine how someone could be satisfied with furniture like this.

Right now, the brunette and blonde were just waiting for the contest to start.

"Something wrong, Audrey?" Banagher had noticed Audrey's discomfort.

"It's just the fact that we're doing this." The blonde explained. "That and my chair isn't too good but that's probably just me."

"Don't worry, this won't take too long." Banagher said. "But if we somehow do win, what do you want to do with the trophy?"

"I'd want you to keep it." Audrey stated. "I really wouldn't want anyone but you to see me with it."

"If that's what you want." Banagher then noticed something about what his new friend just said. "Wait, what did you mean when you said you didn't want anyone but me to see you with it?"

A small blush appeared on Audrey's surprised face. She opened her mouth to stutter out an explanation but she was cut off before she could say anything.

"Hello and welcome to the 7 Hogs, Meet Your Dogs contest!" The announcer said.

As the announcer continued his opening speech, Audrey looked at the other contestants, there was six others. She was surprised to see that most of them were slim like her.

"You were expecting everyone to be fat, weren't you?" Banagher teased with a grin.

"Well, yes." Audrey replied, a bit embarrassed. continue

Banagher let out a friendly giggle and Audrey soon started smiling herself and joined in.

"And now that we've got the introductions out of the way, let's begin!" The announcer proclaimed at the end of the opening, the audience cheered.

A few young men then began placing plates of hot dogs on the contestants' tables, as well as a cup, a bottle of water, and a bottle of soda. The contest was three rounds in total, so the contestants were given some drinks from the start and were allowed to have more whenever they wanted.

"Ready, Audrey?" Banagher asked, an eager grin on his face as he prepared to dig in.

"Y-Yes!" Audrey answered, a similar look on her face. She figured she might as well enjoy herself.

"Go, Banagher! Go, Audrey!" Haro contributed.

"Thank you, Haro." Audrey said as Banagher gave their robotic friend a few affectionate pats. Audrey found the little guy adorable.

"On your mark!" The announcer shouted. "Ready…Set…Go!"

Audrey and Banagher began digging into their hot dogs, as did the other contestants. Audrey's face lit up when she bit into her hot dog, it was made by the same cook who made the hot dogs she and Banagher ate. It had the same toppings and tasted just as good. A big smile appeared on Audrey's face.

Audrey ate at the same pace she always did and with the excellent manners she always displayed. It was pretty unusual to see someone like her in an eating contest. Banagher ate at a casual pace and while his manners were good they weren't quite as good as his blonde friend's. Occasionally crumbs or some sauce would end on his mouth and he would just lick it off.

Soon the first round would come to an end and everyone was still in. Banagher and Audrey engaged in small talk as they waited for the next round to start.

"Man, that was good." Banagher said, giving his stomach a few pats.

"It certainly was." Audrey replied. "Though we might've eaten a bit too much."

"So do you wanna call it quits?" Banagher asked. "I'm fine with that if you are."

Audrey thought about it, while it was true that they needed to hurry to the mansion, the meeting between the Vist Foundation and the Garencieres wasn't going to happen for hours, so she could afford to spend some more time with Banagher.

"I suppose spending a bit more time here wouldn’t be all that bad," Audrey said contemplatively. "I mean, if it’s alright with you, of course."

"Heh, don’t worry, my schedule’s not the busiest," Banagher said with a grin. "This is the perfect way to pass the time, if you ask me. And hey, we could get a trophy by the end of all this, so win-win, right?"

The two friends then ate their way thorough the second round. While they had only intended to eat just a few more hot dogs before leaving, they ended up eating over a dozen of them. Their bellies had become much bigger from their goring, Banagher's belly had caused his shirt to rise above his bellybutton and strained his belt and pants' button, while Audrey's was pressing against her coat, straining the buttons on it almost to the point of popping. Their bellies were desperately trying to to pop off the button on their pants and be free.

Haro was now sitting in between Audrey's and Banagher's chair as the two rubbed their stuffed bellies.

"I can't believe we ate so much." Audrey moaned as she rubbed her bloated stomach.

"Me neither." Banagher said, giving his tummy a few pats.

"I'm so full. UUUURRRP!" Audrey immediately slapped her hands over her mouth, blushing very heavily. The blonde was perhaps the most embarrassed she had ever been in her life. She had always displayed perfect manners at every meal yet here she had just unleashed a huge belch. "E-E-Excuse me." She muttered as she removed her hands from her mouth.

"Don't worry about it." Banagher said, a warm smile on his face. "You're excused."

"Thanks." Audrey said, a small smile on her face. It was clear that she was still embarrassed but she felt better now that she knew Banagher wasn't bothered.

"No problem, Au –UUURRRP-!" Banagher began blushing himself, just like Audrey did. "Sorry about that."

Audrey giggled, Banagher was being too cute. "Don't worry about it. You're excused."

"T-Thanks." Banagher said, a dorky smile on his face. "Hey, when this whole stuff with the Vist Foundation is over, do you wanna hang out or something?"

"Of course, Banagher." Audrey answered, smiling sweetly.
115121222.title: Hot Dogs Lie (in Stuffed Bellies)

1151212221.content:
"So do you play any-"

A large SNAP cut off Banagher, catching both his and Audrey's attention. Banagher's gut had snapped his belt in half. Their faces both turned red as they looked down at their clothes. A few seconds of silence passed, with neither of them knowing what to say.

"I, uh, guess that means I'm good at this, right?" Banagher said, a sheepish smile on his face.

"T-That's one way to look at it." Audrey stuttered.

"Do you wanna call it quits?"

Audrey thought about it. It was obvious that they had eaten too much, and they were sure to gain some weight from it. Any further gorging would cause them to gain even more weight. Banagher's tummy had just snapped his belt in half, if they continued stuffing themselves, Audrey would damage her clothes and Banagher would damage his even more. Not to mention that their stuffed bellies would make it harder for them to walk to the mansion. Could they even eat any more?

And yet, Audrey still wanted to stay. This contest had turned out to be a surprisingly fun experience and she could tell that Banagher was enjoying it as much as she was. It felt so amazing to enjoy herself and be an ordinary girl. Banagher was the first person her age who viewed her as a person, as a friend.

"Actually, I want to win this." Audrey said. "If you're up for it, of course."

"I told you this would be fun." Banagher playfully said.

"Yeah, kind of," Audrey said, looking down at her straining coat with a smirk. "It’s certainly a chance to try out something that no one thought I’d come across."

The third and final round was soon about to begin. Once again, a few young men placed hot dogs and drinks on the contestants' tables. Despite how full they were feeling, Audrey and Banagher were up to the challenge.

"Ready, Audrey?" Banagher asked his friend, determined grins on their faces.

"Ready!"

"On your mark!" The announcer shouted once again. "Ready…Set…Go!"

Banagher and Audrey began digging into their meal, shoveling hot dogs into their mouths as fast as possible. Unlike the first two rounds, which were a matter of endurance, the winner of the final round would be whoever finished eating first. As such, they needed speed up their eating in order to win.

Occasionally Banagher and Audrey would release a loud belch. This removed some of the pressure in their stomachs, allowing them to eat more. It was a bit embarrassing to to burp in public like that but it was needed if they were going to win.
1151212221.title: New Appetites Belie Doubts

choices: Banager and Audrey win the contest!
11512122211.content:
After several more minutes of forcing food down, Audrey was nearly red in the face from the effort. She had no idea anyone could get tired from eating, but then again, she was hardly omniscient. The pain in her gut and the sweat pouring down her face made her legitimately worried she wouldn’t be able to carry on, but she knew she had to. Banagher seemed to be faring much better than her, still happily munching on the latest hot dog that was unveiled after he got done eating the last.

Finishing the current dog she was on, Audrey suppressed a sigh of relief as she looked down at the damage the meal had done so far. What she saw made her nearly fall out of her chair. Her stomach had practically become spherical as her meal was crammed tight into it, the blonde’s abdomen pushing against her coat with all its might. The princess knew the fabric was obscuring everything that wasn’t the front, and frankly, she didn’t mind one bit. Considering the straining buttons that were only holding on through what seemed like a miracle from God, the threads were so short, contemplating the damages all those calories would do to her was not something Audrey particularly felt like.

Audrey looked back down at the hot dogs, her stomach almost dropping at the prospect of eating more. Yes, it was for Banagher. Yes, there was a part of her that was genuinely pushing her to indulge in more and more of this strange aspect of the world. However, even knowing all of that, the blonde princess still felt it was necessary to psyche herself up for the near-Herculean task she was meant to overcome. She steeled herself, inhaled deeply…and a loud *ping* greeted her ears, accompanied by a sudden sense of freedom in her midsection.

Slowly, Audrey craned her head down to look at what she knew was the cause. Pale flesh was just finishing seeping through the newly-exposed gap that her coat’s middle button had kept sealed this whole time. Audrey gasped, and immediately regretted it, for the other button just below the previous also ended up biting the bullet as it flew off and pinged against the metal of the table. And as if to add salt to the wound, her pants’ zipper was also undone, lowering down enough that part of her panties was actually visible. The sight was enough to make the Zabi’s face turn scarlet instantaneously, yet another bout in this eventful day.

Overcoming her mortification by just the tiniest amount, Audrey was able to tentatively look over to the side at her new friend, feeling a pair of eyes on her. What she saw confirmed her fears: Banagher had definitely noticed what happened. After all, two pings in quick succession couldn’t be written off as just a trick of the ears, much as she wanted that to be the case. As expected, his eyes were drawn straight to the young woman’s unceremoniously-exposed paunch, bloated beyond recognition. Audrey couldn’t actually make out what Banagher’s expression was, his face possessing a strangely stoic look, but upon seeing him raise his head to look into her eyes, she promptly turned her head to the side to avoid any answers.

This was it. Everything was ruined. Banagher would think she was disgusting, that was the only logical path. She knew there were greater things at stake (the whole reason she was visiting this colony being the biggest), but at the moment, none of her thoughts allowed that to appear at the forefront. Instead, all of the blonde’s brain power was dedicated to figuring out how to get out of this situation with as much dignity as possible. How exactly could she get out of this? You were embarrassed, pretty understandable from a button pop, and I sort of realized just trying to comfort you with stock stuff like ‘it doesn’t matter’ and all that would probably just ring hollow.”

"I don't see how I couldn't." Marida replied. "I'm going to have another bowl. How about you?"

"Yeah, I just gotta finish my bowl first." Banagher answered. "Man, we should enter an eating contest. I mean, we're already eating a lot of ice cream!"

"'An eating contest?' What's that?" Marida asked. The redhead had spent most of her life as a soldier for Neo-Zeon, as such, she knew little about things a normal person would enjoy doing.

"You don't know?" Banagher asked, surprised. "Well, it's where you get a bunch of food and see who can eat the most."

"That sounds like a lot of fun." Marida said. "When does this contest start?"

"I was joking when I said we should enter one." Banagher didn't expect Marida to show such enthusiasm for the idea. "But we could have one right now, if you want."

"That would be great." Marida said, smiling as Banagher finished his bowl.

"Alright, let's get started!" Banagher enthusiastically said with a grin.

The two pilots then got their fourth bowl of ice cream.

“Man, they really give you a lot here, huh?” Banagher said, bemused.

“Well, I would think we’ve earned it! After all we’ve been through, we deserve to be spoiled a bit,” Mardia declared confidently.

"That's true," the brunette said, chuckling. "I'm just glad I can spend it with you."

Marida's air of confidence immediately dissipated as a confused blush came over her face.

"Huh? Banagher, w-what do you mean?" she stuttered out.

"Well, we used to be enemies, and that meant that at any time, you or I could've killed each other. The fights just got so intense at times...I really did think I'd have to kill you during a few of them."

The redhead felt her heart drop down into her stomach.

"I'm sorry to bring up an old memory like that," Banagher looked down bashfully. "But I just wanted to say that w're lucky that we could be together, you know?"

Marida stared at Banagher's face a moment. The young man had one that screamed hardship and responsibility, having gone through far too much for his age. Then again, she supposed she had seen her own fair share of tragedies that went above and beyond most other people she knew.

And as she sat there, she realized that Banagher was perfectly right. There was a time when she did take him captive and viewed him as an obstacle to "save" Audrey. Marida was ashamed of that, to say the least, and she also realized just how fortunate she was that her friend was a forgiving soul. If he wasn't...well, she didn't know how she'd handle it.

"Thank you, Banagher," she said with a smile. "I'm honored to know you think that."

"Oh, come on! You're making me blush!" Banagher gave another small chuckle. "Anyways, I think we should get back to that ice cream now, right?"

Certainly, she’d overeaten, but so what? This definitely wasn’t going to become a habit, she could just work all the calories off, and the redhead just wasn’t comfortable with the idea of quitting such an activity this early on.

Deciding she’d indulge a bit more in this new experience, Marida looked back up at her friend, a clear determination in her eyes. “Heh, better get back to eating that ice cream, it’s starting to melt.” Marida undid the sash around her waist so that it wouldn't meet the same fate as Banagher's belt.

And really, compared to the average Mobile Suit pilot, it’s not like I’m exactly fearing for my life here,” the redhead said with a smirk. “So then, get ready, Banagher! "Are you okay, Kira?" Flay didn't even have to look at him for ten seconds to realize that he was exhausted.

"I didn't know you cooked."

"Sure." Kira took a bite out of one of the cookies and his face lit up in joy. "These are really good, Flay."

Flay breathed a sigh of relief. "Think you, Kira. I was really worried you weren't going to like them."

"Why wouldn't I like them? They're great!"

"Ahhh. You sure know how to bake cookies, Flay." Kira said, giving his stomach a few pats.

"Thanks. Now, are you ready for some brownies, Kira?" Flay said, holding up a plate of them.

"Of course!" Kira began happily devouring the brownies and soon finished the entire plate.

"Man, you're a really great cook, Flay URP!" Kira began blushing. "Excuse me. Sorry about that."

Flay let out a friendly giggle. "It's fine, Kira. I'm really just glad that you like my cooking so much."

"Well, it is really great."

Kira then began eating a tub of ice cream. As he shoveled more and more scoops of ice cream into his mouth, his gut grew bigger and bigger, this did not go unnoticed by Flay. For some reason, she couldn't take her eyes off it. Kira released another burp as soon as he swallowed the last scoop.

"Excuse me."

"Um, Kira?"

"Yeah?"

"Your, uh, stomach has gotten a little bigger."

"Huh?"

Kira looked down at his stomach and discovered that what Flay said was true. His belly was now a small round ball filled with food. Kira poked his gut, as if to confirm that it was really there. It felt so weird to have a bigger belly, his gut was usually completely flat.

"Well, uh... T-This is new." Kira was blushing as he ran a hand over his tummy.

"Um, do you want to stop eating?"

Kira thought about it for a bit. While he was concerned about his weight, Kira wanted to enjoy his break as much as he could and he could tell that Flay wanted him eat a little more, since she was worried about how he had been letting work get in the way of eating. And it's not like he couldn't lose the weight.

"I think I could go for a little bit more."

Of course, he ended up eating everything Flay had brought him. Kira's gut was absolutely huge now and completely spherical, making him look and feel like he had swallowed a giant watermelon. Kira's stomach had no problem pushing up his now too-small shirt enough that its function was voided entirely.The button on his pants popped off halfway through his binge and his gut pushed his zipper down, exposing a bit of his underwear. The stuffed Gundam pilot groaned as he laid down in his bed and rubbed his swollen belly.

"Don't worry about it, Kira." Flay said as she placed her hands on Kira's big gut and began rubbing the taut orb. "This will help you digest. Are you feeling alright?"

"Y –UURRP- Yeah." Kira answered, giving his stomach a few pats. "I'm just stuffed, that's all. This was really fun, thanks for all the food, Flay." The overfed brunette had a small smile on his face.

"You're welcome. I actually didn't think you would be able to eat it all." Flay was grinning herself.

"I didn't either, heh heh!" Kira gave his belly a light slap for emphasis. "UUUUURRRRP! Excuse me."

By the end of every feast, they bellies were very large, completely filled up with food and drinks. Needless to say, their gluttony resulted in them becoming much fatter.

"Excuse me." He said.

Misa had always been a big fan of Gundam and video games for as long as she could remember. Every day she would visit the local game center, Irato Game Park, and stay there for hours playing the various video games there. While they were all fun to play, her favorite game by far was Gunpla Battle. She'd been hooked on it ever since she'd first played it. She had even customized a High Grade Akatsuki Gundam, a personal favorite of hers, into her own custom Gunpla, Azalea Gundam. She truly was a big fan of Gundam and video games, in more ways then one.

You see, Misa was always rather chubby, she currently weighed 198 lbs. Her tummy was a large ball of adipose that was incredibly soft and malleable. Her belly went past the waistband of her short shorts and was quite jiggly, something that was proven whenever she exerted herself in any major way. The brunette's ass was also rather big, it filled up nearly any chair she sat down in and was almost as jiggly as her belly. She had also very chunky legs, that were very close to to touching each other and would wobble ever so slightly whenever she walked. Misa's boobs were the smallest part of her, a source of annoyance for her, but they were still of a decent size and rested on top of her tummy, she just wished that they were as big as most chubby girls' breasts. And finally, there was Misa's face. Her chin was double-tiered and she had very round and chubby cheeks that were practically puffed-up in appearance, this helped to make her moments of childish anger even cuter.

"Thank you for visiting again today, Ms. Misa." Info-Chan said in her robotic yet warm and friendly voice.

"And thank you for the warm welcome you give me everyday, Info-Chan." Misa said after taking another bite out of her pretzel. "I'm going straight to the simulator today."

"A new customer entered the simulator just a little bit ago. Play will commence shortly."

"Really?!" The game center's business wasn't the greatest right now, thanks to some tough competition from Times Universe, so Misa was very glad to hear that it had gotten a new customer.

The chubby brunette bolted over to the simulator and saw a boy her age, give or take a month or two, that was just about to start playing. His Gunpla was very well-made. I twas a customized G-3 Gundam with a GM III head and backpack. It was colored in the traditional Gundam color scheme, except the blue and red was replaced by a bright orange. The modifications didn't stop there, it had decals and emblems on it. Most of the emblems were some variation or 3 or G-3 Gundam, aside from the military rank on the sides of the head and the words "Gundam Breaker" on the right shoulder.

The Gunpla's armaments were also different, the shield was the G-3 Gundam's painted orange with the Gundam Breaker emblem on it and a large white number 3 right below said emblem. It had the Beam Machine Gun of the Powered GM Cardigan painted like the rest of the model and the 00 Raiser's GN Sword III with the orange replacing the blue, the glowing light green outline of the blade replaced with a glowing light orange, and the Gundam Breaker emblem on the blade.

All in all, it was a very well-made Gunpla.

155232312.content:
"More! More! My belly needs -UUUURRRP- more!" Iori roared like a mad women as she gobbled up more and more cookies.

"I think you might be enjoying the food -UURRP- a little too much, Iori." Yui said, rubbing her stuffed belly.

"I think we all enjoyed the food a little too much." Kyosuke gave his stomach a few pats for emphasis. "UURAP! But yeah, Iori's got us beat in the enthusiasm department like usual."

To celebrate their victory over Shougo and by extension Shield Of Laplace, Side 0 held a little party themselves with tons of food. At this point, everyone was stuffed to the brim, except Iori. They all looked as if they had swallowed a giant watermelon whole (and felt like it too), their bellies being big orbs that covered up their laps completely. Yet despite this, Iori was still eating and eating, with the same attitude she had during Gunpla Battle no less. All of them had undone their buttons and zippers to make room for their bellies, but Iori hadn't, as she wnated to actually break them with her big belly.

"Enjoying it too much?! Ha! UUURRAP! I'm the only one here eating as much as she should! UUUURRP!" Iori replied before immediately eating more ice cream.

Normally Iori would mind her manners while eating, but in this state she couldn't care less. She didn't mind all the foodstuff coating her cheeks, lips, and clothes. She would even belch loudly without shame, in fact she was actually proud of some of her really loud burps, not that she was the only one impressed by them. The brunette was eating at a very fast rate, the others were wondering how she hadn't given herself a really bad stomachache at this point. Iori would often do her maniacal laughs that she would usually do during Gunpla Battle, except here they often interrupted by her own burping.

"UUUUUUURRRP!"

This loud belch that was bigger then all of Iori's came from the most unlikely source: Marika.

"Er, E-Excuse m-me." The purplenette stuttered out, lowering her hands from her mouth, her face beet red.

"Good one, Marika!" Kyosuke complimented.

"Oh, er, thank you. T-That was a good, er, thing?"

"Yeah, it's not like we should be worrying about manners during a party." Yui answered for Kyosuke. "I think you actually outdid Iori there."

Iori immediately stopped eating the second she heard that, her sinister smile vanished. "She did not! My belches way louder! They're as loud as the Atlas Gundam's Railgun!"

"I gotta side with Yui." Kyosuke said. "Marika's was way louder then your best burp."

"I-I'm on Iori's side." Marika said, rubbing her bloated belly to ease her tummyache. "So can we please, er, stop talking about m-my-"

"If that's the case, which it is NOT!" Iori's maniacal grin returned. "Then I'll just have to belt out my biggest belch yet!"

Iori grabbed a two litter soda bottle and started chugging. Her chugging skills were just as impressive as her binging skills. After chugging down one fourth of the bottle in one go, Iori removed the bottle from her lips and slammed it back on the table.

"I can feel it brewing in my stomach! Here goes!" She then gave her gut a fierce slap. "UUUUUUURRRRRRAAP! Ahh, now that's a belch! Ready to admit I'm the winner now?" She gave her gut another slap in pride, eliciting a smaller burp.

It was louder then marika's burp but Yui and Kyosuke were having too much fun messing with Iori to stop now.

"Well, that is pretty loud but I'm not sure if it's louder then Marika's best." Iori teased.

"I think we need Marika to demonstrate her-"

"She-She won! I-I concede!" Marika cut them off, hoping to end all discussions of her belching as soon as possible.

Luckily for Marika, Iori was satisfied with her "victory" and the subject ended. The rest of Iori's binge went by mostly without incident. Except of course for when she returned to her normal personality the second she was done eating, her gut was even more swollen then the others.

"Oof, I'm stuffed. I can't believe I ate so much. UUURRRP! Excuse me. " The brunette said as she leaned back in her chair and softly massaged her belly. Fortunately for her berserker side but unfortunately for her normal side, leaning back caused her stomach to reach it's apex, sending the buttons on her uniform and skirt flying, startling Marika. Iori's blushed as she looked down at her big, exposed belly in silent horror.

"To think just a few seconds ago you would've been happy to -URAP- see that.' Kyosuke teased.

"Why would I ever be happy to see this?" Iori obliviously said. "Ugh, I have a really bad stomachache. UUUURRRP! Excuse me." Iori continued to belch loudly with embarrassment instead of pride and gently give herself a much needed belly rub.

info.brief_description: The boys and girls of Gundam are starting to pack on the pounds!
info.description:
Welcome to the first Gundam weight gain interactive. Any character from any show or game can gain weight, provided that they are at least in their teens.

Rules

1. The only fetishes that are allowed are weight gain, its sub-genres, and minor slob behavior like belching and some messiness though don't go too far with the latter.

2. Keep everyone in-character unless there is a (good) reason given for the change in personality. e.g., Audrey is more open to Banagher due to spending her childhood with him.

3. Sex is fine but don't make it non-consensual or have it happen constantly. I know it sounds odd but some people are more attracted to their fetish then sex.

4. Straight and gay pairings are allowed.

5. I noticed some people are into this so feel free to make a Mobile Suit fat. No justification, explanation or even acknowledgement required.

6. No character death unless you're adapting a scene that has it.

7. Making gaining realistic. No overly rapid weight gain, no weight gain through methods other then eating, and don't have someone reach an impossible weight.

8. It's Puru, NOT Ple.

Don't worry, the rules are much less restrictive then they seem. Two of them are just giving you permission to do something after all.

And just to clarify two thing, even if you pick a girl you can still have males gain weight and vice versa. And if you have someone start out fat, don't make them obese. They do have to gain weight after all, just make them chubby if you want them to be overweight from the start. This only applies to the protagonist though, feel free to have anyone else start out obese.
